105b7('bum): pa ma mchis byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis te/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ ming de ma mchis pas/ de ltar na ming de gnas pa ma mchis thug pa ma mchis byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis// / 
105b8('bum): bcom ldan 'das bdag gis sgra brnyan lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga'i 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ste/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar bdag gis sgra brnyan/ 
106a1('bum): lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga'i 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong na/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes gang la ming du gdags
106a2('bum): par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das nye bar len pa'i phung po'i ming de yang gnas pa ma mchis thug pa ma mchis byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis te/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ ming de ma mchis pas
106a3('bum): de ltar na ming de gnas pa ma mchis thug pa ma mchis byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis mig yor lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga'i 'phel ba dang 'grib pa
106a4('bum): ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ste/ bcom da ldan 'das de ltar bdag gis mig yor lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga'i 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs yang
106a5('bum): dag par rjes su ma mthong na/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes gang la ming du gdags par bgyi/ bcom lda/ 'das nye bar len pa'i phung po'i ming de yang gnas pa ma mchis
106a6('bum): thug pa ma mchis byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis te/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ ming de ma mchis pas/ de ltar na ming do gnas pa ma mchis thug pa ma mchis byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis
106a7('bum): so/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis gzugs brnyan lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga'i 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ste/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar
106a8('bum): bdag gis gzugs brnyan lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga'i 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong na/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes gang la ming du gdags
106b1('bum): par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das nye bar len pa'i phung po'i ming de yang gnas pa ma mchis thug pa ma mchis byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis te/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ ming de ma mchis pas
106b2('bum): de ltar na ming de gnas pa ma mchis thug pa ma mchis byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchiso// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis smig rgyu lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga'i 'phel ba dang 'grib pa
106b3('bum): ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ste/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar bdag gis smig rgyu lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga'i 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes
106b4('bum): sum mthong na/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes gang la mi nga du gdags par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das nye bar len pa'i phung po'i ming de yang gnas pa ma mchis/ thug pa
106b5('bum): ma mchis byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis te/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ ming de ma mchis pas/ de ltar na ming de gnas pa ma mchis thug pa ma mchis byin gyis
106b6('bum): brlabs pa ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis chu zla lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga'i 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ste/ bcom ldan
106b7('bum): 'das de ltar bdag gis chu zla lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga'i 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong na/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes gang la ming du gdags
106b8('bum): par bgyi// bcom ldan 'das nye bar len pa'i phung po'i ming de yang gnas pa ma mchis thug pa ma mchis byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis te/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ ming de ma mchis pas/ 
107a1('bum): de ltar na ming de gnas pa ma mchis thug pa ma mchis byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis sprul pa lta bu'i nye bar len
107a2('bum): pa'i phung po lnga'i 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ste/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar bdag gis sprul pa lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga'i 'phel ba dang
107a3('bum): 'grib pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong na byang chub sems dpa' zhes gang ba ming du gdags par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das nye bar len pa'i phung po'i ming de
107a4('bum): yang gnas pa ma mchis thug pa ma mchis byin gyis brla dbas pa ma mchis te/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ da ming de ma mchis pas/ de ltar na ming de gnas pa
107a5('bum): ma mchis thug pa ma mchis byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis dpe/ na pa'i 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su rjes
107a6('bum): su ma mthong ste/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar bdag gis dben pa'i 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong na/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes gang la ming du gdags par
107a7('bum): bgyibacom ldan 'das dben pa'i ming de yang gnas pa ma mchis thug pa ma mchis byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis te/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ ming de ma mchis pas/ de ltar na ming de/ 
107a8('bum): gnas pa ma mchis thug pa ma mchis byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis zhi ba'i 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ste/ bcom
107b1('bum): ldan 'das de ltar bdag gis zhi ba'i 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong na/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes gang la ming du gdags par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'angs
107b2('bum): zhi ba'i ming de yang gnas pa ma mchis thug pa ma mchis byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis te/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ ming de ma mchis pas/ de ltar na ming de gnas pa ma mchis
107b3('bum): thug pa ma mchis byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis skye ba ma mchis pa'i 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ste/ bcom
107b4('bum): ldan 'das de ltar bdag gis skye ba ma mchis pa'i 'phel ba dang / 'grib pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthongadan/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes gang la ming du gdags
107b5('bum): par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar bdag gis skye ba ma mchis pa'i ming de yang gnas pa ma mchis thug pa ma mchis byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis te/ de ci'i
107b6('bum): slad du zhe na/ ming de ma mchis pas/ de ltar na ming de gnas pa ma mchis thug pa ma mchis byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis 'gag pa ma
107b7('bum): mchis pa'i 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ste/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar bdag gis 'gag pa ma mchis pa'i 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs yang dag par
107b8('bum): rjes su ma mthong na/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes gang la ming du gdags par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das 'gag pa ma mchis pa'i ming de yang gnas pa ma mchis thug pa ma mchis byin gyis
108a1('bum): brlabs pa ma mchis te/ de ci'i slad du zhen/ ming de ma mchis pas/ de ltar na ming de gnas par mchis thug pa ma mchis byin gyis brlabs pa
108a2('bum): ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis 'byung ba ma mchis pa'i 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ste/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar bdag gis 'byung ba ma
108a3('bum): mchis pa'i 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong na/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes gang la ming du gdags par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das 'byung ba ma mchis pa'i
108a4('bum): ming de yang gnas pa ma mchis thug pa ma mchis byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis te/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ ming de ma mchis pas/ de ltar na ming de gnas pa ma mchis
108a5('bum): thug pa ma mchis byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis mngon par 'du bgyi ba ma mchis pa'i 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs yang dag par
108a6('bum): rjes su ma mthong ste/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar bdag gis mngon par 'du bgyi ba ma mchis pa'i 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong na/ byang chub sems
108a7('bum): dpa' zhes gang la ming du gdags par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das mngon par 'du bgyi ba ma mchis pa'i ming de yang gnas pa ma mchis thug pa ma mchis/ byin gyis brlabs pa ma
108a8('bum): mchis te/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ ming de ma mchis pas/ de ltar na ming de gnas pa ma mchis thug pa ma mchis byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis/ 
108b1('bum): kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa'i 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ste/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar bdag gis kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa'i 'phel ba dang
108b2('bum): 'grib pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong na/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes gang la ming du gdags par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa'i ming de yang
108b3('bum): gnas pa ma mchis/ thug pa ma mchis/ byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis te/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ ming de ma mchis pas/ de ltar na ming de gnas pa ma mchis thug pa ma
108b4('bum): mchis byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis so// bcom da ldan 'das bdag gis rnam par byang ba ma mchis pa nga'i 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su
108b5('bum): ma mthong ste/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar bdag gis rna ma par byang ba ma mchis pa'i 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma da/ migs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong na/ byang chub sems
108b6('bum): dpa' zhes gas ying du gdags par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par byang ba ma mchis pa'i ming de yang gnas pa ma mchis/ thug pa ma mchis/ byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis te/ de
108b7('bum): ci'i slad du zhe na/ ming de ma mchis pas/ de ltar na ming de gnas pa ma mchis/ thug pa ma mchis/ byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis chos
108b8('bum): kyi dbyings kyi 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ste/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar bdag gis chos kyi dbyings kyi 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs yang dag par
109a1('bum): rjes su ma mthong na/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes gang la ming du gdags par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das chos kyi dbyings kyi ming de yang gnas pa ma
109a2('bum): mchis/ thug pa ma mchis/ byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis te/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ ming de ma mchis pas/ de ltar na ming de gnas pa ma mchis thug pa ma mchis/ byin
109a3('bum): gyis brlabs pa ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis de bzhin nyid kyi 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ste/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar bdag
109a4('bum): gis de bzhin nyid kyi 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong na/ byang chub sem das dpa' zhes gang la ming du gdags par bgyi/ bcom
109a5('bum): ldan 'das de bzhin nyid kyi ming de yang gnas pa ma mchi/ sa thug pa ma mchis/ byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis te/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ ming dem
109a6('bum): mchis pas/ de ltar na ming de gnas pa ma mchis thug pa ma mchis/ byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis yang dag pa'i mtha'i 'phel ba
109a7('bum): dang 'grib pa ma dmigs dag par rjes su ma mthong ste/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar bdag gis yang dag pa'i mtha'i 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong na/ 
109a8('bum): byang chub sems dpa' zhes gang la ming du gdags par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das yang dag pa'i mtha'i ming de yang gnas pa ma mchis/ thug pa ma mchis/ byin gyis brlabs pa
109b1('bum): ma mchis te/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ ming de ma mchis pas/ de ltar na ming de gnas pa ma mchis thug pa ma mchis byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das bdag
109b2('bum): gis chos kyi gnas nyid kyi 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ste/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar bdag gis chos kyi gnas nyid kyi 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs
109b3('bum): yang dag par rjes su ma mthong na/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes gang la ming du gdags par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das chos kyi gnas nyid kyi ming de yang gnas pa ma mchis thug pa
109b4('bum): ma mchis byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis te/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ ming de ma mchis pas/ de ltar dan ming de gnas pa ma mchis thug pa ma mchis byin gyis
109b5('bum): brlabs pa ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis chos skyon med pa'i 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmiH/ sa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ste/ bcom ldan 'das
109b6('bum): de ltar bdag gis chos skyon med pa'i 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong na byang chub sems dpa' zhes gang la ming du gdags par bgyi/ bcom ldan
109b7('bum): 'das chos skyon med pa'i ming de yang gnas pa ma mchis/ thug pa ma mchis/ byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis te/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ ming de ma mchis pas/ de ltar na ming de
109b8('bum): gnas pa ma mchis thug pa ma mchis byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis dge ba dang mi dge ba'i chos kyi 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs yang dag par
110a1('bum): rjes su ma mthong ste/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar bdag gis dge ba dang mi dge ba'i chos kyi 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong na
110a2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' zhes gang la ming du gdags par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das dge ba dang mi dge ba'i chos kyi ming de yang gnas pa ma mchis thug pa ma mchis byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis
110a3('bum): te/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ ming de ma mchis pas/ de ltar na ming de gnas pa ma mchis thug pa ma mchis byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis 'jig rten pa
110a4('bum): dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ste/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar bdag gis 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten
110a5('bum): las 'das pa'i chos kyi 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmig/ sa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong na/ byang chub sem/ sa dpa' zhes gang la ming du gdags par bgyi/ bcom
110a6('bum): ldan 'das 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi ming de yang gnas pa ma mchis thug pa ma mchis byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis te/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ ming de ma
110a7('bum): mchis pas/  de ltar na ming de gnas pa ma mchis thug pa ma mchis byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyi chos kyi 'phel ba
110a8('bum): dang 'grib pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ste/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar bdag gis 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyi chos gyi ser ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs yang dag par rje su ma mthong na byad
110b1('bum): chub sems dpa' zhes gang la ming du gdags par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das 'dus byas dang 'dus na byas kyi chos kyi ming de yang gnas pa ma mchis/ thug pa ma mchis/ byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis
110b2('bum): te/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ ming de ma mchis pas/ de ltar na ming de gnas pa ma mchis thug pa ma mchis byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis zag pa dang bcas pa/ 
110b3('bum): dang zag pa ma mchis pa'i chos rnams kyi 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ste/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar bdag gis zag pa dang bcas pa dang zag pa ma mchis
110b4('bum): pa'i chos rnams kyi 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs yang dag/ par rjes su ma mthong na byang chub sems dpa' zhes// gang la ming du gdags par bgyi bcom ldan 'das
110b5('bum): zag pa dang bcas pa dang zag pa ma mchis pa'i chos rnams kyi ming de yang gnas pa ma mchis thug pa ma mchis byin gyis brla bas pa ma mchis te/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ ming dem
110b6('bum): mchis pas/ de ltar na ming de gnas pa ma mchis thug pa ma mchis byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba'i
110b7('bum): chos rnams kyi 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ste bcom ldan 'das de ltar bdag gis 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang nga ltar byung ba'i chos rnams kyi 'phel ba
110b8('bum): dang 'grib pa ma dmigs dag par rjes su ma mthong stebyang chub sems dpa' zhes gang la ming du gdags par bgyi bcom ldan 'das 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung
111a1('bum): pa'i chos rnams kyi ming de yang gnas pa ma mchis thug pa ma mchis byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis te/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ ming
111a2('bum): de ma mchis pas/ de ltar na ming de gnas pa ma mchis/ thug pa ma mchis byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis 'das pa ma mchis pa dang ma
111a3('bum): 'ongs pa ma mchis pa dang / da ltar byung ba ma mchis pa'i 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ste/ de la ci zhes bgyi na/ de ni 'dus ma bgyis te/ 'dus
111a4('bum): ma bgyis ni/ 'das pa ma lags so// ma 'ongs pa ma nga lags so// da ltar byung ba ma lags so// bcom da ldan 'das bdag gis 'dus ma bgyis kyi 'phel ba dang 'grib
111a5('bum): pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ste/ 'dus ma/ bgyis pa po de yang gang zhe na/ gang la skye ba ma mchis gnas pa ma mchis/ 'jig pa ma mchis pa ste/ 
111a6('bum): bcom ldan 'das bdag gis ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyi 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo // bcom ldan 'das bdag gis shar phyogs kyi 'jig
111a7('bum): rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa' dang
111a8('bum): bcas pa'i 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs yang dag par rje su ma mthong ngo // bcom ldan 'das bdag gis lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs
111b1('bum): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa' dang bcas pa'i 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo // 
111b2('bum): bcom ldan 'das bdag gis nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas
111b3('bum): pa/ byang chub sems dpa' dang bcas pa'i 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo // bcom ldan 'das bdag gis byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i
111b4('bum): klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang nga/ dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa' dang bcas pa
111b5('bum): 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / ngo // bcom ldan 'das bdag gis byang sharakyi phyogs 'tshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi
111b6('bum): bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa' dang bcas pa'i 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma
111b7('bum): dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo // bcom ldan 'das bdag gis shar lho'i phyogs 'tshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
111b8('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa' dang bcas pa'i 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo // 
112a1('bum): bcom ldan 'das bdag gis lho nub kyi phyogs 'tshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa dgra bcom pa yang
112a2('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa' dang bcas pa'i 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo // bcom ldan
112a3('bum): 'das bdag gis nub byang gi phyogs 'tshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun
112a4('bum): dang bcas pa byang chub sems dpa' dang bcasapa'i 'phel ba 'grib pa ma dmigs yang dag pa dar rjes su ma mthong ngo // bcom ldan 'das bdag gis 'og
112a5('bum): gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa byang
112a6('bum): chub sems dpa' dang bcas pa'i 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo // bcom ldan 'das bdag gis steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung
112a7('bum): gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa byang chub sems dpa' dang bcas pa'i 'phel ba dang 'grib pa mi dmigs/ 
112a8('bum): yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo // bcom ldan 'das de ltar bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ 
112b1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' dang bcas pa rnams kyi 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong na/ byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang la
112b2('bum): gdams shing bstan par bgyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gang zhig brtags par bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan de yang gnas pa ma mchis/ 
112b3('bum): thug pa ma mchis/ byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis/ dge 'dun gyi ming de yang gnas pa ma mchis/ thug pa ma mchis/ byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis/ byang chub sems
112b4('bum): dpa'i ming de yang gnas pa ma mchis/ thug pa/ ma mchis/ byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis te// / de ci'i slad du zhe na/ ming de ma mchis pas/ de ltar na
112b5('bum): ming de gnas pa ma mchis thug pa ma mchis byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid kyi 'phel ba dang
112b6('bum): 'grib pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong na/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes gang la ming du gdags par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid kyi ming de yang
112b7('bum): gnas pa ma mchis/ thug pa ma mchis byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis te/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ ming de ma mchis pas/ de ltar na ming de gnas pa ma mchis zug pa ma
112b8('bum): mchis byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis so// / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po nyi shu gsum pa// 
113a1('bum): bcom ldan 'das gang yang 'di ltar 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes chos kyi brdar bgyi ba dang chos su gdags pa de yang gzugs sam/ tshor ba
113a2('bum): 'ama'aju shes sam/ 'du byed dam/ rnam par shes pa 'am/ mig gam/ rna ba'am/ sna'am/ lce 'am/ lus sam/ yid dam/ gzugs sam/ sgra 'am// 
113a3('bum): dri'am/ ro 'am/ reg gam/ chos sam/ mig gi rnam par shes pa 'am/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa 'am/ sna'i rnam par shes pa 'am/ lce'i rnam par shes pa 'am
113a4('bum): lus kyi rnam par shes pa 'am/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa da'am/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'am/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'am/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa 'am/ lce'i 'dus
113a5('bum): te reg pa 'am/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa 'am/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa 'am/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba 'am/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
113a6('bum): gyis tshor ba 'am/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'am/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba 'am/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba 'am/ yid kyi 'dus te/ 
113a7('bum): reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba 'am/ sa'i khams sam/ chu'i khams sam/ me'i khams sam/ rlung gi khams sam/ nam mkha'i khams sam/ rnam par shes pa'i khams sam/ 
113a8('bum): ma rig pa 'am/ 'du byed dam/ rnam par shes pa 'am/ ming dang gzugs sam/ skye mched drug gam/ reg pa'am/ tshor ba 'am/ sred pa'am/ len pa 'am/ srid pa 'am/ 
113b1('bum): skye ba'am/ rga shi'am/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ bsam
113b2('bum): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ nang stong pa nyid dam/ phyi stong pa nyid dam/ phyi nang stong pa nyid dam/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dam/ chen po stong pa nyid dam/ 
113b3('bum): don dam pa stong pa nyid dam/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid dam/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dam/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dam/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dam/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dam/ 
113b4('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid dam/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid dam/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dam/ mi dmigs pa stong pa/ nyid dam/ dngos po med pa stong nyid dam/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
113b5('bum): dam/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dam/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sam/ yang dag par spong ba rnams sam/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sam/ dbang po rnams
113b6('bum): sam stobs rnams sam/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sam/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'am/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ma/ bsam gtan rnams sam/ tshad med pa rnams
113b7('bum): sam gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/ rnam par thar pa rnams sam/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / 
113b8('bum): mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'am/ mngon par shes pa rnams sam/ ting nge 'dzin rnams sam/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams so/ mi 'jigs
114a1('bum): pa rnams sam/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sam/ byams pa chen po 'am/ snying rje chen po 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyis
114a2('bum): brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ chos su gdags pa tsam du bas so// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na rmi lam zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so// sgyu ma zhes
114a3('bum): bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so// sgra brnyan zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so// mig yor zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchi so// 
114a4('bum): smig rgyu zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so// chu zla zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du/ dam mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa zhes
114a5('bum): bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha' zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so// 
114a6('bum): sa zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so// chu zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchi so// me zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis
114a7('bum): kyang brjod du ma mchis so// rlung zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so// de bzhin nyid ces bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so// ma nor ba de bzhin
114a8('bum): nyid ces bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so// gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid ces bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so// chos nyid ces bgyi ba'i ming ni
114b1('bum): gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so// chos kyi dbyings shes bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so// chos kyi gnas nyid ces bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so// 
114b2('bum): chos skyon med pa nyid ces bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so// yang dag pa'i mtha' zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
114b3('bum): zhes bgyi ba'i mini gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bgyi
114b4('bum): ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gi des kyang brjod du ma mchis so// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu
114b5('bum): phyin pa zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchiso// tshul khrims shes bgyi ba'i
114b6('bum): ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchiso// ting nge 'dzin ces bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchiso// shes rab ces bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so// rnam
114b7('bum): par grol ba zhes bkyi'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchiso// rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchi so// rgyun du zhugs pa zhes bgyi// 
114b8('bum): pa'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchiso// rgyun du zhugs pa'i chos shes bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis// lan cig phyir 'ong ba zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod dus
115a1('bum): mchis so// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i chos shes bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis// phyir mi 'ong ba zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma
115a2('bum): mchiso// phyir mi 'ong ba'i chos shes bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchi so// dgra bcom pa zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchi so// dgra bcom pa'i chos shes
115a3('bum): bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod ma mchiso// rang sangs rgyas shes bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so// rang sangs rgyas shes bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod
115a4('bum): du ma mchis// byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba'i ming / ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchiso// byang chub sem/ sa dpa'i chos shes bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod
115a5('bum): du ma mchis so// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas she sa bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis ste/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos shes bgyi
115a6('bum): ba'i ming de yang dge ba 'am/ mi dge ba'am/ kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa'am/ kha na ma tho ba ma mchis pa'am/ rtag pa'am/ mi rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba 'am/ 
115a7('bum): bdag gam/ bdag med ma mchis pa 'am/ zhi ba'am/ ma zhi ba'am/ dben pa'am/ mi dben pa'am/ dngos po'am/ dngos po ma mchis pa gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis pas// 
115a8('bum): bcom ldan 'das bdag gis don gyi dbang de lta bu mthong ba'i slad du/ de skad du bdag gis chos thams cad kyi 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma mthong bzhin du 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'
115b1('bum): zhes bgyi ba'am/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bgyi bar ming du gdags pa ni bdag gi 'gyod par 'gyuraro// zhes gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de ltar ming ni gnas pa ma mchis thu
115b2('bum): bapam mchis byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis te/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ ming de ma mchis pas/ de ltar na ming de gnas pa ma mchis/ thug pa ma mchis byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis pa'o// / 
115b3('bum): bcom ldan 'das de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brjod de/ rnam pa 'di dag dang / tshul 'di dag dang / mtshan ma 'di dag gis bstan
115b4('bum): pa'i tshe/ sems zhum par mi 'gyur/ yong su zhum par mi 'gyur zhing 'gyod pa ma mchis la mi 'jigs mi sdang skrag nga par mi 'gyur na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
115b5('bum): chen po de ni nges par phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sa la gnas par rtog par bgyi ste/ gnas pa zhes/ bgyi ba ni gnas pa ma mchis pa'i tshu lo// bcom ldan 'a
115b6('bum): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ des gzugs la gnas par mi bgyi'o// des tshor ba la gnas par mi bgyi'o// 
115b7('bum): des 'du shes la gnas par mi bgyi'o// des 'du byed la gnas par mi bgyi'o// des rnam par shes pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o// des mig la gnas par mi bgyi'o// des rna ba/ 
115b8('bum): la gnas par mi bgyi'o// des sna la gnas par mi bgyi'o// des lce la gnas par mi bgyi'o// des lus la gnas par mi bgyi'o// des yid la gnas par mi bgyi'o// des gzuH/ 
116a1('bum): la gnas par mi bgyi'o// des sbal gnas par mi bgyi'o// des dril gnas par mi bgyi'o// des rol gnas par mi bgyi'o// des reg la gnas par mi bgyi/ 
116a2('bum): des chos la gnas par mi bgyi'o// des mig gi rnam par shes pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o// des rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o// nges sna'i rnam par shes pa la gnas
116a3('bum): par mi bgyi'o// des lce'i rnam par shes pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o// des lus kyi rnam par shes pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o// des yid kyi rnam par shes pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o// 
116a4('bum): des mig gi 'dus te reg pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o// des rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o// des sna'i 'dus te reg pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o// des lce'i
116a5('bum): 'dus te reg pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o// des lus kyi 'dus te reg pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o// des yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o// des mig gi
116a6('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la gnas par mi bgyi'o// des rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la gnas par mi bgyi'o// des sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la gnas
116a7('bum): par mi bgyi'o// des lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la gnas par mi bgyi'o// des lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la gnas par mi bgyi'o// des yid kyi 'dus te/ 
116a8('bum): reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la gnas par mi bgyi'o// des sa'i khams la gnas par mi bgyi'o// des chu'i khams la gnas par mi bgyi'o// des me'i khams la gnas pa mi bgyi'o// 
116b1('bum): des rlung gi khams la gnas pa mi bgyi'o// des na mkha'i khams la gnas par mi bgyi'o// des rnam par shes pa'i khams la gnas par mi bgyi'o// des ma rig pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o// 
116b2('bum): des 'du byed la gnas par mi bgyi'o// des rnam par shes pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o// des ming dang gzugs la gnas par mi bgyi'o// des skye mched drug la gnas par mi bgyi'o// 
116b3('bum): des reg pa la gnas pa mi bgyi'o// des tshor ba la gnas par mi bgyi'o// des sred pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o// des len pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o// des srid pa la gnas par
116b4('bum): mi bgyi'o// des skye ba la gnas par mi bgyi'o// des rga shi la gnas par mi bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ dbacom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar gzugs gzugs kyis
116b5('bum): stong ste/ gzugs stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang gzugs ma lags/ gzugs las gud na yang stong nyid ma mchis sa te/ gzugs nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang
116b6('bum): gzugs so// tshor ba tshor bas stong pa ste/ tshor ba'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang tshor ba ma lags/ tshor ba las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ tshor ba nyid kyang stong pa
116b7('bum): nyid stong pa nyid kyang tshor ba'o// 'du shes 'du shes kyis stong ste/ 'du shes kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang 'du shes ma lags/ 'du shes las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te
116b8('bum): 'du shes nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang 'du shes so// 'du byed 'du byed kyis stong ste/ 'du byed kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang 'du byed ma lags/ 'du byed las gud na yang
117a1('bum): stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ 'du byed nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang 'du byed do// rnam par shes pa rnam par shes pas stong ste/ rnam par shes pa'i
117a2('bum): stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang rnam par shes pa ma lags/ rnam par shes pa las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes
117a3('bum): pa'o// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ des gzugs la gnas par mi bgyi'o// des tshor
117a4('bum): ba la gnas par mi bgyi'o// des 'du shes la gnas pa ngar mi bgyi'o// des 'du byed la gnas par mi bgyi'o// // des rnam par shes pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o// bcom
117a5('bum): ldan 'das de yang 'di ltar mig mig gis stong ste/ mig / gi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang mig ma lags/ mig las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ mig nyid kyang
117a6('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang mig go// rna ba rna bas stong ste / rna ba'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang rna ba ma lags/ rna ba las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ rna ba nyid kyang stong panyid kyi
117a7('bum): nyid kyang rna ba'o// sna snas stong ste/ sna'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang sna ma lags/ sna las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ sna nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang sna'o// 
117a8('bum): lcelces stong ste/ lce'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang lce ma lags/ lce las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ lce nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang lce'o// lus lus kyis stong ste/ 
117b1('bum): lus kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang lus ma lags/ lus las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ lus nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang lus so// yid yid kyi stong ste/ yid kyi stong
117b2('bum): pa nyid gang lags pa de yang yid ma lags/ yi las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ yid nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang yid do// gzugs gzugs kyis stong ste/ gzugs kyi stong
117b3('bum): pa nyid gang lags pa de yang gzugs ma lags/ gzugs las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ gzugs nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzugs so// sgra smras stong ste/ sgra'i
117b4('bum): stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang sgra ma lags/ sgra las gu/  na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ sgra nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang sgra'o// dri dri yis stong ste/ dri'i stong pa nyid
117b5('bum): gang lags pa de yang dri ma lags/ dri las gud na yang ste nga pa nyid ma mchis te/ dri nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dri'o// ro ros stong ste/ ro'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa
117b6('bum): de yang ro ma lags/ ro las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ ro nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang ro'o// reg reg gis stong ste/ reg gi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang reg ma lags
117b7('bum): reg las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ reg nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang reg go// chos chos kyis stong ste/ chos kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang chos ma lags/ chos las
117b8('bum): gung na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ chos nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang chos so// mig gi rnam par shes pa mig gi rnam par shes pas stong ste/ mig gi rnam par shes pa'i stong pa
118a1('bum): nyid gang lags pa de yang mig gi rnam par shes pa ma lags/ mig gi rnam par shes pa las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ mig gi rnam par
118a2('bum): shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang mig gi rnam par shes pa'o// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa rna ba'i rnam par shes pas stong ste/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de
118a3('bum): yang rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ma lags/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'o// 
118a4('bum): sna'i rnam par shes pa sna'i rnam par shes pas stong ste/ sna'i rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de ya/ dang sna'i rnam par shes pa ma lags/ sna'i rnam par shes
118a5('bum): pa las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ sna'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang sna'i rnam par shes pa'o// lce'i rnam par shes pa lce'i rnam par shes
118a6('bum): pas stong ste/ lce'i rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang lce'i rnam par shes pa ma lags/ lce'i rnam par shes pa las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ lce'i rnam par
118a7('bum): shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang lce'i rnam par shes pa'o// lus kyi rnam par shes pa lus kyi rnam par shes pas stong ste/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid gang
118a8('bum): lags pa de yang lus kyi rnam par shes pa ma lags/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid
118b1('bum): kyang lus kyi rnam par shes pa'o// yid kyi rnam par shes pa yid kyi rnam par shes pas stong ste/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang yid kyi rnam par shes pas
118b2('bum): lags/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'o// mig gi 'dus te/ 
118b3('bum): reg pa mig gi 'dus te reg pas stong ste/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang mig gi 'dus te reg pa ma lags/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa las gud na yang stong pa
118b4('bum): nyid ma mchis te/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'o// rna ba 'dus te reg pa rna ba'i 'dus te reg pas stong ste/ rna ba'i/ 
118b5('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang rna ba'i dus te reg pa ma lags/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la sa gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ rna ba'i 'dus te
118b6('bum): reg pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang rnga ba'i 'dus te reg pa'o// sna'i 'dus te reg pa sna'i 'dus te reg pas stong ste/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang sna'i 'dus
118b7('bum): reg pa ma lags sna'i 'dus te reg pa las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang sna'i 'dus te reg pa'o// lce'i 'dus te
118b8('bum): reg pa lce'i 'dus te reg pas stong ste/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang lce'i 'dus te reg pa ma lags/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis
119a1('bum): te/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang lce'i 'dus te reg pa'o// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa lus kyi 'dus te reg pas stong ste/ lus
119a2('bum): kyi 'dus te reg pa'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ma lags/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang
119a3('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'o// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yid kyi 'dus te reg pas stong ste/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang yid kyi 'dus te
119a4('bum): rig pa ma lags/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'o// 
119a5('bum): mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong ste/ mig gi 'dus/ te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang / 
119a6('bum): mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma lags/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid
119a7('bum): kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong ste/ rna ba'i 'dus
119a8('bum): te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma lags/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba las gud na yang stong pa nyid
119b1('bum): mamachis te/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang rnga ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba sna'i 'dus te reg
119b2('bum): pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong ste/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma lags/ sna'i 'das te reg pa'i
119b3('bum): rkyen gyis tshor ba las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// lce'i 'dus
119b4('bum): te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen dgyis tshor bas stong ste/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen dgyis tshor ba'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang lce'i 'dus te
119b5('bum): reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma lags lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba
119b6('bum): nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong ste/ lus kyi
119b7('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma lags lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba las gud na yang stong
119b8('bum): pa nyid ma mchis te/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
120a1('bum): tshor ba yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong ste/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang yid kyi
120a2('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma lags/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid
120a3('bum): kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// sa'i khams sa'i khams kyis stong ste/ sa'i khams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang sa'i khams
120a4('bum): ma lags/ sa'i khams las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ sa'i khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyangasa'i khams so// chu'i khams chu'i khams kyis
120a5('bum): stong ste/ chu'i khams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang chu/ 'i khams ma lags/ chu'i khams las gud na yang / stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ chu'i khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid
120a6('bum): stong pa nyid kyang chu'i khams so// me'i khams me'i khams kyis stong ste/ me'i khams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang me'i khams ma lags/ me'i khams las gud na yang stong pa nyid
120a7('bum): ma mchis te/ me'i khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang me'i khams so// rlung gi khams rlung gi khams kyis stong ste/ rlung gi khams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang rlung gi kham
120a8('bum): ma lags/ rlung gi khams las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ rlung gi khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang rlung gi khams so// nam mkha'i khams na mkha'i khams kyis stong ste/ nam
120b1('bum): khams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang na mkha'i khams ma lags namakha'i khams las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ nam pa'i khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang namakhang
120b2('bum): khams so// rnam par shes pa'i khams rnam par shes pa'i khams kyis stong ste/ rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang rnam par shes pa'i khams ma lags// 
120b3('bum): rnam par shes pa'i khams las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ rnam par shes pa'i khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'i khams so// bcom ldan 'das ma rig
120b4('bum): rig pas stong ste/ ma rig pa'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang ma rig pa ma lags/ ma rig pa las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ ma rig pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong
120b5('bum): pa nyid kyang ma rig pa'o// 'du byed 'du byed kyis stong ste// 'du byed kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang 'du byed/ ma lags/ 'du byed las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis
120b6('bum): te/ 'du byed nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang 'du byed do// rnam par shes pa rnam par shes pas stong ste/ rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang rnam par shes pa ma
120b7('bum): lagasarnam par shes pa las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o// ming dang gzugs ming dang gzugs
120b8('bum): kyis stong ste/ ming dang gzugs kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang ming dang gzugs ma lags/ ming dang gzugs las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ ming dang gzugs nyid kyang/ 
121a1('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang ming dang gzugs so// skye mched drug skye mched drug gis stong ste/ skye mched drug gi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang
121a2('bum): mched drug ma lags skye mched drug las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ skye mched drug nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang skye mched drug go// reg pa reg pas stong ste/ reg pa'i/ 
121a3('bum): stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang reg pa ma lags reg pa las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ reg pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang reg pa'o// tshor ba tshor bas stong ste/ 
121a4('bum): tshor ba'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang tshor ba ma lags/ tshor ba las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ tshor ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang tshor ba'o// sred
121a5('bum): pa sred pas stong ste/ sred pa'i stong pa nyid gang lag/ sa pa de yang sred pa ma lags sred pa las gud na/ yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ sred pa nyid kyang stong pa
121a6('bum): nyid stong pa nyid kyang sred pa'o// len pa len pas stong ste/ len pa'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang len pa ma lags len pa las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ len pa
121a7('bum): nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang len pa'o// srid pa srid pas stong ste/ srid pa'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang srid pa ma lags srid pa las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ 
121a8('bum): srid pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang srid pa'o// skye ba skye bas stong ste/ skye ba'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang skye ba ma lags/ skye ba las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ skye ba
121b1('bum): nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang skye ba'o// rga shi rga shis stong ste/ rga shi'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang rga shi ma lags/ rga shi las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ rga shi nyid
121b2('bum): kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang rga shi'o// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ ma rig pa la gnas par
121b3('bum): mi bgyi'o// 'du byed la gnas par mi bgyi'o// rnam par shes pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o// ming dang gzugs la gnas par mi bgyi'o// skye mched drug la gnas par mi bgyi'o// 
121b4('bum): reg pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o// tshor ba la gnas par mi bgyi'o// sred pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o// len pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o// srid pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o// 
121b5('bum): skye ba la gnas par mi bgyi'o// rga shi la gnas par mi ba gyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sem/ sa dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
121b6('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas stong ste/ 
121b7('bum): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma lags/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu
121b8('bum): phyin pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 
122a1('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshul khrims kyi pha
122a2('bum): rol tu phyin pas stong ste/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma lags tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las gud na yang stong
122a3('bum): pa nyid ma mchis te/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
122a4('bum): chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/  bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar bzod
122a5('bum): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas stong ste/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma lags/ bzod pa'i
122a6('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub
122a7('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das
122a8('bum): de ni 'di ltar brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong ste/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu
122b1('bum): byiphyin pa ma lags/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu
122b2('bum): phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par mi
122b3('bum): bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong ste/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa
122b4('bum): nyid gang lags pa de yang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma de lags/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa las dgud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ bsam gtan gyi
122b5('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang bsam ga/ tan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'ad sa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
122b6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu
122b7('bum): phyin pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma lags/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
122b8('bum): las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des nin/ byang
123a1('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug sa la gnas par mi bgyi'o// bcom
123a2('bum): ldan 'dagan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 
123a3('bum): bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi stong ste/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang dran pa nye bar gzhan
123a4('bum): pa rnams ma lags dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la sa gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dran pa nye bar
123a5('bum): gzhag pa rnamaso// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na// / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos she/ sa rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ dran pa nye bar
123a6('bum): gzhag pa rnams la gnas par mi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag par spong
123a7('bum): ba bzhi la gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar yang dag par spong ba rnams yang dag par spong ba rnams kyis stong ste/ yang dag par spong ba rnams
123a8('bum): kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang yang dag par spong ba rnams ma lags / yang dag par spong ba rnams las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ yang dag par spong ba rnams kyang stong pa nyid stong
123b1('bum): pa nyid kyang yang dag par spong ba rnams so// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag/ 
123b2('bum): par spong ba rnams la gnas par mi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi
123b3('bum): la gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyis stong ste/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi stong pa nyid
123b4('bum): gang lags pa de yang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ma lagasad rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams las gud na yang stong pa nyid da ma mchis te/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyang stong pa nyid stong / 
123b5('bum): pa nyid kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams so// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
123b6('bum): pa'i tshe/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la gnas par mi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 
123b7('bum): dbang po lnga la gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar dbang po rnams dbang po rnams kyis stong ste/ dbang po rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang la gos pa de yang
123b8('bum): dbang po rnams ma lags dbang po rnams las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ dbang po rnams kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dbang po rnam so// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ 
124a1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ dbang po rnams la gnas pa mi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das
124a2('bum): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ stobs lnga la gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhen/ bcom ldan 'das
124a3('bum): de ni 'di ltar stobs rnams stobs rnams kyis stong ste/ stobs rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang stobs rnams ma lags/ stobs rnams las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ 
124a4('bum): stobs rnams kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang stobs rnams// / bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sem/ das dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
124a5('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/ stobs rnams la gnas par mi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
124a6('bum): pa'i tshe/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar byang chub kyi yan lag rnams byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis stong ste/ 
124a7('bum): byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ma lags/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ byang chub kyi yan
124a8('bum): lag rnams kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang byang chub kyi yan lag rnamaso// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
124b1('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la gnas par mi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
124b2('bum): tshe 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar lam lam gyis stong ste/ lam gyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang lam
124b3('bum): ma lags/ lam las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ lam yang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang lam mo// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
124b4('bum): chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'phag/ nges pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
124b5('bum): dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi la gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'phags
124b6('bum): pa'i bden pa rnams 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyis sto ste/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ma lags/ 'phags pa'i
124b7('bum): bden pa rnams las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnamaso// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang
124b8('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la gnas par mi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems
125a1('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe bsam gtan bzhi la gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan
125a2('bum): 'das de ni 'di ltar bsam gtan rnams bsam gtan rnams kyis stong ste/ bsam gtan rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang bsam gtan rnams ma lags/ bsam gtan rnams
125a3('bum): las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ bsam gtan rnams kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang bsam gtan rnams so// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
125a4('bum): dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ bsam gtan rnams la gnas par mi bgyi'o// bcomad ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
125a5('bum): chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ tshad med pa bzhi la gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du ni na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar tshad med pa rnams tshad med
125a6('bum): pa rnams kyis stong ste/ tshad med pa rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang tshad med pa ma lags/ tshad med pa rnams las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ tshad med pa rnams kyang
125a7('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang tshad med pa rnam so// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ tshad med/ 
125a8('bum): pa rnams la gnas par mi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par
125b1('bum): 'jug pa bzhi la gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis sto/ 
125b2('bum): ste/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma lags/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams
125b3('bum): las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnam so// bcom ldan 'das
125b4('bum): rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe// / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la gnas
125b5('bum): par mi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sem sa dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam par thar pa brgyad la gnas
125b6('bum): par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar rnam par thar pa rnams rnam par thar pa rnams kyis stong ste/ rnam par thar pa rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang
125b7('bum): rnam par thar pa rnams ma lags/ rnam par thar pa rnams las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ rnam par thar pa rnams kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang rnam par thar pa rnamaso// bcom
125b8('bum): ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam par thar pa rnams la gnas par mi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das
126a1('bum): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu
126a2('bum): la gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams
126a3('bum): kyis stong ste/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma lags/ mthar gyis
126a4('bum): gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams las gud na yang stong pa/ nyid ma mchis te/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms dpar 'jug pa rnams kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang mthar
126a5('bum): gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
126a6('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la gnas par mi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi
126a7('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom
126a8('bum): ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa rnams rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pas
126b1('bum): stong ste/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa
126b2('bum): med pa ma lags/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan
126b3('bum): ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa yang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang // smon pa med pa'o// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ 
126b4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam par thar pa/ nga'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang smod pa
126b5('bum): med pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das ga/ zhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen/ pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe
126b6('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnam de bzhin ga sheg pa'i stong rna byo stong ste/ de bzhin gshes
126b7('bum): pa'i stobs rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ma lags/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ de
126b8('bum): bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnam so// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes
127a1('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshi sa de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la gnas par mi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gnan yang byang chub
127a2('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi la gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar mi
127a3('bum): 'jims pa rnams mi 'jigs pa rnams kyis stong ste/ mi 'jigs pa rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang mi 'jigs pa rnams ma lags/ mi 'jigs pa rnams las gung na yang stong
127a4('bum): pa nyid ma mchis te/ mi 'jigs pa rnams kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang mi 'jigs pa rnams so// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
127a5('bum): chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe mi 'jigs pa rnams la gnas par mi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
127a6('bum): dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ so sa yang dag par rig pa bzhi la gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar so so la
127a7('bum): dag par rig pa rnams so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyis stong ste/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ma lags/ sos
127a8('bum): yang dag par rig pa rnams las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ so so yang dag pararig pa rnams kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang so so yang dag par rig pa rnams so// bcom ldan 'das rnam
127b1('bum): grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la gnas par mi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das
127b2('bum): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen po la gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom
127b3('bum): / ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar byams pa chen po ni byams pa chen pos stong snying rje chen po na snying rje chen pos stong ste/ bcom ldan 'das byams pa chen po'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa dang snying rje chen po
127b4('bum): stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang / byams pa chen po ma/ delags de yang snying rje chen po ma lags/ byams dpa chen po dang snying rje chen po las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis
127b5('bum): te/ byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen po yang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen po'o// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na byang chub sems
127b6('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen po la gnas par mi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems
127b7('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan
127b8('bum): 'das de ni 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyis stong ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang sa
128a1('bum): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ma lags sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ sangs rgyas kyi/ 
128a2('bum): chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams so// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
128a3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la gnas par mi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
128a4('bum): chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe g.yi ge rnams la gnas par mi bgyi ste/ yi ge mdo na par bsgrub pa la gnas par mi bgyi/ gcig tu brjod
128a5('bum): pa la gnas par mi bgyi/ gnyis su brjod pa la gan/ sa par mi bgyi/ tha dad tu brjod pa la gnas par/ mi bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'ad/ 
128a6('bum): de ni 'di ltar yi ge rnams yi ge rnams kyis stong ste/ yi ge rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang yi ge rnams ma lags/ yi ge rnams las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te// 
128a7('bum): yi ge rnams kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang yi ge rnams so// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
128a8('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ yi ge rnams la gnas par mi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe
128b1('bum): mngon par shes pa rnams la gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar mngon par shes pa rnams mngon par shes pa rnams kyis stong ste/ mngon par
128b2('bum): shes pa rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang mngon par shes pa rnams ma lags/ mngon par shes pa rnams las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ mngon par shes pa nyid
128b3('bum): kyang stong pa nyid stong nyid nyid kyang mngon par shes pa rnamaso// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
128b4('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/ mngon par shes pa rnams la gnas da par mi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab
128b5('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo thams cad la gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar ting nge
128b6('bum): 'dzin gyi sgo rnams ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rnams kyis stong ste/ ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rnams ma lags ting nge 'dzin mo rnams las gud
128b7('bum): na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rnams kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rnams so// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems
128b8('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo thams cad la gnas par mi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems/ 
129a1('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ gzungs kyi sgo thams cad la gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i srang
129a2('bum): du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar gzungs kyi sgo rnams gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis stong ste/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang gzungs kyi sgo rnams ma lags/ 
129a3('bum): gzungs kyi sgo rnams las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzungs kyi sgo rnams so// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na
129a4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzungs kyi sgo bam/ sa cad la gnas par mi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das
129a5('bum): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos she sa rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs mi rtag/ go zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du
129a6('bum): zhen/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar gzugs mi rtag pa nyid gzugs mi rtag pa nyid kyis stong ste/ gzugs mi rtag pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang gzugs mi rtag pa nyid ma
129a7('bum): lags/ gzugs mi rtag pa nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ gzugs mi rtag pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzugs mi rtag pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das
129a8('bum): rnam grangs des ma/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyong po'i che/ gzugs mi rtag go zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi rgya'i/ des shes
129b1('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ tshor ba mi rtag go zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar tshor ba mi rtag pa nyid tshor ba mi rtag
129b2('bum): pa nyid kyis stong ste/ tshor ba mi rtag pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang tshor ba mi rtag pa nyid ma lags/ tshor ba mi rtag pa nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ tshor ba mi
129b3('bum): rtag pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang tshor ba mi rtag pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
129b4('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ tshor ba mi rtag go zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi dbagyi'o// des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dpa'i tshe 'du shes mi rtag go zhes bgyi bar gnas par
129b5('bum): mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na// bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'du shes mi rtag pa nyid kyis stong ste/ 'du shes mi rtag pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang
129b6('bum): 'du shes mi rtag pa nyid ma lags/ 'du shes mi rtag pa nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ 'du shes mi rtag pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang 'du shes mi rtag pa nyid do// 
129b7('bum): bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'du shes mi rtag go zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi
129b8('bum): bgyi'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa// bam po nyi shu bzhi pa des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 
130a1('bum): 'du byed mi rtag go zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'du byed mi rtag pa nyid 'du byed mi rtag
130a2('bum): pa nyid kyis stong ste/ 'du byed mi rtag pa nyid stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang 'du byed mi rtag pa nyid ma lags/ 'du byed mi rtag pa nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ 'du byed mi
130a3('bum): rtag pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang 'du byed mi rtag pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
130a4('bum): tshe/ 'du byed mi rtag go zhes bgyi bar gnas mi bgyi'o// des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam padar shes pa mi rtag go zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste/ 
130a5('bum): de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar rnam par shesas pa mi rtag pa nyid rnam par shes pa mi rtag pa nyid kyis stong ste/ rnam par shes pa mi rtag pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang
130a6('bum): lags pa de yang rnam par shes pa mi rtag pa nyid ma lags/ rnam par shes pa mi rtag pa nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ rnam par shes pa mi rtag pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid
130a7('bum): kyang rnam par shes pa mi rtag pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam par shes pa
130a8('bum): mi rtag go zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs sdug bsngal lo// 
130b1('bum): zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar gzugs sdug bsngal ba nyid gzugs sdug bsngal ba nyid kyis stong ste/ gzugs sdug bsngal ba nyid/ 
130b2('bum): kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang gzug tu bsngal ba nyid ma lags/ gzugs sdug bsngal ba nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ gzugs sdug bsngal ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa
130b3('bum): nyid kyang gzugs sdug bsngal ba nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs
130b4('bum): sdug bsngal ba'o zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o// des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ tshor ba sdu dag bsngal lo zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i
130b5('bum): slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar tshor ba sdug bsngal ba nyid tshor ba sdug bsngal ba nyid kyis stong ste/ tshor ba sdug bsngal ba nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de
130b6('bum): yang tshor ba sdug bsngal ba nyid ma lags/ tshor ba sdug bsngal ba nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ tshor ba sdug bsngal ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang tsher ba sdug bsngal ba
130b7('bum): nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ tshor ba sdug bsngal lo zhes bgyi bar
130b8('bum): gnas par mi bgyi'o// des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'du shes sdug bsngal lo zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das
131a1('bum): de ni 'di ltar 'du shes sdug bsngal ba nyid 'du shes sdug bsngal ba nyid kyis stong ste/ 'du shes sdug bsngal ba nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang 'du
131a2('bum): shes sdug bsngal ba nyid ma lags/ 'du shes sdug bsngal ba nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ 'du shes sdug bsngal ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang 'du shes sdug bsngal
131a3('bum): ba nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'du shes sdug bsnga'o/ zhes bgyi gnas par sa bgyur
131a4('bum): des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'du byed sdug bsngal lo zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'du
131a5('bum): byed sdug bsngal ba nyid 'du byed sdug bsngal ba nyid kyis stong ste// / 'du byed sdug bsngal ba nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang / lags pa de yang 'du byed sdug bsngal ba nyid ma lags
131a6('bum): 'du byed sdug bsngal ba nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ 'du byed sdug bsngal ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang 'du byed sdug bsngal ba nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs
131a7('bum): nges na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'du byed sdug bsngal lo zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o// des shes rab kyi pha
131a8('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal lo zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe ni/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal ba
131b1('bum): rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal ba nyid kyis stong ste/ rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal ba nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal ba nyid ma lags/ rnam pa/ 
131b2('bum): shes pa sdug bsngal ba nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal ba nyid do// bcom
131b3('bum): ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal lo zhes bgyi bar gnas par
131b4('bum): mi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub se/ dmas dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha/  rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs bdag med do zhes
131b5('bum): bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar gzugs bdag med pa nyid gzugs bdag med pa nyid kyis stong ste/ gzugs
131b6('bum): bdag med pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang gzugs bdag med pa nyid ma lags gzugs bdag med pa nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ gzugs bdag
131b7('bum): med pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzugs bdag med pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu
131b8('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs bdag med do zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o// des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ tshor ba bdag med do zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi
