132a1('bum): bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhen bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar chos bdag med pa nyid tshor ba bdag med pa nyid kyis stong ste/ tshor ba bdag med pa nyid/ 
132a2('bum): kyis stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang tshor ba bdag med pa nyid ma lags/ tshor ba bdag med pa nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ tshor ba bdag med pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid
132a3('bum): kyang tshor ba bdag med pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ tshor ba bdag
132a4('bum): med do zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o// des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'du shes bdag med do zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom/ 
132a5('bum): ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'du shes bdag med pa nyid 'du shes/ bdag med pa nyid kyis stong ste/ 'du shes bdag med// pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang 'du shes bdag
132a6('bum): med pa nyid ma lags/ 'du shes bdag med pa nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ 'du shes bdag med pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang 'du shes bdag med
132a7('bum): pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'du shes bdag med do zhes
132a8('bum): bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o// des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'du byed bdag med do zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan
132b1('bum): 'das de ni 'di lta 'du byed bdag med pa nyid du byed bdag med pa nyid kyis stong ste/ 'du byed bdag med pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang 'du byed bdag med pa nyid sa lags// 
132b2('bum): 'du byed bdag meng pa nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te 'du byed bdag med pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang 'du byed bdag myed pa nyid do// bcom lhuna'angs rnam
132b3('bum): grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'du byed po dag med do zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'i// 
132b4('bum): des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam par shes pa bdag med do zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi br-igyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das
132b5('bum): de ni 'di ltar rnam par shes pa bdag med pa nyid rnam paras pa bdag med pa nyid kyis stong ste/ rnam par she// sa pa bdag med pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang / 
132b6('bum): rnam par shes pa bdag med pa nyid ma lags/ rnam par shes pa bdag med pa nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchi sa te/ rnam par shes pa bdag med pa nyid kyang stong pa
132b7('bum): nyid stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa bdag med pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
132b8('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam par shes pa bdag med do zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi
133a1('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs zhi ba'o zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar gzum/ 
133a2('bum): zhi ba nyid gzugs zhi ba nyid kyis stong ste/ gzugs zhi ba nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang gzugs zhi ba nyid ma lags/ gzugs zhi ba nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis
133a3('bum): te/ gzugs zhi ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzugs zhi ba nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi/ 
133a4('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs zhi ba'o zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o// des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ tshor ba zhi pa'o zhes
133a5('bum): bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar tshor ba zhi pa nyid tshor/ bzhi pa nyid kyis stong ste/ tshor ba zhi pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid
133a6('bum): gang lags pa de yang tshor ba zhi pa nyid ma lags/ tshor ba zhi pa nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ tshor ba nipa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang tshor ba zhi pa nyid do// 
133a7('bum): bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ tshor bzhi pa'o zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o// 
133a8('bum): des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'du shes zhi ba'o zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'du shes zhi ba nyid 'du shes
133b1('bum): ni ba nyid kyis stong ste/ 'du shes ni nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang 'du shes ni banyid ma lags/ 'du shes ni pa nyid las gung du yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ 'du shes/ 
133b2('bum): zhi ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang 'du shes zhi ba nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
133b3('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ 'du shes zhi ba'o zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o// nges shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'du byed zhi ba'o zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi
133b4('bum): s+ho/ de ci'i slad du na na bcom ldan 'das de ni daji ltar 'du byed zhi ba nyid 'du byed zhi ba nyid kyis stong ste/ 'du byed zhi ba nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang
133b5('bum): 'du byed zhi ba nyid ma lags/ 'du byed zhi ba nyid las su/ ngan yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ 'du byed zhing nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang 'du byed zhi ba nyid do// 
133b6('bum): bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'du byed zhi nga'o zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyid
133b7('bum): des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam par shes pa ni nga'o zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar rnam par
133b8('bum): shes pa ni pa nyid rnam par shes pa zhi nyid kyis stong ste/ rnam par shes pa zhi pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang rnam par shes pa ni ba nyid ma lags/ rnam par shes/ 
134a1('bum): pani ba nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ rnam par shes pa zhi pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa ni ba nyid do// 
134a2('bum): bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam par shes pa zhi ba'o zhes bgyi bar gan/ 
134a3('bum): par mi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs stong ngo zhes bgyi
134a4('bum): par gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar gzugs stong pa nyid gzugs stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ gzugs stong
134a5('bum): pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang gzugs stong pa nyid ma lags gzugs stong pa nyid las gu na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ gzugs stong pa nyid
134a6('bum): kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzugs stong pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
134a7('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs stong ngo zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o// des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ tshor ba stong ngo zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste/ 
134a8('bum): de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar tshor ba stong pa nyid tshor ba stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang tshor ba stong pa nyid ma
134b1('bum): lags/ tshor ba stong pa nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ tshor ba stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang tshor ba stong pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs
134b2('bum): des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ tshor ba stong ngo zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o// des shes rab
134b3('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe'adu shes stong ngo zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'du shes stong pa nyid 'du
134b4('bum): shes stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ 'du shes stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang 'du shes stong pa nyid ma lags/ 'du shes stong pa nyid las gud na yang ste/ 
134b5('bum): pa nyid ma mchis te/ 'du shes stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang 'du shes stong pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na byang chub sems
134b6('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'du shes stong ngo zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o// des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe
134b7('bum): 'du byed stong ngo zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'du byed stong pa nyid 'du byed stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ 'du byed
134b8('bum): stong po nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang 'du byed stong pa nyid ma lags/ 'du byed stong pa nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te 'du byed stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid du/ 
135a1('bum): pa nyid kyang 'du byed stong pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha ro/ 
135a2('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'du byed stong ngo nas bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o// des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam par shes pa stong ngo zhes bgyi bar gnas/ 
135a3('bum): par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad duni/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi sto/ 
135a4('bum): pa nyid gang lags pa de yang rnam par shes pa nyid ma lags / rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyang
135a5('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu
135a6('bum): phaphyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam par shes pa stong ngo zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha
135a7('bum): rol tu phyin po la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs mtshan ma med do zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar gzugs mtshan ma med
135a8('bum): pa nyid gzugs mtshan ma med pa nyid kyis stong ste/ gzugs mtshan ma med pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang gzugs mtshan ma med pa nyid ma lags/ gzugs mtshan
135b1('bum): ma med pa nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ gzugs mtshan ma med pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzugs mtshan ma med pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs
135b2('bum): des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs mtshan ma med do zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o// des
135b3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ tsher ba mtshan ma med do zhes bgyi bar gnas por mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar tshor ba
135b4('bum): mtshan ma med pa nyid tshor ba mtshan ma med pa nyid kyis stong ste tshor ba mtshan ma med pa nyid kyis stong pa nyid gang la dgas pa de yang tshor ba mtshan ma meng pa nyid ma lags
135b5('bum): tshor ba mtshan ma med pa nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma ma/ chis te/ tshor ba mtshan ma med pa nyid kyang stong pa/ nyid stong pa nyid kyang tshor ba mtshan ma med pa nyid do// bcom
135b6('bum): ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ tshor ba mtshan ma med do zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o// 
135b7('bum): des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'du shes mtshan ma med do zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'du shes
135b8('bum): mtshan ma med pa nyid 'du shes mtshan mo med pa nyid kyis stong ste/ 'du shes ma mtshan ma med pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang 'du shes mtshan ma med pa nyid ma lags/ 'du shes
136a1('bum): mtshan ma med pa nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ 'du shes mtshan ma med pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang 'du shes mtshan ma med
136a2('bum): pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe 'du shes mtshan ma med do zhes
136a3('bum): bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o// des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'du byed mtshan ma med do zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom
136a4('bum): ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'du byed mtshan ma med pa nyid 'du bya/ dang mtshan ma med pa nyid kyi stong ste/ 'du byed ma da tshan ma med pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang 'du
136a5('bum): byebyid mtshan ma med pa nyid ma lags/ 'du byed mtshan ma med pa nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ 'du byed mtshan ma med pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa
136a6('bum): nyid kyang 'du byed mtshan ma med pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 
136a7('bum): 'du byed mtshon ma med do zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o// des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam par shes pa mtshan ma med do zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi
136a8('bum): bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar rnam par shes pa mtshan ma med pa nyid rnam par shes pa mtshan ma med pa nyid kyis stong ste/ rnam par shes
136b1('bum): pa mtshan ma med pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang rnam par shes pa mtshan ma med pa nyid ma lags/ rnam par shes pa mtshan ma med pa nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te
136b2('bum): rnam par shes pa mtshan ma med pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa mtshan ma med pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa'
136b3('bum): sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam par shes pa mtshan ma med do zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub
136b4('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs smon pa med do zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad/ 
136b5('bum): du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar gzugs smon pa med pa nyid gzugs smon pa med pa nyid kyis stong ste/ gzugs smon pa med pa nyid kyi stong/ 
136b6('bum): pa nyid gang lags pa de yang gzugs smon pa med pa nyid ma lags/ gzugs smon pa med pa nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ gzugs smon pa med pa nyid kyang stong pa
136b7('bum): nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzugs smon pa med pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod/ 
136b8('bum): pa'i cha/ gzugs smon pa med do zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o// des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ tshor ba smon pa med do zhes bgyi bar gnas par
137a1('bum): mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhen/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar tshor ba smon pa med pa nyid tshor ba smon pa med pa nyid kyis stong ste/ cho
137a2('bum): basmon pa med pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang tshor ba smon pa med pa nyid ma lags tshor ba smon pa med pa nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ tshor ba smon pa med
137a3('bum): pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang tshor ba smon pa med pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu
137a4('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ tshor ba smon pa med do zhes pa gyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o// des shes rab kyi pha pharol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'du shes smon pa med do
137a5('bum): zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du/ zhen bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'du shes/ smon pa med pa nyid 'du shes smon pa med pa nyid kyis stong ste/ 
137a6('bum): 'du shes smon pa med pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang 'du shes smon pa med pa nyid ma lags 'du shes smon pa med pa nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ 'du
137a7('bum): shes smon pa med pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang 'du shes smon pa med pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes
137a8('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'du shes smon pa med do zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o// des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'du byed smon pa med do// 
137b1('bum): zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'du byed smon pa med pa nyid 'du byed smon pa med nyid kyis stong ste/ 'du byed smon pa med pa nyid kyi/ 
137b2('bum): stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang 'du byed smon pa med pa nyid ma lags/ 'du byed smon pa med pa nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ 'du byed smon pa med pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong/ 
137b3('bum): pa nyid kyang 'du byed smon pa med pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'du byed/ 
137b4('bum): smon pa med do zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o// des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa ra shes pa smon pa med do zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste/ 
137b5('bum): de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar NA/ ma par shes pa smon pa med pa nyid rnam par shes pa sna na pa med pa nyid kyis stong ste/ rnam par shes pa smon pa
137b6('bum): med pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang rnam par shes pa smon pa med pa nyid ma lags/ rnam par shes pa smon pa med pa nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ rnam par
137b7('bum): shes pa smon pa med pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa smon pa med pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
137b8('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam par shes pa smon pa med do zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
138a1('bum): pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs dben mo nas bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di
138a2('bum): ltar gzugs dben pa nyid gzugs dben pa nyid kyis stong ste/ gzugs dben pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang gzugs dben pa nyid ma lags/ gzugs dben pa nyid las gud na yang
138a3('bum): stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ gzugs dben pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzugs dben pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
138a4('bum): pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzu dgas dben no zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o// des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ tshor ba
138a5('bum): dben no zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i sla du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar tshor ba dang na pa nyid tshor ba dben pa nyid kyis stong ste/ tshor ba dben pa
138a6('bum): nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang tshor ba dben pa nyid ma lags/ tshor ba dben pa nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ tshor ba dben pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang tshom
138a7('bum): pa dben pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ tshor ba dben no zhes bgyi bar
138a8('bum): gnas par mi bgyi'o// des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'du shes dben mo zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste/ ngo ci'i slad du zhen/ bcom ldan 'das de ni
138b1('bum): 'di ltar 'du shes dben pa nyid 'du shes dben pa nyid kyis stong ste/ 'du shes dben pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang 'du shes dben pa nyid ma lags 'du shes dben pa nyid
138b2('bum): las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ 'du shes dben pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang 'du shes dben pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa'
138b3('bum): sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'du shes dben no zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o// nges shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'du
138b4('bum): byed dben no zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste/  slad du zhe na bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'a/ dbyed dben pa nyid 'du byed dben pa nyid kyis stong ste/ 'du byed
138b5('bum): dben pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang 'du byed de/ na pa nyid ma lags/ 'du byed dben pa nyid las su/ ngan yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ 'du byed dben pa nyid
138b6('bum): kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang 'du byed dben pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs nges na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
138b7('bum): che/  'du byed dben no zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o// des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam par shes pa dben no zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du
138b8('bum): zhen bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar rnam par shes pa dben pa nyid rnam par shes pa dben pa nyid kyis stong ste/ rnam par shes pa dben pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang rnam par
139a1('bum): shes pa dben pa ni dam lags/ rnam par shes pa ben pa nyid las su na sang myong pa da ma mchis te/ rnam par shes pa dben pa
139a2('bum): kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa dben pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
139a3('bum): spong ba'i / rnam par shes par per no zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
139a4('bum): de bzhin cid la gnas par mi ste/ de ci'i slang du zhen/ bcom ldan 'das ni 'di ltar de bzhin nyid de zhin nyid kyis stong ste/ de bzhin
139a5('bum): da gyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang de bzhin nyid ma lags de bzhin nyid las gung na yang stong pa nyid ma mchi tede bzhin nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin
139a6('bum): nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ de bzhin nyid la gnas par mi bgyi'o// 
139a7('bum): bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos nyid la gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe/ 
139a8('bum): bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar chos nyid chos nyid kyis stong ste/ chos nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang chos nyid ma lags/ chos nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis
139b1('bum): chos nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang chos nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
139b2('bum): chos nyid la gnas par mi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos kyi dbyangaso la gnas
139b3('bum): par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhen/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar chos kyi dbyings chos kyi dbyings kyis stong ste/ chos kyi dbyings kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang chos kyi
139b4('bum): dbyings ma lags/ chos kyi dbyings las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ chos kyi dbyings nyidadang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// bcom
139b5('bum): ldan 'das rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dang / 'a sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi/ na pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos kyi dbyings la gnas par mi
139b6('bum): bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos skyon med pa nyid la gnas par mi bgyi ste/ 
139b7('bum): de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar chos skyon med pa nyid chos skyon med pa nyid kyis stong ste/ chos skyon med pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang chos skyon med pa
139b8('bum): nyid ma lags/ chos skyon med pa nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ chos skyon med pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang chos skyon med pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das
140a1('bum): rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos skyon med pa nyid
140a2('bum): la gnas par mi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa'i mtha' la
140a3('bum): gnas par mi bgyi ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar yang dag pa'i mtha' yang dag pa'i mthas stong ste/ yang dag pa'i mtha'i stong pa nyid gang
140a4('bum): lags pa de yang yang dag pa'i mtha' ma legs yang dag pa'i mtha' las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchi/ sa te/ yang dag pa'i mtha' nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong/ 
140a5('bum): pa nyid kyang yang dag pa'i mtha'o// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
140a6('bum): pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnas par mi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe// 
140a7('bum): thabs mi mkhas pas/ bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis/ des gzugs la gnas na/ de gzugs mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi shes
140a8('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sa spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshethabs mi mkhas pas/ 
140b1('bum): bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis tshor ba la gnas na/ de tshor ba mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do// bcom ldan
140b2('bum): 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i
140b3('bum): yid kyis 'du shes la gnas na/ de 'du shes mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa'
140b4('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spro/ da pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis 'du byed
140b5('bum): la gnas na/ de 'du byed mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems
140b6('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ bdag tu bgyi bo dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis rnam par shes pa la gnas
140b7('bum): na/ de rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod pa'i byang chub
140b8('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu zin par mi 'gyur/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor la snyoms par 'jug par mi
141a1('bum): 'gyur te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu rdzogs par ma gyur par/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// 
141a2('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas
141a3('bum): pa'i yid kyis mig la gnas na/ de mig mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
141a4('bum): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ra ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis rna ba la gnas na/ de rna ba mngon
141a5('bum): par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sem sa dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
141a6('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ bdag tu bgyi ba dang / bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis sna la gnas na/ de sna mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes
141a7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ bdag
141a8('bum): tu bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis/ lce la gnas na/ de lce mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te/ 
141b1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ bdag tu bgyi ba dang / bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis lus
141b2('bum): la gnas na/ de lus mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi/ 
141b3('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis/ yid la gnas na/ de yid mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ 
141b4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do// de ci'i sla da du zhe na/ mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu
141b5('bum): phyin pa yongasu zin par mi 'gyur/ shes rab kyi pha rol/ tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor la snyoms par 'jug par mi 'gyurate/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasasu rdzogs par ma
141b6('bum): gyur par/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe// 
141b7('bum): thabs mi mkhas pas/ bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis gzugs la gnas na/ de gzugs mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha
141b8('bum): rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ bdag tu
142a1('bum): bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis sgra la gnas na/ de sgra mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
142a2('bum): mi spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ bdag tu bgyi ba dang
142a3('bum): bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis/ dri la gnas na/ de dri mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te/ 
142a4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi/ pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkha/ rnas pas/ bdag tu bgyi ba dang / bdag gir
142a5('bum): bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis ro la gnas na/ de ro mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes ra ba kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do// bcom ldan 'das
142a6('bum): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i
142a7('bum): yid kyis reg pa la gnas na/ de reg pa mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa'
142a8('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyi/ chos la
142b1('bum): gnas na/ de chos mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod pa'i byang chub sems
142b2('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu zin par mi 'gyur/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor la snyoms par 'jug par mi 'gyur te/ shes rab
142b3('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasasu rdzogs par ma gyur par/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
142b4('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thab sa mi mkhas pas/ bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis/ mig gi rnam par shes
142b5('bum): pa la gnas na/ de mig gi rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu/ phyin pa la mi spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub
142b6('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe// thabs mi mkhas pas/ bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis/ rna ba'i
142b7('bum): rnam par shes pa la gnas na/ de rna ba'i rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems
142b8('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis/ sna'i rnam par she
143a1('bum): pa la gnas na/ de sna'i rnam par shes pa mngon pas bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te
143a2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis
143a3('bum): lce'i rnam par shes pa la gnas na/ de lce'i rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang
143a4('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha ro// tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas debadag tu bgyi ba dang / bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yi
143a5('bum): kyis lus kyi rnam par shes pa la gnas na/ de lus kyi rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bgyi ba la smo kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do// 
143a6('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag gir
143a7('bum): bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa la gnas na/ de yid kyi rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod/ 
143a8('bum): do// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su zin par mi 'gyur/ shes rab
143b1('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor la snyoms par mi 'gyur te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par ma gyur par/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// 
143b2('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas
143b3('bum): pa'i yid kyis mig gi 'dus te reg pa la gnas na/ de mig gi 'dus te reg pa mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do// bcom ldan
143b4('bum): 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thab das mi mkhas pas/ bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba
143b5('bum): la gnas pa'i yid kyis rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la ga/ nas na/ de rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa mngon par 'du ba/ gyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod
143b6('bum): do rabacom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag gir/ 
143b7('bum): bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis sna'i 'dus te reg pa la gnas na/ de sna'i 'dus te reg pa mngon par 'a bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do// bcom
143b8('bum): ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhos pas/ bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas
144a1('bum): pa'i yid kyis/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa la gnas na/ de lce'i 'dus te reg pa mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod
144a2('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i cha/ thabs mi mkhas paso/ bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la
144a3('bum): gnas pa'i yid kyis/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa la gnas na/ de lus kyi 'dus te reg pa mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do// bcom ldan
144a4('bum): 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ babs mi mkhas pas/ bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi
144a5('bum): la gnas pa'i yid kyis yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la ga nas na/ de yid kyi 'dus te reg pa mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod// 
144a6('bum): de ci'i slad du zhe na/ mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu zin par mi 'gyur/ shes rab kyi pha
144a7('bum): rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor la snyoms par 'jug par mi 'gyur te/ shes rab kyi pha rol phyin pa yong su rdzogs par ma gyur par/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar mi 'gyur
144a8('bum): ro/ bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba/ 
144b1('bum): la gnas pa'i yid kyis/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la gnas na/ de mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi
144b2('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ bdag tu
144b3('bum): bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la gnas na/ de rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod
144b4('bum): kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs
144b5('bum): mi mkhas pas bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag giri bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la gnas na/ de sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i
144b6('bum): rkyen gyis tshor ba mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
144b7('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la gnas na/ de lce'i 'dus te/ 
144b8('bum): rig pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes/ 
145a1('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i / zags mi mkhas pas/ bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis/ lus kyi ru
145a2('bum): te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la gnas na/ de lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do// bcom ldan 'das
145a3('bum): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis/ yid kyis
145a4('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la gnas na/ de yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do// de ci'i
145a5('bum): slad du zhe na/ mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dang / 'a sems dpa' chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod/ su zin par mi 'gyur/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i
145a6('bum): rnal 'byor la snyoms par 'jug par mi 'gyur te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu rdzogs par ma gyur par/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// bcom
145a7('bum): ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid
145a8('bum): kyis sa'i khams la gnas na/ de sa'i khams mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
145b1('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe / thabs mi mkhas pas/ bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis chu'i khams la gnas na/ de chu'i khams mngon
145b2('bum): par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe
145b3('bum): thabs mi mkhas pas/ bdag tu bgyi ba dang / bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis/ me'i khams la gnas na/ de me'i khams mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes
145b4('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do// bcom ldan 'das ka/ rnal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes da rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas
145b5('bum): pas bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyi sa/ rlung gi khams la gnas na/ de rlung gi kha mas mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha
145b6('bum): rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ bdag tu bgyi ba dang
145b7('bum): bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis/ na mkha'i khams la gnas na/ de na mkha'i khams mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do// bcom
145b8('bum): ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis
146a1('bum): rnam par shes pa'i khams la gnas na/ de rnam par shes pa'i khams mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do// 
146a2('bum): de ci'i slad du zhe na/ mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu zin par mi 'gyur/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
146a3('bum): pa'i rnal 'byor la snyoms par 'jug par mi 'gyur te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par ma gyur par/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// bcom
146a4('bum): ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas
146a5('bum): pa'i yid kyis/ ma rig pa la gnas na/ de ma rig pa mdzan par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub se
146a6('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis/ 'du byed la gnas na/ de
146a7('bum): 'du byed mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
146a8('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ bdag tu bgyi ba dang / bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis/ rnam par shes pa la gnas na/ de rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bgyi/ 
146b1('bum): bal spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi
146b2('bum): mkhas pas/ bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis/ ming dang gzugs la gnas na/ de ming dang gzugs mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha
146b3('bum): rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas bdag tu bgyi
146b4('bum): pa dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis/ skye mche du drug la gnas na/ de skye mched drug mngon par 'a ra du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi
146b5('bum): spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la/ spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas bdag tu bgyi ba dang / 
146b6('bum): bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis/ reg pa la gnas na/ de reg pa mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do// bcom ldan 'das ga
146b7('bum): te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyi/ tshor ba la
146b8('bum): gnas na/ de tshor ba mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
147a1('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas bdag tubagyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis/ sred pa la gnas na/ 
147a2('bum): de sred pa mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
147a3('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis/ len pa la gnas na/ de len pa mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab
147a4('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas
147a5('bum): bdag tu bgyi ba dang / bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yi da kyis/ srid pa la gnas na/ de srid pa mngon/ par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
147a6('bum): la mi spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ bdag tu bgyi ba dang / bdag gi
147a7('bum): bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis/ skye ba la gnas na/ de smra ba mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems
147a8('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs ma mkhas pas/ bdag tu bgyi ba dang / bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis/ rga shi la gnas ma
147b1('bum): rga shi mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni/ 
147b2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasasu zin par mi 'gyur/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor la snyoms par 'jug par mi 'gyur te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs
147b3('bum): par ma gyur par/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
147b4('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas na/ de sbyin pa'i pha/ 
147b5('bum): rol tu phyin pa mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes/ rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
147b6('bum): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ bdag tu bgyi ba dong bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
147b7('bum): gnas na de tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par 'du bgyi ba la la spyod kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems
147b8('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ bdag tu bgyi ba dang / bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis/ bzod
148a1('bum): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas na/ de bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyad/ 
148a2('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gonas
148a3('bum): pa'i yid kyis/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas na/ de brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do// 
148a4('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems da dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas bdag tu bgyi ba dang / bdag gi
148a5('bum): bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis/ bsam gtan gyi rol tu phyin pa la gnas na/ de bsam gtan gyipha rol tu phyin pa mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab
148a6('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rolatu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ bdag
148a7('bum): tu bgyi ba dang / bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas na/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab
148a8('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasasu zin par mi
148b1('bum): 'gyur/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor la snyoms par 'jug par mi 'gyur te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yong su rdzogs par ma gyur par/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du/ 
148b2('bum): 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po nyi shu lnga pa// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems
148b3('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mo mkhas pas/ bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis/ nod stong pa nyid la
148b4('bum): la gnas na/ de nang stong pa nyid mngon par 'dubagyi ba spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod ngo // bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa'
148b5('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod/ kho'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas bdag tu bgyi ba dang / bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid
148b6('bum): kyis phyi stong pa nyid la gnas na/ de phyi stong pa nyid mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems
148b7('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis phyi nang stong
148b8('bum): pa nyid la gnas na/ de phyi nang stong pa nyid mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems
149a1('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas
149a2('bum): pa'i yid kyis/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la gnas na/ de stong pa nyid stong pa nyid mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do// bcom ldan
149a3('bum): 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas/ 
149a4('bum): pa'i yid kyis/ chen po stong pa nyid la gnas na/ de chen po stong pa nyid mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do// 
149a5('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dang / 'a chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe// thabs mi mkhas pas/ bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag
149a6('bum): gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis don dam pa stong pa nyid la gnas na/ de don dam pa stong pa nyid mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi// 
149a7('bum): spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gral te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ bdag tu bgyi ba
149a8('bum): dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid la gnas na/ de 'dus byas stong pa nyid mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
149b1('bum): la mi spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i cha thabs mi mkhas pas/ bdag tu bgyid
149b2('bum): dang bdog gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la gnas na/ de 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
149b3('bum): phyin pa la mi spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ bdag
149b4('bum): tu bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la gnas na dnge mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mngon par 'du bgyib la
149b5('bum): spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' se/ mas dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
149b6('bum): tshothabs mi mkhas pas/ bdag tu bgyi ba dang / bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la gnas na/ de thog ma dang tha ma med
149b7('bum): pa stong pa nyid mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
149b8('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la gnas na/ de dor ba med pa
150a1('bum): stong pa nyid mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa'
150a2('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis/ rang bzhin stong pa
150a3('bum): nyid la gnas na/ de rang bzhin stong pa nyid mngon por 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa'
150a4('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag giri bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis
150a5('bum): chos thams cad stong pa nyid la gnas na// de chos tham sa cad stong pa nyid mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do// bcom
150a6('bum): ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la
150a7('bum): gnas pa'i yid kyis/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la gnas na/ de rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do// 
150a8('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mo mkhas pas// bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la spyod
150b1('bum): kyis mi dmigs pa stong nyid la gnas na/ de mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te/ 
150b2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhos pas/ bdag tu bgyi ba dang / bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis/ dngos
150b3('bum): po med pa stong pa nyid la gnas na/ de dngos po med pa stong pa nyid mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa'
150b4('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag dgir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid lagan
150b5('bum): na/ de ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do// bcom lda na 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ 
150b6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ bdag tu bgyi ba dang / bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la gnas na/ de dngos
150b7('bum): po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do// da ci'i slad du zhe na/ mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod pa'i byang chub sems
150b8('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su zin par mi 'gyur/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor la snyoms par 'jug par mi 'gyur te/ 
151a1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par ma gyur par/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das
151a2('bum): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i
151a3('bum): yid kyis/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la gnas na/ de dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyad/ 
151a4('bum): de ci'i slad du zhe na/ mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su zin par mi 'gyur
151a5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor la snyoms par 'jug par mi 'gyur te/ shes rab kyi pha ro// la tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par ma gyur par/ rnam
151a6('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe
151a7('bum): thabs mi mkhas pas/ bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis/ yang dag par spong ba rnams la gnas na/ de yang dag par spong ba rnams
151a8('bum): mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems
151b1('bum): dpa' chen pos ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su zin par mi 'gyur/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor la snyoms par 'jug par mi 'gyur te/ shes rab
151b2('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par ma gyur par/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
151b3('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ bdag tu bgyi ba dang / bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis/ rdzu 'phral gyi
151b4('bum): rkang pa rnams la gnas na/ de rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnam nas mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab da kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 
151b5('bum): mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' se mas dpa' chen pos ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol/ tu phyin pa yongs su zin par mi 'gyur/ shes rab
151b6('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor la snyoms par 'jug par mi 'gyur te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par ma gyur par rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
151b7('bum): du 'byung bar mi 'gyuraro// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ bdag
151b8('bum): tu bgyi ba dang / bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis dbang po rnams la gnas na/ de dbang po rnams mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha/ 
152a1('bum): kyi rol tu phyin pa la mi spyad nga/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
152a2('bum): ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su zin par mi 'gyur/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor la snyoms par 'jug par mi 'gyur te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
152a3('bum): yongs su rdzogs par ma gyur par rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
152a4('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis/ stobs rnams la gnas na/ de stobs
152a5('bum): rnams mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi shes ra/ ba kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do// de ci'i slad / du zhe na/ mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod pa'i byang chub sems
152a6('bum): sems dpa' chen pos ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su zin par mi 'gyur/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor la snyoms par 'jug par mi 'gyur te/ shes
152a7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par ma gyur par/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
152a8('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs ma mkhas pas/ bdag tu bgyi ba dang / bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams
152b1('bum): la gnas na de byang chub kyi yan lag rnams mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod pa'i/ 
152b2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su zin par mi 'gyur/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor la snyoms par 'jug par
152b3('bum): mi 'gyur te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzo gas par ma gyur par/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang
152b4('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha ro// la tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas/ pas/ bdag tu bgyi ba dang / bdag gir bgyi ba
152b5('bum): la gnas pa'i yid kyis/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la gnas na/ de 'phags pa'i lam la ga brgyad pa mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab
152b6('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
152b7('bum): yongs su zin par mi 'gyur/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor la snyoms par 'jug par mi 'gyur te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par ma gyur par
152b8('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs
153a1('bum): mi mkhas pas/ bdag tu bgyi ba dang / bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la gnas na
153a2('bum): de 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod pa'i
153a3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su zin par mi 'gyur/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phan pa'i rnal 'byor la snyoms par 'jug par
153a4('bum): mi 'gyur te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par ma gyur par/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// bcom ldan
153a5('bum): 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thab sa mi mkhas pas/ bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag gir
153a6('bum): bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis/ bsam gtan rnams la gnas na/ de bsam gtan rnams mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do// 
153a7('bum): de ci'i slad du zhe na/ mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su zin par mi 'gyur/ shes
153a8('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor la snyoms par 'jug por mi 'gyur te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par ma gyur par/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du/ 
153b1('bum): 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ bdag
153b2('bum): tu bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis tshad med pa rnams la gnas na/ de tshad med pa rnams mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
153b3('bum): pa la mi spyod do// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su zin
153b4('bum): par mi 'gyur/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor la snyoms par 'jug par mi 'gyur te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par ma gyur par
153b5('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
153b6('bum): pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la gnas na/ de gzugs
153b7('bum): med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do// de ci'i sladadu zhe na/ mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod pa'i byang
153b8('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasasu zin par mi 'gyur/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor la snyoms par 'jug par
154a1('bum): mi 'gyur te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par ma gyur par/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar mi 'gyur// 
154a2('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mikhas pas bdag tu bgyi ba dang / bdag gir
154a3('bum): bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis rnam par thar pa brgyad la gnas na/ de rnam par thar pa brgyad mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do// / 
154a4('bum): de ci'i slad du zhe na/ mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su zin par mi
154a5('bum): 'gyur/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byoral snyoms par 'jug par mi 'gyur te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par ma gyur par
154a6('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i cha
154a7('bum): thabs mi mkhas pas/ bdag tu bgyi ba dang / bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la gnas na/ de mthar
154a8('bum): gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do// de ci'i slad du ne na/ mngon par 'du bgyi ba la
154b1('bum): spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su zin par mi 'gyur/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor la snyoms par
154b2('bum): 'jug par mi 'gyur te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par ma gyur par/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das gal
154b3('bum): te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid
154b4('bum): kyis rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan dam med pa dang / smon pa med pa la gnas na/ de rnam dpar thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang // 
154b5('bum): smon pa med pa mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod pa'i byang chub sems
154b6('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su zin par mi 'gyur/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor la snyoms par 'jug par mi 'gyur te/ shes
154b7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par ma gyur par/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
154b8('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ bdag tu bgyi ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis/ mngon par shes pa rnams la
155a1('bum): gnas na/ de mngon par shes pa rnams mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ mngon
155a2('bum): par 'du bgyi ba la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su zin par mi 'gyur/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor la
155a3('bum): snyoms par 'jug par mi 'gyur te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par ma gyur par/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// bcom ldan
155a4('bum): 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sha sa rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mo mkhas pas/ bdag tu bgyi ba dang / bdag gir
155a5('bum): bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis ting nge 'dzin rnams la gnas na de ting nge 'dzin rnams mngon par 'du/ bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi
155a6('bum): spyod do// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su zin par mi 'gyur/ shes
155a7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor la snyoms par 'jug par mi 'gyur te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par ma gyur par/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du
155a8('bum): 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ bdag tu bgyi
155b1('bum): ba dang bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams la gnas na/ de gzungs kyi sgo rnams mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do// 
155b2('bum): de ci'i slad du zhe na/ mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su zin par mi 'gyur/ shes rab kyi
155b3('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor la snyoms par 'jug par mi 'gyur te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par ma gyur par/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung
155b4('bum): bar mi 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ bdag
155b5('bum): tu bgyi ba dang / bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la gnas na/ de de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu mngon par 'du
155b6('bum): bgyi ba la spyod kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni/ shes
155b7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su zin par mi 'gyur/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor la snyoms par 'jug par mi 'gyur te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs
155b8('bum): par ma gyur par/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
156a1('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas bdag tu bgyi ba dang / bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi lags
156a2('bum): na/ de mi 'jigs pa bzhi mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod pa'i byang chub sems
156a3('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su zin par mi 'gyur/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor la snyoms par 'jug par mi 'gyur te/ 
156a4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par ma gyur pa dar/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub
156a5('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi na pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas bdag tu bgyi ba dang / bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas
156a6('bum): pa'i yid kyis so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la gnas na de so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do// de
156a7('bum): ci'i slad du zhe na/ mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su zin par mi 'gyur/ shes rab kyi pha
156a8('bum): rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor la snyoms par 'jug par mi 'gyur te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par ma gyur/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// bcom
156b1('bum): ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas bdag tu bgyi ba dang / bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i mid
156b2('bum): kyis snying rje chen po la gnas na/ de snying rje chen po mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ mngon par 'du bgyi ba la
156b3('bum): spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su zin par mi 'gyur/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor la snyoms par 'jug par mi 'gyu
156b4('bum): to/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasasu rdzogs par ma gyur dpar/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar da mi 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems
156b5('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la smra/ da pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas bdag tu bgyi dang / bdag gi pib la gnas pa'i yid kyis/ sangs
156b6('bum): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la gnas na/ de sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do// de ci'i
156b7('bum): slad du zhe na/ mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su zin par mi 'gyur/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
156b8('bum): pa'i rnal 'byor la snyoms par 'jug par mi 'gyur te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasasu rdzogs par ma gyur par/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// bcom
157a1('bum): ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas bdag tu bgyi ba dang
157a2('bum): bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la gnas na/ de rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi
157a3('bum): spyod do// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu zin par mi 'gyur// shes rab
157a4('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor la snyoms par 'jug par mi 'gyur te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasasu rdzog das par ma gyur par/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du
157a5('bum): 'byung bar mi 'gyuraro// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas bdag
157a6('bum): tu bgyi ba dang / bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la gnas na/ de lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi
157a7('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasasu zin par
157a8('bum): mi 'gyur/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor la snyoms par 'jug par mi 'gyur te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yong su rdzogs par ma gyur par/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
157b1('bum): nyid du 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas bdag tu bgyi ba dang
157b2('bum): bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis/ phyir mi 'ongs pa'i 'bras bu la gnas na/ de'i phyir mi 'ongs pa'i 'bras bu mngon por 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
157b3('bum): la mi spyod do// de ci'i slad du rte na/ mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yong su zin par mi 'gyuraro// 
157b4('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor la snyoms par 'jug pa dar mi 'gyur te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu rdzogs par ma gyur par/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
157b5('bum): nyid du 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das gal te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ 
157b6('bum): bdag tu bgyi ba dang / bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis/ dgra bcom pa nyid la gnas na/ de dgra bcom pa nyid mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi
157b7('bum): spyod do// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu zin par mi 'gyur/ shes rab
157b8('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor la snyoms par 'jug par mi 'gyur te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par ma gyur par/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar mi 'gyuraro// bcom
158a1('bum): ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas bdag tu bgyi ba dang / bdag
158a2('bum): gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis rang byang chub la gnas na/ de rang byang chub mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 
158a3('bum): mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu zin par mi 'gyur/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor la
158a4('bum): snyoms par 'jug par mi 'gyur te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasasu rdzogs par ma gyur par/ rnam pa tha thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// bcom
158a5('bum): ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs/ mi mkhas pas bdag tu bgyi ba dang / bdag gir bgyi
158a6('bum): la gnas pa'i yid kyis/ thams cad shes pa nyid la gnas na// de thams cad shes pa nyid mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do// de ci'i slad
158a7('bum): zhen mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasasu zin par mi 'gyur/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor
158a8('bum): la snyoms par 'jug par mi 'gyur to// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par ma gyur par/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das
158b1('bum): gal te byang chub sems dpa' dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas bdag tu bgyi ba dang / bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis/ lam
158b2('bum): gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la gnas na de lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ mngon par
158b3('bum): 'du bgyi bal spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su zin par mi 'gyur/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor la
158b4('bum): snyoms par 'jug par mi 'gyur te/ shes rab kyi pha rol/ tu phyin pa yong su rdzogs par ma gyur par rnam dpa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// bcom
