195b3('bum): med cing mi dmigs so// yang dag par spong ba rnams med cing mi dmigs so// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams med cing mi dmigs so// dbang po rnams med cing mi
195b4('bum): dmigs so// stobs rnams med cing mi dmigs so// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams med cing mi dmi dgas so// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa
195b5('bum): med cing mi dmig so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu nang / stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang

195b7('bum): med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa
195b8('bum): nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi med cing mi dmigs so// bsam
196a1('bum): gtan rnams med cing mi dmigs so// tshad med pa rnams med cing mi dmigs so// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams/ 
196a2('bum): med cing mi dmigs so// rnam par thar pa brgyad med cing mi dmigs so// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu med cing mi dmigs so// rnam par thar pa'i sgo sto
196a3('bum): pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa med cing mi dmig so// mngon par shes pa rnams med cing mi dmigs so// ting nge 'dzin rnams med cing mi dmag
196a4('bum): so// gzungs kyi sgo rnams med cing mi dmigs so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams med cingami dmig so// mi 'jigs pa bzhi med cing mi dmigs
196a5('bum): so/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams med cing mi dmigs/ so// snying rje chen po med cing mi dmigs so// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams med cing mi dmigs
196a6('bum): so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa

196b1('bum): med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu med cing mi
196b2('bum): dmigs so// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu med cing mi dmigs so// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu med cing mi dmigs so// dgra zi tsom pa nyid med cing mi dmigs so//

197b2('bum): stong pa nyid med cing mi dmig so// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dmig su med pa'i phyir 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid med cing mi dmigs so// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dmig su med pa'i
197b3('bum): phyir mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid med cing mi dmigaso// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dmig su med pa'i phyir thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid med cing mi dmig so// dor ba med pa
197b4('bum): stong pa nyid dmig su med pa'i phyir dor ba med pa stong pa nyid med cing mi dmigs so// rang bzhin stong pa nyid dmig su med pa'i phyir rang bzhin stong pa nyid med cing mi dmigs
197b5('bum): so'achos thams cad stong pa nyid dmigasu med pa'i phyir cho sa thams cad stong pa nyid med cing mi dmig so// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dmig su med pa'i phyir rang gi
197b6('bum): mtshan nyid stong pa nyid med cing mi dmig so// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid med cing mi dmig so// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dmigs su
197b7('bum): med pa'i phyir dngos po med pa stong pa nyid med cing mi dmig so// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid med cing mi dmigaso// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
197b8('bum): dmigs su med pa'i phyir dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid med cing mi dmigs so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
198a1('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te de ltar rtog cing sems pa dang / de ltar rtog cing sems pa'i tshe/ sems num pa med cing yongs su zhum pa med
198a2('bum): mi 'jigs mi sdang skrag par mi 'gyur na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral bar shes par bya'o// smras pa tshe dang ldan pa
198a3('bum): rab 'byor ci'i phyir ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral bar shes par bya/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa
198a4('bum): ti'i bu gzugs ni gzugs kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta
198a5('bum): ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// tshor ba ni tshor ba'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa'// sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe
198a6('bum): yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// 'du shes ni 'du shes kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
198a7('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// 'du byed ni 'du byed kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
198a8('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu sheso// rnam par shes pa rnams ni rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
198b1('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu mig ni mig gi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang

198b5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi/ pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba/ bzhin du rab tu shes so// lus ni lus kyi rang bzhin dang
198b6('bum): bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// yid ni yid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste// 
198b7('bum): de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzugs ni gzugs/ 
198b8('bum): kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// sgra ni sgra'i rang bzhin
199a1('bum): dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so//

199a5('bum): ma bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe ga yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// tshe dang ldan pa
199a6('bum): sha ra dwa ti'i bu mig gi rnam par shes pa ni mig gi rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe
199a7('bum): yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ni rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
199a8('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// sna'i rnam par shes pa ni sna'i rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems
199b1('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsheyang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// lce'i rnam par shes pa ni lce'i rnam par shes pa'i rang

199b5('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu
199b6('bum): mig gi 'dus te reg pa ni mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba s+ho/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag
199b7('bum): paji lta ba bzhin du rab shes so// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
199b8('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// sna'i 'dus te reg pa ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub
200a1('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du ba tu shes so// 
200a2('bum): lce'i 'dus te reg pa ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag
200a3('bum): pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
200a4('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dgad pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin dang / 
200a5('bum): bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dang / 'chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe// yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes
200a6('bum): so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ da byang chub sems
200a7('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni rna
200a8('bum): ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa
200b1('bum): ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa'
200b2('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni lce'i 'dus te/ 
200b3('bum): reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba
200b4('bum): bzhin du rab tu shes so// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rgyan gyis tshor ba ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen sa tshor ba'i ring bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang
200b5('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// yid kyi 'dus te/ 
200b6('bum): reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
200b7('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu sa'i khams ni sa'i khams kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub
200b8('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// chu'i khams ni chu'i khams kyi rang bzhin
201a1('bum): dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe yang dag pa ji ba bzhin
201a2('bum): du rab tu shes so// me'i khams ni me'i khams kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe
201a3('bum): yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// rlung gi khams ni rlung gi khams kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
201a4('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba/ bzhin du rab tu shes so// na mkha'i kha dmas ni na mkha'i khams kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ 
201a5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yangadag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// rnam par
201a6('bum): shes pa'i khams ni rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang
201a7('bum): dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu ma rig pa ni ma rig pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
201a8('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// 'du byed ni 'du byed kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems
201b1('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ 
201b2('bum): de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// ming dang gzugs ni ming dang
201b3('bum): gzugs kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu
201b4('bum): shes so// skye mched drug ni skye mched drug gi rang ba bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sem sa dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
201b5('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// reg pa ni reg pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems
201b6('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// tshor ba ni tshor ba'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub
201b7('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// sred pa ni sred pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ 
201b8('bum): de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// len pa ni len pa'i rang bzhin
202a1('bum): dang bral bste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa dziH
202a2('bum): ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// srid pa ni srid pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i cha
202a3('bum): yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// skye ba ni skye ba'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
202a4('bum): la spyod pa'i tsheyang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du ra tu shes so// rga sha ni rga shi'i rang bzhin dang / dbral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems
202a5('bum): dpa'i chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra da ti'i bu sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
202a6('bum): ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'oyang dag pa
202a7('bum): ji ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems
202a8('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang
202b1('bum): bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// brtson
202b2('bum): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
202b3('bum): tsheyang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub
202b4('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhi// na du rab tu shes so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
202b5('bum): pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang
202b6('bum): dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu nang stong pa nyid ni nang stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
202b7('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// phyi stong pa nyid ni phyi stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang
202b8('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// phyi nang stong pa nyid ni phyi nang stong pa nyid
203a1('bum): kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang
203a2('bum): dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
203a3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// chen po stong pa nyid ni chen po stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang
203a4('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// don dam pa stong pa
203a5('bum): nyid ni don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag
203a6('bum): pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// 'dus byas stong pa nyid ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
203a7('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang
203a8('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni mtha'
203b1('bum): las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin
203b2('bum): durab tu shes so// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ni thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
203b3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ni dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang / 
203b4('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin/ du rab tu shes so// rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin
203b5('bum): stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub se mas dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin
203b6('bum): du rab tu shes so// chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
203b7('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub
203b8('bum): sems dpa'o sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ni mi dmigs pa
204a1('bum): stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag/ 
204a2('bum): pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ni dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
204a3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub
204a4('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid/ 
204a5('bum): ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen/ po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag
204a6('bum): pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems
204a7('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// yang dag par spong ba bzhi ni yang dag par spong ba'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste// 
204a8('bum): de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi ni rdzu 'phrul gyi
204b1('bum): rkang pa bzhi'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste// de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// dbang / 
204b2('bum): de lnga ni dbang po'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// 
204b3('bum): stobs lnga ni stobs kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu sheso// 
204b4('bum): byang chub kyi yan lag bdun ni byang chub kyi yan lag gi rang ba bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sem sa dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 
204b5('bum): yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub
204b6('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi ni 'phags pa'i bden
204b7('bum): pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// bsam
204b8('bum): gtan bzhi ni bsam gtan gyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba
205a1('bum): bzhin du rab tu shes so// tshad med pa bzhi ni tshad med pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
205a2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi ni gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug
205a3('bum): pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// 
205a4('bum): rnam par thar pa brgyad ni rnam par thar pa'i rang bzhin dang / bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
205a5('bum): tsheyang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ni/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i rang
205a6('bum): bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsheyang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// rnam
205a7('bum): par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i rang
205a8('bum): bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// 
205b1('bum): mngon par shes pa rnams ni mngon par shes pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang
205b2('bum): dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// ting nge 'dzin rnams ni ting nge 'dzin gyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
205b3('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i cha/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni gzungs kyi sgo'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems
205b4('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/ dal spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du/ rab tu shes so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
205b5('bum): ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chu na po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang
205b6('bum): dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// mi 'jigs pa bzhi ni mi 'jigs pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
205b7('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ni so so yang dag par rig pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub
205b8('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// byams pa chen po ni byams pa chen po'i rang bzhin
206a1('bum): dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe yang dag pa
206a2('bum): lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// snying rje chen po ni snying rje chen po'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
206a3('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba
206a4('bum): stede byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'o tshe// da yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// tshe dang
206a5('bum): ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
206a6('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin
206a7('bum): dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe// yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// phyir/ 
206a8('bum): mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spod ba'i tshe/ yang
206b1('bum): dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// dgra bcom pa nyid ni dgra bcom pa nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
206b2('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod de'i tshe yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// rang byang chub ni rang byang chub kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa'
206b3('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid
206b4('bum): kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub semasar dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi ngan pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du
206b5('bum): rab tu shes so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rang bzhin/ dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems
206b6('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i ched/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin nyid ni de bzhin nyid kyi rang
206b7('bum): bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// 
206b8('bum): ma nor ba de bzhin nyid ni ma nor ba de bzhin nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang
207a1('bum): dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid ni gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ 
207a2('bum): de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// chos nyid ni chos nyid kyi
207a3('bum): rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// 
207a4('bum): chos kyi dbyings ni chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin dang bral da ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dang / da' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe// 
207a5('bum): yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// chos kyi gnas nyid ni chos kyi gnas nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bra la ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
207a6('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// chos skyon med pa nyid ni chos skyon med pa nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba
207a7('bum): ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag po ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// yang dag pa'i mtha'
207a8('bum): ni yang dag pa'i mtha' yi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba
207b1('bum): bzhin du rab tu shes so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral bar shes par bya'o// 
207b2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa// bam po nyi shu brgyad pa/ smras pa tshe dang ldan pa
207b3('bum): rab 'byor gzugs kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta butshor ba'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ 'du shes kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ 'du byed kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ rnam par
207b4('bum): shes pa'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu mig gi rang ba ni dan ni ji lta bu/ rna ba'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ sna'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ lce'i rang bzhin ni ji lta
207b5('bum): bu lus kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ yid kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ gzugs kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ sgra'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ dri'i rang bzhin
207b6('bum): ni ji lta bu/ ro'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ reg gi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ chos kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ mig gi rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ rna ba'i
207b7('bum): rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin ni ji lta busna'i rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ lce'i rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i
207b8('bum): rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu// 
208a1('bum): sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin ni
208a2('bum): ji lta bu yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor
208a3('bum): ba'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu lus kyi
208a4('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tsher ba'i rang ba zhin ni ji lta bu/ sa'i khams kyi rang bzhin ni ji
208a5('bum): lta bu chu'i khams kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu me'i khams kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu rlung gi khams kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ na mkha'i
208a6('bum): khams kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ ma rig pa'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ 'du byed kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ rnam par
208a7('bum): shes pa'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ ming dang gzugs kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ skye mched drug gi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ reg pa'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ tshor ba'i rang bzhin ni ji
208a8('bum): lta bu sred pa'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ len pa'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ srid pa'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ skye ba'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ rga shi'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ sbyin
208b1('bum): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin ni ste bu/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin ni dzil bu bapyod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin ts+tsha bu/ brtson 'grus kyi/ 
208b2('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ dang stong pa nyid kyi rang
208b3('bum): bzhin ni ji lta buphyi stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta buphyi nang stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin no ji lta bustong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ chen po stong pa
208b4('bum): nyid kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi/ rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyirang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi
208b5('bum): rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid da kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ dor ba med pa
208b6('bum): stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin
208b7('bum): ni ji lta bu/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ dngos po med
208b8('bum): pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ rdzu 'phral gyi rkang pa
209a1('bum): rnams kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ dbang po rnams kyi rang bzhin ni dzi lta bu/ stobs rnams kyi rang bzhin ni hrIm+b+ha bu/ byang chub kyi yan
209a2('bum): lag rnams kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyud pa'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ bsam gtan
209a3('bum): rnams kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ tshad med pa rnams kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ rnam par thar pa
209a4('bum): rnams kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ mthar gyis gnas pa nga'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma
209a5('bum): med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ mngon par shes pa rnams kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ gzungs
209a6('bum): kyi sgo rnams kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ mi 'jigs pa rnams kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ so so yang dag
209a7('bum): par rig pa rnams kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ byams pa chen po'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ snying rje chen po'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
209a8('bum): rnams kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin ni ji lta ba/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras
209b1('bum): bu'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ dgra bcom pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ rang byang chub kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni dzim+b+ha bu
209b2('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu de bzhin nyid kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ ma nor ba de bzhin nyid kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ gzhan ma yin pa de
209b3('bum): bzhin nyid kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ chos nyid kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ chos kyi gnas nyid kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ chos
209b4('bum): skyon med pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ yang dag dpa'i mtha'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ rab 'byoragyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa tI'i bu gzug
209b5('bum): kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// tshor ba'i rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// 'du shes kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// 'du byed kyi rang
209b6('bum): bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// mig gi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// rna ba'i rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// 
209b7('bum): sna'i rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// lce'i rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// lus kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// yid kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// gzugs
209b8('bum): kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// sgra'i rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// dri'i rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// ro'i rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// reg gi rang
210a1('bum): bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// chos kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// mig gi rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// 
210a2('bum): rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// sna'i rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// lce'i rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin ni dngos po med
210a3('bum): pa'o// lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin
210a4('bum): ni dngos po med pa'o// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rang de bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// sna'i 'dus te/ reg pa'i rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// lce'i 'dus
210a5('bum): te reg pa'i rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// 
210a6('bum): mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// sna'i 'dus te
210a7('bum): reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// lca'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i
210a8('bum): rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tsher ba'i rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// sa'i khams kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med
210b1('bum): pa'o// chu'i khams kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// me'i khams kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// rlung gi khams kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// 
210b2('bum): na mkha'i khams kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// ma rig pa'i rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// 'du
210b3('bum): byed kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// ming dang gzugs kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// skye mched
210b4('bum): drug gi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// rag pa'i rang ba bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// tshor ba'i rang bzhi na ni dngos po med pa'o// sred pa'i rang bzhin ni dngos
210b5('bum): po med de'o// len pa'i rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// srid pa'i rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// skye ba'i rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// 
210b6('bum): rga shi'i rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// sbyin da'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// tshul khrims kyi phyi rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// 
210b7('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i
210b8('bum): rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// nang stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// phyi stong pa nyid kyi
211a1('bum): rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni dngos
211a2('bum): po med pa'o// chen po stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni dngos/ 
211a3('bum): po med pa'o// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// thog ma dang tha ma
211a4('bum): med pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni dngos
211a5('bum): po med pa'o// chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi rang ba/ zhe na ni dngos po med pa'o// rang gi mtshan nyid/ stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// mi dmig
211a6('bum): pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// dngos
211a7('bum): po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi rang bzhin
211a8('bum): ni dngos po med pa'o// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// dbang po rnams kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// stobs rnams kyi rang bzhin ni/ 
211b1('bum): dngos po med pa'o// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// lam gyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi rang
211b2('bum): bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// bsam gtan rnams kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// tshad med pa rnams kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par
211b3('bum): 'jug pa rnams kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// rnam par thar pa rnams kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i rang bzhin ni
211b4('bum): dngos po med pa'o// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med dpa rnams kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// mngon
211b5('bum): par shes pa rnams kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// 
211b6('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// mi 'jigs pa rnams kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi rang
211b7('bum): bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// byams pa chen po'i rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// snying rje chen po'i rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams
211b8('bum): kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// phyir mi/ 
212a1('bum): 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// dgra bcom pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// rang byang chub kyi rang bzhin ni dngos
212a2('bum): po med pa'o// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// de bzhin nyid kyi rang
212a3('bum): bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// ma nor ba de bzhin nyid kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// chos nyid kyi rang
212a4('bum): bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// chos kyi gnas nyid kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// chos skyon med pa
212a5('bum): rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// yang dag pa'i ma tha'i rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na 'di ltar gzugs la
212a6('bum): gzugs kyi rang bzhin med pa dang / tshor ba la tshor ba'i rang bzhin med pa dang / 'du shes la 'du shes kyi rang bzhin med pa dang / 'du byed la 'du byed kyi rang bzhin med pa dang // 
212a7('bum): rnam par shes pa la rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang / mig la mig gi rang bzhin med pa dang / rna ba la rna ba'i rang bzhin med pa dang / sna la sna'i rang bzhin med pa dang / 
212a8('bum): lce la lce'i rang bzhin med pa dang / lus la lus kyi rang bzhin med pa dang yid la yid kyi rang bzhin med pa dang / gzugs la gzugs kyi rang bzhin med pa dang / sgra la
212b1('bum): dang bzhin med pa dang / dri rang bzhin med pa dang rol rang bzhin med pa dang / reg la reg gi rang bzhin med pa dang / chom mtshas kyi nga bzhin med pa dang / 
212b2('bum): mig gi rnam par shes pas mig gi rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes bral na pa'i rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang / snga rnam par
212b3('bum): shes pa la sna'i rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa la lce'i rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa la lus kyi
212b4('bum): rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang / yid kyi rnam/ par shes pa la yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa la mig gi 'dus te/ 
212b5('bum): rig pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa larna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa la sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin med pa
212b6('bum): dang lce'i 'dus te reg pa la lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg
212b7('bum): pa la yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rgyan gyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin med pa dang rna ba'i 'dus te
212b8('bum): rig pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin med pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tsher
213a1('bum): pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin med pa dang / lus
213a2('bum): kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyi tshor ba'i rang bzhin med pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
213a3('bum): gyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin med pa dang / sa'i khams la sa'i khams kyi rang bzhin med pa dang / chu'i khams la chu'i khams kyi rang bzhin med pa dang / me'i khams la me'i
213a4('bum): khams kyi rang bzhin med pa dang / rlung gi khams la rlung gi khams kyi rang bzhin med pa dang / na mkha'i khams la na mkha'i khams kyi rang bzhin med pa dang / rnam
213a5('bum): par shes pa'i khams la rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin med pa dang / ma rig pa la ma rig pa'i rang / bzhin med pa dang / 'du byed la 'du byed kyi rang bzhin
213a6('bum): med pa dang / rnam par shes pa la rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang / ming dang gzugs la ming dang gzugs kyi rang bzhin med pa dang / skye mched drug la skye mched drug gi rang
213a7('bum): bzhin med pa dang / reg pa la reg pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang / tshor ba la tshor ba'i rang bzhin med pa dang / sred pa la sred pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang / len pa la len pa'i rang bzhin med pa
213a8('bum): dang 'a srid pa la srid pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang / skye ba la skye ba'i rang bzhin med pa dang / rga shi la rga shi'i rang bzhin med pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i
213b1('bum): rang bzhin med pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la tshul khrim kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin med/ 
213b2('bum): pa dang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang
213b3('bum): bzhin med pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang / nang stong pa nyid la nang stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin med pa dang / phyi stong
213b4('bum): pa nyid la phyi stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin med pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid la phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin med pa dang /  stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin
213b5('bum): med pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid la chen po stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin med pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid la don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin med pa dang / 'dus
213b6('bum): byas stong pa nyid la 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin med pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin med pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid
213b7('bum): la mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin med pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin med pa dang / dor ba med pa stong pa
213b8('bum): nyid la dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin med pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid la rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin med pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid la chos thams cad stong
214a1('bum): pa nyid kyi rang bzhin med pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin med pa dang / mi dmigs pa stong
214a2('bum): pa nyid la mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin med pa dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin med pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la ngo bo nyid sto// 
214a3('bum): pa nyid kyi rang bzhin med pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin med pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la dran pa nye
214a4('bum): bar gzhag pa rnams kyi rang bzhin med pa dang / yang / dag par spong ba rnams la yang dag par stong pa'i rang bzhi don med pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la rdzu 'phrul gyi
214a5('bum): rkang pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang / dbang po rnams la dbang po'i rang bzhin med pa dang / stobs rnams la stobs kyi rang bzhin med pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la
214a6('bum): byang chub kyi yan lag gi rang bzhin med pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la 'a'agra pa'i la yan lag brgyad pa'i rang ba na sas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la 'phags pa'i bden pa'i rang / 
214a7('bum): bzhin med pa dang / bsam gtan rnams la bsam gtan gyi rang bzhin med pa dang / tshad med pa rnams la tshad med pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
214a8('bum): rnams la gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad la rnam par thar pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms
214b1('bum): par 'dug par dgul mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgra stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la rnam par bya
214b2('bum): pa'i sgo'i rang bzhin med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams la mngon par shes pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams la ting nge 'dzin gyi rang bzhin med pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo
214b3('bum): rnams la gzungs kyi sgo'i rang bzhin med pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs kyi rang bzhin med pa dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi la mi 'jigs pa'i
214b4('bum): rang bzhin med pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa pa zhil so so yang dag par rig pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang / snying rje chen po la snying rje chen po'i rang bzhin med pa dang
214b5('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang / rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i rang
214b6('bum): bzhin med pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin med pa dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin
214b7('bum): med pa dang / dgra bcom pa nyid la dgra bcom pa nyid kyi rang bzhin med pa dang / rang byang chub la rang byang chub kyi rang bzhin med pa dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la lam gyi
214b8('bum): rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi rang bzhin med pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rnam po thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rang bzhin med pa dang / de bzhin nyid la de bzhin nyid kyi rang
214b9('bum): byams/ chen po la byams// chen po rang bzhin med pa dang / 
215a1('bum): bzhin med pa dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid la ma nor ba de bzhin nyid kyi rang bzhin med pa dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid la gzhan ma yin pa
215a2('bum): de bzhin nyid kyi rang bzhin med pa dang / chos nyid la chos nyid kyi rang bzhin med pa dang / chos kyi dbyings la chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin med pa dang / chos kyi gnas nyid la chos
215a3('bum): kyi gnas nyid kyi rang bzhin med pa dang / chos skyon med pa nyid la chos skyon med pa nyid kyi rang bzhin med pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' la yang dag pa'i mtha'i rang bzhin med par
215a4('bum): shes par bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan ya dang gzugs la gzugs kyi mtshan nyid med do// detshor ba la tshor ba'i mtshan nyid med do// 'du shes la 'du
215a5('bum): shes kyi mtshan nyid med do// 'du byed la 'du byed kyi mtshan nyid med do// rnam par shes pa la rnam par she sa pa'i mtshan nyid med do// mig la mig gi mtshan nyid
215a6('bum): med do// rna ba la rna ba'i mtshan nyid med do// sna la sna'i mtshan nyid med do// lce la lce'i mtshan nyid med do// lus la lus kyi mtshan nyid med do// yid la yid kyi mtshan nyid med
215a7('bum): do/ gzugs la gzugs kyi mtshan nyid medo// sgra la sgra'i mtshan nyid med do// dril dri'i mtshan nyid med do// rol ro'i mtshan nyid med do// reg la reg gi mtshan nyid med
215a8('bum): do 'chos la chos kyi mtshan nyid med do// mig gi rnam par shes pa la mig gi rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid med do// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i mtshan
215b1('bum): nyid med do// sna'i rnam par shes pa la sna'i rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid med do// lce'i rnam par shes pa la lce'i rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid med do// lus kyi rnam par shes
215b2('bum): pa la lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid med do// yid kyi rnam par shes pa la yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid med do// mig gi 'dus te reg pa la mig gi 'dus te reg
215b3('bum): pa'i mtshan nyid med// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i mtshan nyid med do// sna'i 'dus te reg pa la sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i mtshan nyid med do// lce'i 'dus te reg pa la
215b4('bum): lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i mtshan nyid med do// lus kyi 'dus te/ reg pa la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i mtshan nyid med do// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la yid kyi 'dus te
215b5('bum): reg pa'i mtshan nyid med do// mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rgyu na gyis tshor ba la mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i mtshan nyid med do// rna ba'i 'dus te reg
215b6('bum): pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i mtshan nyid med do// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i mtshan
215b7('bum): nyid med do// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i mtshan nyid med do// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la lus kyi 'dus te reg
215b8('bum): pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i mtshan nyid med// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i mtshan nyid med do// sa'i khams la sa'i khams kyi mtshan nyid
216a1('bum): med do// chu'i khams la chu'i khams kyi mtshan nyid med do// me'i khams la me'i khams kyi mtshan nyid med do// rlung gi khams la rlung gi khams kyi
216a2('bum): mtshan nyid med do// nam mkha'i khams la na mkha'i khams kyi mtshan nyid med do// rnam par shes pa'i khams la rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi mtshan nyid med do// ma rig pa la ma
216a3('bum): rig pa'i mtshan nyid med do// 'du byed la 'du byed kyi mtshan nyid med do// rnam par shes pa la rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid med do// ming dang gzugs la ming dang gzugs kyi
216a4('bum): mtshan nyid med do// skye mched drug la skye mched drug gi mtshan nyid med do// reg pa la reg pa'i mtshan nyid med do// tshor ba la tshor ba'i mtshan nyid med do// sred
216a5('bum): pa la sred pa'i mtshan nyid med do// len pa la len pa'i ma tshan nyid med do// srid pa la srid pa'i mtshan nyid med do// skye ba la skye ba'i mtshan nyid med do// rga shi la
216a6('bum): rga shi'i mtshan nyid med do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan nyid med do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i
216a7('bum): mtshan nyid med do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan nyid med do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i
216a8('bum): mtshan nyid med do// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan nyid med do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
216b1('bum): ba'i mtshan nyid med do// nang stong pa nyid la nang stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid med do// phyi stong pa nyid la phyi stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid med do// phyi nang stong pa nyid la phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi mtshan
216b2('bum): nyid med do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid med do// chen po stong pa nyid la chen po stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid med do// don dam pa stong pa nyid la
216b3('bum): don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid med do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid la 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid med do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi mtshan
216b4('bum): nyid med do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la mtha/ da' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid med do// / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la thog ma dang tha ma med
216b5('bum): pabastong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid med do// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid medado// rang bzhin stong pa nyid la rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi
216b6('bum): mtshan nyid med do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid la chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid med do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi mtshan
216b7('bum): nyid med do// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid med do// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid med do// ngo bo
216b8('bum): nyid stong pa nyid la ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid med do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid med do// dran pa nye bar
217a1('bum): gzhag pa rnams la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi mtshan nyid med do// yang dag par spong ba rnams la yang dag par spong ba'i mtshan nyid med do// 
217a2('bum): rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi mtshan nyid med do// dbang po rnams la dbang po'i mtshan nyid med do// stobs rnams la stobs kyi mtshan nyid med do// /

217a5('bum): pa'i mtshan nyid med do// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par/ 'jug pa rnams la gzugs med pa'i snyoms/ par 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid med do// rnam par thar
217a6('bum): pa rnams la rnam par thar pa'i mtshan nyid med do// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid med do// 
217a7('bum): rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i mtshan
217a8('bum): nyid med do// mngon par shes pa rnams la mngon par shes pa'i mtshan nyid med do// ting nge 'dzin rnams la ting nge 'dzin gyi mtshan nyid med do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams
217b1('bum): la gzungs kyi sgo'i mtshan nyid med do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i mtshan nyid med do// mi 'jigs pa bzhi la mi 'jigs
217b2('bum): pa bzhi'i mtshan nyid med do// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la so so yang dag par rig pa'i mtshan nyid med do// byams pa chen po la byams pa chen po'i mtshan nyid med do// 
217b3('bum): snying rje chen po la snying rje chen po'i mtshan nyid med do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i mtshan nyid med do// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras
217b4('bum): bu la rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i mtshan nyid med do// de lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la lan cig/ phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i mtshan nyid med do// phyir mi 'ong
217b5('bum): ba'i 'bras bu la phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i mtshan nyid med do// dgra bcom pa nyid la dgra bcom pa nyid kyi ma tshan nyid med do// rang byang chub la rang byang chub kyi mtshan
217b6('bum): nyid med do// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid
217b7('bum): med do// de bzhin nyid la de bzhin nyid kyi mtshan nyid med do// ma nor ba de bzhin nyid lam nor ba de bzhin nyid kyi mtshan nyid med do// gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid la gzhan ma yin pa
217b8('bum): de bzhin nyid kyi mtshan nyid med do// chos nyid la chos nyid kyi mtshan nyid med do// chos kyi dbyings kyi mtshan nyid med do// chos kyi gnas nyid la chos kyi gnas nyid kyi
218a1('bum): mtshan nyid med do// chos skyon med pa nyid la chos skyon med pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid med do// yang dag pa'i mtha' la yang dag pa'i mtha'i mtshan nyid
218a2('bum): med do// mtshan nyid la yang mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhin med do// mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhin la yang mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhin med do// smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub sems
218a3('bum): dpa' sems dang 'a chen po gang bslab pa 'di la slob pa de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha rang
218a4('bum): ti'i bu de de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' semangs dpa' chen po gang bslab pa 'di la slob pa de ni na dam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 
218a5('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ni 'di ltar chos thams cad ma skyes ma byung ba'iphyir ro// smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor
218a6('bum): ji ltar na chos thams cad ma skyes ma byung ba yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzugs gzugs kyi stong ste/ de la skye ba yang mi dmigs
218a7('bum): 'byung ba yang mi dmigaso// tshor ba tsher rabs stong ste/ de la skye ba yang mi dmigs 'byung ba yang mi dmig so// 'du shes 'du shes kyis stong ste/ de la skye ba yang
218a8('bum): mi dmigs 'byung ba yang mi dmigs so// 'du byed 'du byed kyis stong ste/ de la skye ba yang mi dmigs 'byung ba yang mi dmigs so// rnam par shes pa rnam par
218b1('bum): shes pas stong ste/ de la skye ba yang mi dmigs 'byung ba yang mi dmigs so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu mig mig gis stong ste/ de la skye ba yang mi dmigs 'byung ba yang mi
218b2('bum): dmigs so// rna ba rnabs stong ste/ de la skye ba yang mi dmigs 'byung ba yang mi dmigs so// sna snas stong ste/ de la skye ba yang mi dmigs 'byung ba yang mi dmig so// 
218b3('bum): lce lces stong ste/ de la skye ba yang mi dmigs 'byung ba yang mi dmigs so// lus lus kyis stong ste/ de la skye ba yang mi dmigs 'byung ba yang mi dmigs so// yid
218b4('bum): yid kyi stong ste/ de la skye ba yang mi dmigs 'byung ba yang mi dmigs so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzugs gzugs kyis stong ste/ de la skye ba
218b5('bum): yang mi dmigs 'byung ba yang mi dmigs so// sgra sgras stong ste/ de la skye ba yang mi dmigs 'byung ba yang mi dmigs so// dri dris stong ste
218b6('bum): de la skye ba yang mi dmigs 'byung ba yang mi dmigs so// ro res stong ste/ de la skye ba yang mi dmigs 'byung ba yang mi dmigs so// reg reg gis stong ste/ de la skye ba
218b7('bum): yang mi dmigs 'byung ba yang mi dmigs so// chos chos kyis stong ste/ de la skye ba yang mi dmigs 'byung ba yang mi dmigs so// tshe dang ldan pa shar gA la mig gi rnam
218b8('bum): par shes pa mig gi rnam par shes pas stong ste/ de la skye ba yang mi dmigaso 'byung ba yang mi dmigs so// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa rna ba'i rnam par shes pas
219a1('bum): stong ste/ de la skye ba yang mi dmigs 'byung ba yang mi dmigs so// sna'i rnam par shes pa sna'i rnam par shes pas stong ste/ de la skye ba yang / 
219a2('bum): mi dmigs 'byung ba yang mi dmigs so// lce'i rnam par shes pa lce'i rnam par shes pas stong ste/ de la skye ba yang mi dmigs 'byung ba yang mi dmigs so// lus kyi rnam
219a3('bum): par shes pa lus kyi rnam par shes pa stong ste/ de la skye ba yang mi dmigs 'byung ba yang mi dmigs so// yid kyi rnam par shes pa yid kyi rnam par shes pas stong ste/ de la skye ba yang/ 
219a4('bum): mi dmigs 'byung ba yang mi dmigs so// cha dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu mig gi 'dus te reg pa mig gi 'dus te reg pas stong ste/ de la skye ba yang mi dmigs
219a5('bum): 'byung ba yang mi dmigs so// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa rna ba'i 'dus te reg pas stong ste/ de la skye ba ya nga mi dmigs 'byung ba yang mi dmig so// sna'i 'dus
219a6('bum): te reg pa sna'i 'dus te reg pas stong ste/ de la skye ba yang mi dmigs 'byung ba yang mi dmigs so// lce'i 'dus te reg pa lce'i 'dus te reg pas stong ste/ de la skye ba yang mi
219a7('bum): dmigs 'byung ba yang mi dmigaso// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa lus kyi 'dus te reg pas stong ste/ de la skye ba yang mi dmigs 'byung ba yang mi dmigs so// yid kyi 'dus
219a8('bum): tereg pa yid kyi 'dus te reg pas stong ste/ de la skye ba yang mi dmigs 'byung ba yang mi dmigs so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis

226b6('bum): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ 'du shes ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la
226b7('bum): spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ 'du shes dben
226b8('bum): zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas/ 
227a1('bum): pas/ 'du shes mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
227a2('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas 'du byed rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te
227a3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe thabs mi mkhas pas/ 'du byed mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la
227a4('bum): spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dadapa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin dpal spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas
227a5('bum): 'du byed bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sa/ mas dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
227a6('bum): spyod pa'i tshe thabs mi mkhas pas 'du byed sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems
227a7('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ 'du bye bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan
227a8('bum): 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dang chen shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas 'du byed bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan
227b1('bum): spang / bcom ldan 'das gas te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la snong ba'i thabs mim khas bsu 'du byed
227b2('bum): kyib spyon pa na la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gsu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa chen gyi gas rab la chom su phyin pa sa snang ba
227b3('bum): mkhas pasadu byed sa nags bgyi bar spyod namachen ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'i chen po gos rab kyi pha chol tu phyin
227b4('bum): spyod pa'in/ 'angs mamakhas pas/ dubyed ben zhes bgyi bar skyed na mtshan ma la sdung / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa
227b5('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi rol tu phyin pa ts+tsha / thabs mi mdzes pas 'du mi dben nis bgyi bar stong na mtshan ma la spyod do// 
227b6('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshithabs mi mkhas pas rnam par shes pa rtag
227b7('bum): ces bkye bar spyod na mtshon ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshethabs
227b8('bum): mam sa rnam par shes ri mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod namatshan ma'i srung ngo // bcom ldan 'das gapa byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen pa shes
228a1('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe thabs mi mkhas pas/ rnam par shes pa bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// 
228a2('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes
228a3('bum): bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas
228a4('bum): pas/ rnam par shes pa bdag ces bgyi bar spyod namatshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal/ te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
228a5('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rnam par shes pa bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das
228a6('bum): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ rnam par shes ba zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod nam
228a7('bum): ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ rnam
228a8('bum): par shes pa ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spod pa'i
228b1('bum): babs mi mkhas pas/ rnam par shes pa dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gapa te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
228b2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ rnam par shes pa mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te
228b3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ mig rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom
228b4('bum): ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che dan po shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas paso// mig mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod

228b6('bum): pas mig bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe

228b8('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ mig bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems

229b7('bum): bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po she pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/

233a1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ gzugs rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom

233a7('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ gzugs bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan
233a8('bum): 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ gzugs zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la
233b1('bum): nga ngo // bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ gzugs ma ni nas bgyib
233b2('bum): spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ gzugs
233b3('bum): dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkha
233b4('bum): pas/ gzugs mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma ngal spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub se dmas dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
233b5('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ sgra rtag rtse sa bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
233b6('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ sgra mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems
233b7('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ sgra ba do zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshaname la spyod do// bcom ldan
233b8('bum): 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ sgra sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan
234a1('bum): ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe thabs/ 
234a2('bum): mi mkhas pas/ sgra bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
234a3('bum): pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas sgra bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
234a4('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pa das/ sgra ni zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma le spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems
234a5('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas sgram zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// 
234a6('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ sgra dben zhes bgyi bar spyod
234a7('bum): na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ sgra
234a8('bum): mi dben nas bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs
234b1('bum): mi mkhas pas dri rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod// 
234b2('bum): pa'i tshe thabs mi mkhas pas/ dri mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
234b3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas dri bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems
234b4('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin/ dpal spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas dri sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// / 
234b5('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spro dpa'i tshe/ zabs mi mkhas pas dri bdag
234b6('bum): ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi
234b7('bum): mkhas pas/ dri bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
234b8('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ dri zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
235a1('bum): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ dri ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom
235a2('bum): ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ dri dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na
235a3('bum): mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas
235a4('bum): dri mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// dbacom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dang dang sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
235a5('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ ro rtog ces pa gyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
235a6('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ ro mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang
235a7('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ ro bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom
235a8('bum): ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ ro sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod
