240b1('bum): zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi
240b2('bum): mkhas pas/ lce'i rnam par shes pa mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
240b3('bum): pastong phrag brgya pa/ bam po sum cu pa// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs
240b4('bum): mi mkhas pas/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa rtag ces pa dgyi bar spyod na mtshon ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa'o sems dpa' chen/ 
240b5('bum): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas lus kyi rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// 
240b6('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa bde
240b7('bum): zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi
240b8('bum): mkhas pas/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
241a1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na
241a2('bum): mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ lus kyi rnam
241a3('bum): par shes pa bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod/ 
241a4('bum): pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ lus kyi rnam par she ngas bzhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// dbacom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems
241a5('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom
241a6('bum): ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa dben zhes
241a7('bum): bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas
241a8('bum): pas lus kyi rnam par shes pa mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod pa ni lung bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
241b1('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ thebs mi ma khas pas/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems
241b2('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// 
241b3('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas/ yid kyi rnam par shes
241b4('bum): pa bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bco ma ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' som/ sa dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
241b5('bum): tshe thabs mi mkhas pas/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtsha na ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub
241b6('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na
241b7('bum): mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ 
241b8('bum): yid kyi rnam par shes pa bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
242a1('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ yid kyi rnam par shes ba zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan
242a2('bum): 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa ma zhi zhes
242a3('bum): bgyi bar spyod ni mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas
242a4('bum): pas/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa dben zhes bgyi bar spro/ ngan mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
242a5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi rme/ khas pas yid kyi rnam par shes pa mi dben nos bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom
242a6('bum): ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ mig gi 'dus te rig pa rtag
242a7('bum): ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi
242a8('bum): mkhas pas/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshon ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
242b1('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang

242b5('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa bdag med ces bgyi khor spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal

246a8('bum): mi mkhas pas/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
246b1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsha/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das
246b2('bum): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na/ 
246b3('bum): mtshan mo la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas
246b4('bum): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod/ na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das ga te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
246b5('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe thabs mi ma khas pas/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom
246b6('bum): ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa bdag
246b7('bum): med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs
246b8('bum): mi mkhas pas/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ni zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
247a1('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na
247a2('bum): mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas
247a3('bum): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
247a4('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod ngan mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal
247a5('bum): te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs/ mi mkhas pas mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
247a6('bum): gyis tshor ba rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
247a7('bum): tshwa thabs mi mkhas pas/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems
247a8('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan
247b1('bum): ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ mig
247b2('bum): gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
247b3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// 
247b4('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sem se dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol phyin pa la spyod pa/ 'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ mig gi 'dus
247b5('bum): te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bdag med ces bgyi bar spro da na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
247b6('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tsher bzhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das
247b7('bum): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma
247b8('bum): zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs
248a1('bum): mi mkhas pas/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal
248a2('bum): te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tsher ba mi dben
248a3('bum): zhes bya gyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas
248a4('bum): pas rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rtagaces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
248a5('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa 'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan
248a6('bum): ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ rna ba'i
248a7('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tsher ba bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
248a8('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom
248b1('bum): ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
248b2('bum): tshor ba bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
248b3('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te
248b4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes ra/ rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
248b5('bum): gyis tshor bzhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
248b6('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bam zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub
248b7('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dben zhes bgyi
248b8('bum): bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi ma ngas
249a1('bum): pas rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub
249a2('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis cher ba rtag ces bgyi bar spyod
249a3('bum): na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas
249a4('bum): sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi rtag ces bgyi// bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
249a5('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa 'i rkyen gyis tsher ba bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la
249a6('bum): spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ sna'i 'dus te
249a7('bum): reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
249a8('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bdag ces bgyi spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang
249b1('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bdag med ces bgyi bar
249b2('bum): spyod na mtshan ma la spyod/ bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ sna'i 'das te
249b3('bum): reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
249b4('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe / thabs mi mkhas pas/ sna'i nga 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal
249b5('bum): de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe// thabs mi ma khas pas/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba
249b6('bum): dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe// thabs
249b7('bum): mi mkhas pas/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tsher ba mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
249b8('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// 
250a1('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
250a2('bum): pas thabs mi mkhas pas/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom lda 'das gal te byang chub sems
250a3('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na
250a4('bum): mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes// rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas
250a5('bum): pas lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tsher ba sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems
250a6('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ lha'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// 
250a7('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba
250a8('bum): bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi
250b1('bum): mkhas pas/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
250b2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe thabs mi mkhas pas/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das
250b3('bum): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dben zhes
250b4('bum): bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan pa ngas gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i cha
250b5('bum): thabs mi mkhas pas lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub
250b6('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rtag ces bgyi bar
250b7('bum): spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas
250b8('bum): lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
251a1('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan
251a2('bum): ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ lus kyi 'dus
251a3('bum): te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
251a4('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bdag/ ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom
251a5('bum): ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ lus kyi 'dus te reg
251a6('bum): pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
251a7('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bzhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub
251a8('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma zhi zhes bgyi bar
251b1('bum): spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas
251b2('bum): lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi// 
251b3('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ zabs mi mkhas pas/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan
251b4('bum): 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pod shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas yid kyi 'dus te reg
251b5('bum): pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
251b6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// 
251b7('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ yid kyi 'dus te
251b8('bum): reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu/ 
252a1('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la
252a2('bum): spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ yid kyi
252a3('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
252a4('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bdag me dad ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom
252a5('bum): ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che na po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
252a6('bum): tshor bzhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi
252a7('bum): mkhas pas/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
252a8('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal
252b1('bum): te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi dben zhes bgyi
252b2('bum): bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas
252b3('bum): bas sa'i khams rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
252b4('bum): chethabs mi mkhas pas/ sa'i khams mi rtag ce sa bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom nga ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
252b5('bum): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ sa'i khams bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan
252b6('bum): 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ sa'i khams sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na
252b7('bum): mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ sa'i
252b8('bum): khams bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe
253a1('bum): thabs mi mkhas pas/ sa'i khams bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa'
253a2('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas sa'i khams zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal
253a3('bum): te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ sa'i khams ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// 
253a4('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa 'a chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa nga'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ sa'i khams
253a5('bum): dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// btso/ ma ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' se mas dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
253a6('bum): tshe thabs mi mkhas pas/ sa'i khams mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
253a7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ chu'i khams rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub
253a8('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ chu'i khams mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// 
253b1('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas chu'i khams bde zhes bgyi
253b2('bum): bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas
253b3('bum): pasachu'i khams sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la sbed do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
253b4('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ chu'i khams bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub
253b5('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i chathabs mi mkhas pas/ chu'i khams bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod
253b6('bum): namatshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas
253b7('bum): chu'i khams ni zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 
253b8('bum): thabs mi mkhas pas/ chu'i khams ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
254a1('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ chu'i khams dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom
254a2('bum): ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ chu'i khams mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na
254a3('bum): mtshan la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ zabs mi mkhas pas/ me'i
254a4('bum): khams rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa'asems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
254a5('bum): pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas mo'i khams mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems
254a6('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ me'i khams bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyong ngo // bcom ldan 'das gal
254a7('bum): te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ me'i khams sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan
254a8('bum): ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas me'i
254b1('bum): khams bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe
254b2('bum): thazabs mi mkhas pas/ ma'i khams bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
254b3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ mo'i khams zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal
254b4('bum): te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab/ kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs// mi mkhas pas/ me'i khams ma zhi zhes bgyi bar
254b5('bum): spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po she sa rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi
254b6('bum): mkhas pas/ me'i khams dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
254b7('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ me'i khams mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems
254b8('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ rlung gi khams rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// 
255a1('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ 
255a2('bum): rlung gi khams mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
255a3('bum): nga'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ rlung gi khams bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
255a4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ rlung gi khams sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom
255a5('bum): ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che/ na po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ rlung gi khams
255a6('bum): bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs
255a7('bum): mi mkhas pas/ rlung gi khams bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la sbed do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
255a8('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rlung gi khams zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa'
255b1('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ rlung gi khams ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan
255b2('bum): 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ rlung gi khams dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na/ 
255b3('bum): mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ rlung
255b4('bum): gi khams mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod/ 
255b5('bum): pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ na mkha'i kha mas rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod// do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa'
255b6('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ na mkha'i khams mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom
255b7('bum): ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ nam mkha'i khams bde zhes bgyi bar
255b8('bum): spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi khas pas/ nam mkha'i
256a1('bum): khams sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
256a2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas na mkha'i khams bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te
256a3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ na mkha'i khams bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan

256a5('bum): na mkha'i khams zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod// / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
256a6('bum): byin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ na mkha'i khams ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa'
256a7('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ na mkha'i khams dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan
256a8('bum): 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ na mkha'i khams mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod/ 
256b1('bum): namatshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spang ba la spyod pa'i tshe thabs mi mkhas pas/ rnam
256b2('bum): par shes pa'i khams rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe
256b3('bum): thabs mi mkhas pas rnam par shes pa'i khams mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
256b4('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi kha sa pas rnam par shes pa'i khams bde/ zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom
256b5('bum): ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'achen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod thabs mi mkhas pas/ rnam par shes
256b6('bum): pa'i khams sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
256b7('bum): pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ rnam par shes pa'i khams bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa'
256b8('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ rnam par shes pa'i khams bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la
257a1('bum): spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa
257a2('bum): thabs mi mkhas pas rnam par shes pa'i khams zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshon ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
257a3('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe thabs mi mkhas pas/ rnam par shes pa'i khams ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod ni mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom
257a4('bum): ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mo mkhas pas/ rnam par shes pa'i
257a5('bum): khams dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa'asems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
257a6('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ rnam par shes pa'i khams mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// // shes rab
257a7('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa// bam po sum cu gcig pa// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
257a8('bum): la spyod pa'otshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ ma rig pa rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa
257b1('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas ma rig pa mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te
257b2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe// thabs mi mkhas paso// ma rig pa bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la
257b3('bum): spyod de// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ ma rig pa
257b4('bum): sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
257b5('bum): pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas ma rig pa ba dag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa'
257b6('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ ma rig pa bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// 
257b7('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ ma rig pa zhi zhes bgyi bar/ 
257b8('bum): spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas
258a1('bum): pas ma rig pa ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
258a2('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ ma rig pa de ben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das
258a3('bum): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas// ma rig pa mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na
258a4('bum): mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te bya/ ngang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi
258a5('bum): mkhas pas/ 'du byed rtag ces bgyi bar spyod/ na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
258a6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ 'du byed mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems
258a7('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ 'du byed bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan
258a8('bum): 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ 'du byed sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod
258b1('bum): namatshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ 'du
258b2('bum): byed bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs
258b3('bum): mi mkhas pas/ 'du byed bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
258b4('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe// thabs mi mkhas pas 'du byed zho zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la sprod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems
258b5('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin/ pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ 'du byed ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// 
258b6('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ 'du byed dben zhes bgyi
258b7('bum): bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe// thabs mi mkhas pas/ 
258b8('bum): 'du byed mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na ya spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe
259a1('bum): thabs mi mkhas pas/ rnam par shes pa rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gas
259a2('bum): te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod/ 
259a3('bum): namatshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe thabs mi mkhas pas/ 
259a4('bum): rnam par shes pa bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan dam la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chu rab sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
259a5('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes khar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan
259a6('bum): 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i che / thabs mo mkhas pas rnam par shes pa bdag ces brgya
259a7('bum): bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas
259a8('bum): pas rnam par shes pa dag sagyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
259b1('bum): pal spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems
259b2('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas paso/ rnam par shes pa ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshon ma la spyod do// bcom
259b3('bum): ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ rnam par shes pa dben
259b4('bum): zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sem ngas dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par
259b5('bum): che thabs mi mkhas pas/ rnam par shes pa mi/ dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems
259b6('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rlabs mi mkhas pas/ ming dang gzugs rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyad do// bcom ldan
259b7('bum): 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshethabs mi mkhas pas ming dang gzugs mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod
259b8('bum): namatshan ma la spyod de// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'itshethabs mi mkhas pas
260a1('bum): ming dang gzugs bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
260a2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ ming dang gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal
260a3('bum): te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ ming dang gzugs bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan
260a4('bum): malo spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshethabs ma mkhas
260a5('bum): pas ming dang gzugs bdag med ces bgyi bar smra ngan mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
260a6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ ming dang gzugs ni zhes bgyi spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems
260a7('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ babs mi mkhas pas/ mr-ing dang gzugs ma zhi nas bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyong ngo // 
260a8('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas ming dang gzugs dben
260b1('bum): zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe thabs
260b2('bum): mi mkhas pas/ ming dang gzugs mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
260b3('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ skye mched drug rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sem
260b4('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/ dal spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pasaskye mched drug mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la
260b5('bum): spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas
260b6('bum): skye mched drug bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe
260b7('bum): thabs mi mkhas pas/ skye mched drug sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
260b8('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i cha/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ skye mched drug bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te/ 
261a1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshi thabs mi mkhas pas skye mched/ 
261a2('bum): drug bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe
261a3('bum): thabs mi mkhas pas skye mched drug ni zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
261a4('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas thos skye mchod drug mu ni zhes bgyi bar spyod na de mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te
261a5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi/ pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs pa sa pas/ skye mched drug dben nis bgyi bar spyod
261a6('bum): namatshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gar te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas skye mchod
261a7('bum): drug mi dben gos bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe
261a8('bum): babs mi mkhas pas/ reg pa rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha ro
261b1('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ reg pa mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems
261b2('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ reg pa bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das
261b3('bum): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ reg po sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na/ 
261b4('bum): mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab dkyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas
261b5('bum): pas reg pa bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma/ la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
261b6('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ reg pa bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod la nga rgya pa bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
261b7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ reg pa zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems
261b8('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ reg pa ma ni zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das
262a1('bum): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ reg pa dben
262a2('bum): zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 
262a3('bum): thabs mi mkhas pas/ reg pa mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol/

262b6('bum): thabs mi mkhas pas/ tshor ba dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab

267a6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal
267a7('bum): te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dben zhes bgyi bar spyod
267a8('bum): na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ sprin
267b1('bum): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
267b2('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems
267b3('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan
267b4('bum): ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha da rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ 
267b5('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bde zhes bgyi bar spyod/ na mtshan ma la spyod// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
267b6('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub
267b7('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma
267b8('bum): la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol
268a1('bum): tu phyin pa bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
268a2('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems
268a3('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyodado// bcom
268a4('bum): ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che na po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thab ngas mi mkhas pas/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben
268a5('bum): zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan/ 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs
268a6('bum): mi mkhas pas/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
268a7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub
268a8('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe// thabs mi mkhas pas// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod/ 
268b1('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bde zhes bgyi
268b2('bum): bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ 
268b3('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
268b4('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtsha na ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems
268b5('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi na pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na
268b6('bum): mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ bzod pa'i pha rol
268b7('bum): tu phyin pa zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas
268b8('bum): pasar bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha ro phyin pa la spyod
269a1('bum): pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems
269a2('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom
269a3('bum): ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rtag ces
269a4('bum): bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'a/ das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi
269a5('bum): mkhas pas/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi rta/ ga ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
269a6('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das
269a7('bum): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sdug bsngal zhes bgyi
269a8('bum): bar spod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas// 
269b1('bum): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes kyi pha rol

269b5('bum): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes kyi pha rol

270a2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang
270a3('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod// /

270b1('bum): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin

270b5('bum): pas/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'

271a6('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//

272a3('bum): bsang nang stong pa nyid zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe//

273a5('bum): stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' se/ mas dpa'o chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod

273a7('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ phyi nang stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub
273a8('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i cha/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ phyi nang stong pa nyid bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// 
273b1('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ phyi nang stong pa nyid bdag med ces
