273b3('bum): pas phyi nang stong pa nyid zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
273b4('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ phyi nad stong pa nyid ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spro/ dad do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems
273b5('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas phyi nang stong pa nyid dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la
273b6('bum): spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ phyi nang stong pa nyid
273b7('bum): mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs
273b8('bum): mi mkhas pas/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
274a1('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe thabs mi mkhas pas/ stong pa nyid stong nyid mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// 
274a2('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid bde zhes bgyi
274a3('bum): bar spod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas// 
274a4('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod/ don mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
274a5('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas stong pa nyid stong pa nyid bdag ces bgyi ba ra spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal
274a6('bum): te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod
274a7('bum): na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ stong pa
274a8('bum): nyid stong pa nyid zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 
274b1('bum): thabs mi mkhas pas/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi/ 
274b2('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa'
274b3('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom
274b4('bum): ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ chen po stong pa nyid rtag ces
274b5('bum): bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan// 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi
274b6('bum): mkhas pas/ chen po stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
274b7('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ chen po stong pa nyid bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
274b8('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ chen po stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te
275a1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas / chen po stong pa nyid bdag ces bgyi
275a2('bum): par spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ chen po
275a3('bum): stong pa nyid bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 
275a4('bum): thabs mi mkhas pas/ chen po stong pa nyid zhi zhes bgyi par spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
275a5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi ma khas pas/ chen po stong pa nyid ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod // bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub
275a6('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ chen po stong pa nyid dben zhes pa gyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod// bcom ldan
275a7('bum): 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ chen po stong pa nyid mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtsha// 
275a8('bum): ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ don dam pa stong pa nyid rtag
275b1('bum): ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ 
275b2('bum): don dam pa stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
275b3('bum): pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ don dam pa stong pa nyid bdo zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
275b4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ don dam pa stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhe/ sa bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das
275b5('bum): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thab sa mi mkhas pas/ don dam pa stong pa nyid bdag ces bgyi
275b6('bum): bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ don dam
275b7('bum): pa stong pa nyid bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
275b8('bum): thabs mi mkhas pas/ don dam pa stong pa nyid zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
276a1('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ don dam pa stong pa nyid ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan
276a2('bum): 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ don dam pa stong pa nyid dben zhes bgyi bar spyod
276a3('bum): na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ don dam
276a4('bum): pa stong pa nyid mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// // shes rab kyi pha/ rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po sum cu
276a5('bum): gnyis pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dang che shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ 'dus byas stong
276a6('bum): pa nyid rtag ces bgyi bar spod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 
276a7('bum): thabs mi mkhas pas/ 'das byas stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
276a8('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems da'
276b1('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom
276b2('bum): ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid bdag ces bgyi
276b3('bum): bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas
276b4('bum): 'dus byas stong pa nyid bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na ma tshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chu dab sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
276b5('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems
276b6('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom
276b7('bum): ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid dben zhes bgyi bar
276b8('bum): spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ 'dus byas stong pa
277a1('bum): nyid mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
277a2('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ 'das sa byas stong pa nyid rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
277a3('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom
277a4('bum): ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dang 'a chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i / thabs mi mkhas pas/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid bde/ 
277a5('bum): zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom lda na 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs
277a6('bum): mi mkhas pas 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
277a7('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub
277a8('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma ma
277b1('bum): spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe thabs mi mkhas pas/ 'dus ma byas stong pa
277b2('bum): nyid zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs
277b3('bum): mi mkhas pas/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
277b4('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas dpas// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dben zhes bgyi ba dar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te
277b5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes ra ba kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi ma khas pas/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid mi dben zhes bgyi
277b6('bum): bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ 
277b7('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
277b8('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ babs mi mkhas pas/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems
278a1('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod/ 
278a2('bum): do bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid
278a3('bum): sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi
278a4('bum): mkhas pas/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom lda na 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
278a5('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// / 
278a6('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid zhi zhes bgyi
278a7('bum): bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ mtha' lnga
278a8('bum): 'das pa stong pa nyid ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 
278b1('bum): thabs mi mkhas pas/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
278b2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang
278b3('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan
278b4('bum): ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sa mas dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ thog
278b5('bum): ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod/ na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
278b6('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub
278b7('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na
278b8('bum): mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ zabs mi mkhas pas/ thog ma dang tha ma
279a1('bum): med pa stong pa nyid bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
279a2('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang
279a3('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chen shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan
279a4('bum): ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub semasadapa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi/ ngan pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ thog ma dang
279a5('bum): tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
279a6('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa'
279a7('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom
279a8('bum): ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid rtag ces bgyi bar
279b1('bum): spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ ngor
279b2('bum): ba med pa stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
279b3('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems
279b4('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma
279b5('bum): la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ dor ba
279b6('bum): med pa stong pa nyid bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe// 
279b7('bum): thabs mi mkhas pas/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
279b8('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems
280a1('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ma ni zhes bgyi bar spyod na
280a2('bum): mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ dor ba med
280a3('bum): pa stong pa nyid dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
280a4('bum): pa'i tshe/ zabs mi mkhas pas/ dor ba med pa ste/ rang pa nyid mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems
280a5('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ rang / bzhin stong pa nyid rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la
280a6('bum): spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid mi rtag ces
280a7('bum): bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ 
280a8('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 
280b1('bum): thabs mi mkhas pas/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
280b2('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems
280b3('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// 
280b4('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sem des dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spro dad pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ rang bzhin
280b5('bum): stong pa nyid zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' se mas dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
280b6('bum): pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ rang bzhini stong pa nyid ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
280b7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te
280b8('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma
281a1('bum): la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas
281a2('bum): pas chos thams cad stong pa nyid rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
281a3('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa tshe thabs mi mkhas pas/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa'
281a4('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ chos tham/ sa cad stong pa nyid bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la
281a5('bum): spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi ni ba la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ chos thad
281a6('bum): stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
281a7('bum): pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod // bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
281a8('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ chos zad stong pa nyid bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang
281b1('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ chos thang stong pa nyid zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod// bcom ldan/ 
281b2('bum): 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod// 
281b3('bum): na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ chos thams
281b4('bum): cad stong pa nyid dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
281b5('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ chos thad stong pa nyid mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems
281b6('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong po nyid rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// 
281b7('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid mi rtag
281b8('bum): ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas
282a1('bum): pas rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
282a2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub
282a3('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//

282a5('bum): bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dang / 'a chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs
282a6('bum): mi mkhas pas/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
282a7('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs ma mkhas pas/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyad do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sem
282a8('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan
282b1('bum): 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid mi dben zhes brgya

282b6('bum): ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ mi dmigs pa stong
282b7('bum): pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe//

285a7('bum): pas dngos pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bdag cis kyis spyod na mtshon ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha

286a1('bum): ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas

286a7('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ni zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod// / 
286a8('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams
286b1('bum): ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe thabs

286b3('bum): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom/ 
286b4('bum): ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dang/ 'a chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ yang dag par spong
286b5('bum): ba rnams rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod/ do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sem sa dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
286b6('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ yang dag par spong ba rnams mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub
286b7('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ yang dag por spong ba rnams bdi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan
286b8('bum): mal spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ yang dag par
287a1('bum): spong ba rnams sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
287a2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ yang dag par spong ba rnams bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang
287a3('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ yang dag par spong ba rnams bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na
287a4('bum): mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te bya chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab dkyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe / zabs mi mkhas
287a5('bum): pas yang dag par spong ba rnams ni zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
287a6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ yang dag par spong ba rnams ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems
287a7('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ yang dag par spong ba rnams dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// 
287a8('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ yang dag par spong ba rnams
287b1('bum): mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 8
287b2('bum): mi mkhas pas/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
287b3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te
287b4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab dkyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams bde zhes
287b5('bum): bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ zabs
287b6('bum): mi mkhas pas/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
287b7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang po rnams bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshon ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal
287b8('bum): te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod
288a1('bum): na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs
288a2('bum): mi mkhas pas/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
288a3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal
288a4('bum): te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mim khas pas/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dben zhes
288a5('bum): bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dang / 'chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 
288a6('bum): thabs mi mkhas pas/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
288a7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ dbang po rnams rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems
288a8('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ dbang po rnams mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom
288b1('bum): ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ dbang po rnams bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na
288b2('bum): mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ dbang po
288b3('bum): rnams sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe// 
288b4('bum): thabs mi mkhas pas/ dbang po rnams bdag ces pa dag bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
288b5('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thab sa mi mkhas pas/ dbang po rnams bdag med ces/ bgyi bar spyod na mtshon ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'ad
288b6('bum): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ dbang po rnams zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la
288b7('bum): spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ dbang po rnams ma zhi zhes bgyi
288b8('bum): bor spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas
289a1('bum): dbang po rnams dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
289a2('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ zabs mi mkhas pas/ dbang po rnams mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa
289a3('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ stobs rnams rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das
289a4('bum): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sho/ sa rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ zabs dmi mkhas pas/ stobs rnams mi rtag ces bgyi bar
289a5('bum): spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te bya nga chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes ra ba kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas
289a6('bum): pos/ stobs rnams bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
289a7('bum): chetshe thabs mi mkhas pas/ stobs rnams sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
289a8('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ stobs rnams bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa'
289b1('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ stobs rnams bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan
289b2('bum): 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ stobs rnams zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan

289b4('bum): ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom da ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dadapa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
289b5('bum): tshe/  zabs mi mkhas pas/ stobs rnams dben zhe sa bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
289b6('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ stobs rnams mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub
289b7('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// / 
289b8('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams mi
290a1('bum): rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
290a2('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems

290a5('bum): rnams bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa

290a7('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnam zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//

290b1('bum): ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs
290b2('bum): mi mkhas pas/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
290b3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan
290b4('bum): 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ 'phags pa'i lam
290b5('bum): yan lag brgyad pa rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
290b6('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te
290b7('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bde zhes bgyi bar
290b8('bum): spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas
291a1('bum): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa'

291a5('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ zabs mi mkhas pas/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad/ pa zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom

291a7('bum): pa ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs

291b2('bum): ma la spyod do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa bam po sum cu gsum pa/ bcom ldan 'das gar te/ 
291b3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs ma mkhas pas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams rtag ces bgyi bar spyod/

291b8('bum): bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs
292a1('bum): mi mkhas pas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sem/

292a4('bum): bden pa rnams zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyodad do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub semasardzas dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
292a5('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ 'phag/ sa pa'i bden pa rnams ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na/ mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang
292a6('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na
292a7('bum): mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ 'ophags
292a8('bum): pa'i bden pa rnams mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpo' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
292b1('bum): pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ bsam gtan rnams rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po

292b4('bum): ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub se/ dmas dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha ro// la tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ 
292b5('bum): bsam gtan rnams sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod nam tshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te bya nga chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi

292b7('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ bsam gtan rnams bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// /

293a4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe// thabs mi mkha sa pas/ bsam gtan rnams mi dben zhes bgyi bar

293a6('bum): tshad med pa rnams rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
293a7('bum): tsher thabs mi mkhas pas/ tshad med pa rnams mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
293a8('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ tshad mod pa rnams bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems
293b1('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ tshad med pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//

293b3('bum): ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi
293b4('bum): mkhas pas/ tshad med pa rnams bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'

293b6('bum): ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ tshad med pa rnams ma ni zhes brgya
293b7('bum): bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshethabs mi mkhas
293b8('bum): pas ro tshad med pa rnams dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
294a1('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ tshad med pa rnams mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das
294a2('bum): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ gzugs med pa'o snyoms par 'jug pa rtag
294a3('bum): ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas
294a4('bum): pas gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa mi rtag cedas bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa
294a5('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe// zab sa mi mkhas pas/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms pa ra 'jug pa bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// 
294a6('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par
294a7('bum): 'jug pa sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
294a8('bum): tshe thabs mi mkhas pas/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bdag ces bgyi spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems
294b1('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ gzugs med pa'i snyom par 'jug pa bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// 
294b2('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par/ 
294b3('bum): 'jug pa zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs
294b4('bum): mi mkhas pas/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'judage ba ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// / bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems
294b5('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshethabs mi mkhas pas/ gzugs med pa'isnyoms par 'jug pa dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan
294b6('bum): mal spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ gzugs med pa'i
294b7('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
294b8('bum): pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ rnam par thar pa rnams rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
295a1('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ rnam par thar pa rnams mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod// 
295a2('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ rnam par thar pa rnams bde zhes
295a3('bum): bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe// thabs mi mkhas
295a4('bum): pas rnam par thar pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom lda na 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
295a5('bum): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ rnam par thar pa rnams bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom
295a6('bum): ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ rnam par thar pa rnams bdag med ces
295a7('bum): bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma lo spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ za bas mi mkhas pas/ 
295a8('bum): rnam par thar pa rnams zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
295b1('bum): cher thabs mi mkhas pas/ rnam par thar pa rnams ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
295b2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ rnam par thar pa rnams dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub
295b3('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ rnam par thar pa rnams mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod// / 
295b4('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ de'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i
295b5('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa dgu rtag ces bgyi bar spyod nam/ tshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te bya nga chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
295b6('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan
295b7('bum): 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
295b8('bum): dgu bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas
296a1('bum): pas nga mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa'
296a2('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la
296a3('bum): spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i
296a4('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa dgu bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang nga chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
296a5('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan
296a6('bum): 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe / thabs mi mkhas pas mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
296a7('bum): dgu ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi
296a8('bum): mkhas pas/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems
296b1('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la
296b2('bum): spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo
296b3('bum): stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
296b4('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe// thabs mi mkhas pas/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong / pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa// 
296b5('bum): mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe
296b6('bum): thabs mi mkhas pas/ rnam par thar pa sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te/ 
296b7('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ rnam por thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang // 
296b8('bum): smon pa med pa sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
297a1('bum): pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na
297a2('bum): mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ rnam par
297a3('bum): thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa'
297a4('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang
297a5('bum): smon pa med pa zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spro//  do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems// dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
297a6('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom
297a7('bum): ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang
297a8('bum): mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
297b1('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na
297b2('bum): mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ mngon
297b3('bum): par shes pa rnams rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
297b4('bum): pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ mngon par shes pa rnams mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan dam la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub
297b5('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pa sa/ mngon par shes pa rnams bde zhes bgyi bar spyod
297b6('bum): na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe// thabs mi mkhas pas/ mngon par
297b7('bum): shes pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
297b8('bum): pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ mngon por shes pa rnams bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
298a1('bum): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ mngon par shes pa rnams bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan
298a2('bum): ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ mngon par shes
298a3('bum): pa rnams ni zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs
298a4('bum): mi mkhas pas/ mngon par shes pa rnams ma zhi zhe sa bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom da ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
298a5('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas// mngon par shes pa rnams dpe na zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom
298a6('bum): ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ mngon par shes pa rnams mi dben zhes bgyi
298a7('bum): bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas
298a8('bum): ting nge 'dzin rnams rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'ad sa gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
298b1('bum): pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ ting nge 'dzin rnams mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems
298b2('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ ting nge 'dzin rnams bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te
298b3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ ting nge 'dzin rnams sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan
298b4('bum): ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sem sa dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas
298b5('bum): ting nge 'dzin rnams bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan/ ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
298b6('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mo mkhas pas/ ting nge 'dzin rnams bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub
298b7('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas// ting nge 'dzin rnams ni nas bgyi bar spyod dam na ma la spyod do// 
298b8('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'ing/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ ting nge 'dzin rnams kyin ni/ 
299a1('bum): bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la/ 
299a2('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ ting nge 'dzin rnams dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ 
299a3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ ting nge 'dzin rnams mi dbeni zhes bgyi bar spyod ni mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang
299a4('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pa sa/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na
299a5('bum): mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chu ba sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ zabs mi mkhas
299a6('bum): pas gzungs kyi sgo rnams mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
299a7('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
299a8('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma lo spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub/ 
299b1('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom
299b2('bum): ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams bdag med ces bgyi bar
299b3('bum): spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe// thabs mi mkhas pas/ gzungs
299b4('bum): kyi sgo rnams zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod // bcom ldan 'das gal byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
299b5('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ gzungs kyi sgro rnams ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems
299b6('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod de// 
299b7('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams mi dben
299b8('bum): zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas
300a1('bum): pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems
300a2('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ de bzhin gshegs po'i stobs bcu mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// 
300a3('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
300a4('bum): bcu bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
300a5('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ de bzhin gags pa'i stobs bcu sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar/ spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das ga
300a6('bum): te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshethebs mi mkhas pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu bdag ces bgyi bar
300a7('bum): spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ de bzhin
300a8('bum): gshegs pa'i stobs bcu bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
300b1('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ de bzhin gsheg pa'i stobs bcu zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa'
300b2('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod// 
300b3('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i/ 
300b4('bum): stobs bcu dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spro dad do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sem das dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
300b5('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mo mkhas pasade bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu mi dben no/ sa bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan
300b6('bum): 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ mi 'jigs pa rnams rtag ces bgyi
300b7('bum): bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ 
300b8('bum): mi 'jigs pa rnams mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
301a1('bum): pa'i rje/ thabs mi ma khasna bas/ mi 'jigs pa rnams bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub
301a2('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ mi 'jigs pa rnams sdug bsngal nis bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma
301a3('bum): la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ mi 'jigs pa
301a4('bum): rnams bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
301a5('bum): laspyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ mi 'jigs pa rnams bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub
301a6('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ babs mi mkhas pas/ mi 'jigs pa rnams ni zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan
301a7('bum): 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ mi 'jigs pa rnams mni zhes bgyi bar spyod
301a8('bum): namatshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas mi 'dzin
301b1('bum): pa rnams dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe// thabs
301b2('bum): mi mkhas pas/ mi 'jigs pa rnams mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
301b3('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ so so yang dag por rig pa rnams rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das
301b4('bum): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po she/ ras rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshezab des mi mkhas pas// so so yang dag par rig
301b5('bum): pa rnams mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa'asems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
301b6('bum): pal spyod pa'i cha/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems
301b7('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i cha/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sdug bsngal nas bgyi bor spyod na ma / 
301b8('bum): ma la sbyang ngo // bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pharal tu phyin pa la spyod pa'om/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ sas ming dag
302a1('bum): par rig pa rnams bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
302a2('bum): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan mtshan ma la spyod do// 
302a3('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ so so yang dag par rig pa
302a4('bum): rnams zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
302a5('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ so so ya nga dag par rig pa rnams ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spro/ da na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te/ 
302a6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dben zhes bgyi bar
302a7('bum): spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ 
302a8('bum): so so yang dag par rig pa rnams mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
302b1('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ byams pa chen po rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa'
302b2('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ byams pa chen po mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom
302b3('bum): ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ byams pa chen po bde zhes bgyi bar spyod
302b4('bum): na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te bya/ ngang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi
302b5('bum): mkhas pas/ byams pa chen po sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
302b6('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pos/ byams po chen po bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan mau la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das
302b7('bum): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ byams pa chen po bdag med ces bgyi bar
302b8('bum): spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ 
303a1('bum): byams pa chen po ni zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
303a2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ byams pa chen po ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub
303a3('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe ka/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ byams pa chen po dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// / 
303a4('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sem sa dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spro/ dad pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ byams pa
303a5('bum): chen po mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
303a6('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ snying rje chen po rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshon ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems
303a7('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ zabs mi mkhas pos/ snying rje chen po mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod// 
303a8('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ snying rje chen po bde zhes bgyi bar
303b1('bum): spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe / thabs mi mkhas pas/ snying
303b2('bum): rje chen po sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 
303b3('bum): thabs mi mkhas pas/ snying rje chen po bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
303b4('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ zabs mi mkhas dpas/ snying rje chen po bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te/ 
303b5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i cha/ thabs mi ma khas pas/ snying rje chen po zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na
303b6('bum): mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ snying rje/ 
303b7('bum): chen po ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe
303b8('bum): thabs mi mkhas pas/ snying rje chen po dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
304a1('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ snying rje chen po mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan
304a2('bum): 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad
304a3('bum): rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi
304a4('bum): mkhas pas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco ba rgyad mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod/  // bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems
304a5('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad bde zhes/ 
304a6('bum): bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi
304a7('bum): mkhas pas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems
304a8('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma
304b1('bum): la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe / thabs mi mkhas pas/ sangs rgyas kyi
304b2('bum): chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
304b3('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das
304b4('bum): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shesarab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
304b5('bum): bco brgyad ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyodado// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sem/ sa dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
304b6('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang
304b7('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad mi dben zhes
304b8('bum): bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa bam po sum cu bzhi pa
305a1('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'di snyam du bdag
305a2('bum): ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// zhes bgyi bar spyod na/ dmigs pa la spyod pa ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni mtshan ma la spyod do// 
305a3('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di snyam du gang de ltar spyod pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu
305a4('bum): phyin pa bsgom mo zhes bgyi bar spyod na yang mtshan ma nyid la spyod pa ste/ do na byang chub sems dpa' sem/ ras dpa' chen po thabs mi mkhas par rig par bgyi'o// 
305a5('bum): de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
305a6('bum): po'i thabs mi mkhas pa ji ltar rig par bya ba yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
305a7('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs la mos shing 'du shes te/ byin gyis rlob na/ de gzugs la mos shing 'du shes te/ byin gyis rlob pas/ gzugs
305a8('bum): mngon par 'du bya ba la spyod de/ de ni skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang
305b1('bum): 'khrug pa las yongasu mi 'grol/ sdug bsngal chen po las yongasu mi 'grol bar brjod do// gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
305b2('bum): pa'i cha/ tshor ba la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob na/ de tshor ba la mos shing 'du shes te/ byin gyis rlob pas/ tshor ba mngon par 'du bya ba la spyod de/ de ni skye ba dang // 
305b3('bum): rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa las yongasu mi 'grol sdug bsngal chen
305b4('bum): bopo las yongasu mi 'grol bar brjod do// gal te byang chu pa sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rabad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'du shes la mos
305b5('bum): shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob na/ de 'du shes la mos shing 'dus shes te/ byin gyis rlob pas/ 'du shes mngon par 'du bya ba la spyod de/ de ni skye ba dang / 
305b6('bum): rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa las yongasu mi 'grol/ sdug bsngal chen
305b7('bum): po las yongs su mi 'grol bar brjod do// gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'du byed la mos shing 'du shes te// 
305b8('bum): byin gyis slob na de 'du byed la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob pas/ 'du byed mngon par 'du bya ba la spyod de/ de ni skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan
306a1('bum): dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa las yongs su mi 'gro la/ sdug bsngal chen po las yongasu mi 'grol
306a2('bum): bar brjod do// gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam par shes pa la mos shing 'du shes te/ byin gyis slob na/ 
306a3('bum): de rnam par shes pa la mos shing 'du shes te/ byin gyis rlob pas/ rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bya ba la spyod de/ de ni skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang
306a4('bum): mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba/ dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa las yod// su mi 'gro la/ sdug bsngal chen po las yongasu mi
306a5('bum): 'grol bar brjod do// gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ mig la mos shing 'du shes te/ byin gyis
306a6('bum): rlob na/ de mig la mos shing 'du shes te/ byin gyis rlob pas/ mig mngon par 'du bya ba la spyod de/ de ni skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang // 
306a7('bum): smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa las yongs su mi 'grol/ sdug bsngal chen po las yongs su mi 'grol bar brjod do// 
306a8('bum): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rna ba la mos shing 'du shes te/ byin gyis rlob na/ de rna ba la mos shing
306b1('bum): 'du shes te/ byin gyis rlob pas/ rna ba mngon par 'du bya ba la spyod de/ de ni skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang /

306b3('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sna la mos shing 'du shes te/ byin gyis rlob na/ de snal mos shing 'du shes te/ byin gyis rlob pas/ sna mngon
306b4('bum): par 'du bya ba la spyod de/ de ni skye ba dang / rga bo dang / na pa dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang /
