306b7('bum): spyod do// de ni skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa las yongs
306b8('bum): su mi 'grol/ sdug bsngal chen po las yongasu mi 'grol bar brjod do// gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa'i tshe/ lus
307a1('bum): la mos shing 'du shes te/ byin gyis rlob na/ de lus la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob pas/ lus mngon par 'du bya ba la spyod de/ de na
307a2('bum): skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa las yongs su mi 'gro la/ sdug
307a3('bum): bsngal chen po las yongasu mi 'grol bar brjod do// gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yid la mos shing 'du shes

307a6('bum): yongasu mi 'grol bar brjod do// gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs la mos shing 'du shes te/ byin
307a7('bum): gyis rlob na/ de gzugs la mos shing 'du shes te/ byin gyis rlob pas/ gzugs mngon par 'du bya ba la spyod de/ de ni skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / 
307a8('bum): mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa las yongs su mi 'grol/ sdug bsngal chen po las yongasu mi 'grol bar brjod do// 
307b1('bum): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sgral mos shing 'du shes te/ byin gyis rlob na/ de sgal mos shing 'du shes
307b2('bum): tebyin gyis rlob pas/ sgra mngon par 'du bya ba la spyod de/ de ni skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdig
307b3('bum): bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa las yongs su mi 'grol bar brjod do// gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
307b4('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ dril mos shing 'du shes te/ byin gyis rlob na/ de dril mos shing 'du shes te// byin gyis rlob pas/ dri mngon par 'du bya ba la spyod de// 
307b5('bum): de ni skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa las
307b6('bum): yongs su mi 'grol/ sdug bsngal chen po las yongasu mi 'grol bar brjod do// gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 
307b7('bum): rol mos shing 'du shes te/ byin gyis rlob na/ de ro la mos shing 'du shes te/ byin gyis rlob pas/ ro mngon par 'du bya ba la spyod de/ de ni skye ba dang / rga ba dang // 
307b8('bum): na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa las yongasu mi 'grol/ sdug bsngal chen po las yongasu mi 'grol

308a4('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos la mos shing 'du shes te/ byin gyis rlob na/ de chos la mos shing 'du shes te/ byin gyis

313b5('bum): mi 'grol/ sdug bsngal chen po las yongs su mi 'grol bar brjod do// gal te byang chub sems dpa' sem sa dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod// 
313b6('bum): pa'i tshe/ rga shi la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob na/ de rga shi la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob pas/ rga shi mngon par 'du bya ba la spyod de/ de ni skye ba dang / rga ba dang / 
313b7('bum): na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa las yongasu mi 'grol/ sdug bsngal chen po las yongasu mi 'grol bar

314a1('bum): gyis rlob na/ de sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob pas/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par 'du bya ba la spyod de/

319b6('bum): 'khrug pa las yongasu mi 'grol/ sdug bsngal chen po las yongasu mi 'grol bar brjod// gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
319b7('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob na/ de 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob pas// 
319b8('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa mngon par 'du bya ba la spyod de/ de ni skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi
320a1('bum): bde ba dang / 'khrug pa las yongasu mi 'grol/ sdug bsngal chen po las yongasu mi 'grol bar brjod do// gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
320a2('bum): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ bsam gtan bzhi la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob na/ de bsam gtan rnams la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis
320a3('bum): rlob pas/ bsam gtan mngon par 'du bya ba la spyod de/ de ni skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsdu ba dang / yid
320a4('bum): mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa las yongasu mi'i 'grol// sdug/ bsngal chen po las yongasu mi 'grol bar brjod do// gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
320a5('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ tshad med pa bzhi la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob na/ de tshad med pa rnams la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob
320a6('bum): pas tshad med pa mngon par 'du bya ba la spyod de/ de ni skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang // 
320a7('bum): 'khrug pa las yongasu mi 'gro la/ sdug bsngal chen po las yongasu ma 'grol bar brjod do// gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
320a8('bum): pa'i tshe/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob na/ de gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la mos shing 'du shes te byin
320b1('bum): gyis rlob pas/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa mngon par 'du bya ba la spyod de/ de ni skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / 
320b2('bum): sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa las yongasu mi 'grol/ sdug bsngal chen po las yongasu mi 'grol bar brjod do// / shes rab kyi pha/ 
320b3('bum): rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa// bam po sum cu lnga pa// gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam par thar pa
320b4('bum): brgyad la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob na/ de rnam par thar pa rnams la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob pas/ rnam por thar pa brgyad mngon par
320b5('bum): 'du bya ba la spyod de/ de ni skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba
320b6('bum): dang 'khrug pa las yongasu mi 'grol/ sdug bsngal chen po las yongasu mi 'grol bar brjod do// gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
320b7('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob na/ de mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la mos
320b8('bum): shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob pas/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu mngon par 'du bya ba la spyod de/ de ni skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang // 
321a1('bum): mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa las yongs su mi 'grol/ sdug bsngal chen po las
321a2('bum): yongasu mi 'grol bar brjod do// gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa'i tshe/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan
321a3('bum): ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob na/ de rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la mos shing 'du shes
321a4('bum): te byin gyis rlob pas/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa / mngon par 'du bya ba la spyod de/ de ni skye ba dang / rgab
321a5('bum): dang na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngag sa 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa las yongasu mi 'grol/ sdug
321a6('bum): bsngal chen po las yongasu mi 'grol bar brjod// gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ mngon par shes pa drug la
321a7('bum): mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob na/ de mngon par shes pa rnams la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob pas/ mngon par shes pa mngon par 'du bya ba la spyod de
321a8('bum): de ni skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa las yong su mi 'grol
321b1('bum): sdug bsngal chen po las yongasu mi 'grol bar brjod do// gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sha'i mig la mos
321b2('bum): shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob na/ de sha'i mig la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob pas/ sha'i mig mngon par 'du bya ba la spyod de/ de ni skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na
321b3('bum): ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa las yongasu mi 'grol/ sdug bsngal chen po las
321b4('bum): yongasu mi 'grol bar brjod do// gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ lho'i mig la shing 'du shes te
321b5('bum): byin gyis rlob na/ de lha'i mig la mos shing 'du shes/ te byin gyis rlob pas/ lha'i mig mngon par 'du/ khyab la spyod de/ de ni skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 
321b6('bum): 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa las yongasu mi 'grolo/ sdug bsngal chen po las yongasu mi 'grol
321b7('bum): bar brjod do// gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ shes rab kyi mig la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob
321b8('bum): na/ de shes rab kyi mig la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob pas/ shes rab kyi mig mngon par 'du bya ba la spyod de/ de ni skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan
322a1('bum): dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa las yongs su mi 'grol/ sdug bsngal chen po las yongasu mi
322a2('bum): 'grol bar brjod do// gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos kyi mig la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob
322a3('bum): na/ de chos kyi mig la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob pas/ chos kyi mig mngon par 'du bya ba la spyod de/ de ni skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan/ 
322a4('bum): dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa las yongasu mi 'gro/ dal/ sdug bsngal chen po las yongasu mi 'grel bar brjod/ 
322a5('bum): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po she sa rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sangs rgyas kyi mig la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob na/ 
322a6('bum): de sangs rgyas kyi mig la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob pas/ sangs rgyas kyi mig mngon par 'du bya ba la spyod de/ de ni skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang // 
322a7('bum): mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa las yongasu mi 'gro la/ sdug bsngal chen po las yongasu mi 'grol bar brjod// / 
322a8('bum): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ ting nge 'dzin rnams la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob na/ 
322b1('bum): ting nge 'dzin rnams la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob pas/ ting nge 'dzin rnams mngon par 'du bya ba la spyod de/ de ni skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan da /

322b3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob na/ de gzungs kyi
322b4('bum): sgo rnams la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob pas / gzungs kyi sgo rnams mngon par 'du bya ba la spyod de/ de ni skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi

322b6('bum): mi 'grol bar brjod do// gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la mos
322b7('bum): shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob na/ de de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu mngon
322b8('bum): par 'du bya ba la spyod de/ de ni skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan/ smre sngagaso 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa las/ 
323a1('bum): yongasu mi 'grol/ sdug bsngal chen po las yongasu mi 'grol bar brjod do// gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
323a2('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob na/ de mi 'jigs pa rnams la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob pas/ mi 'jigs pa mngon par
323a3('bum): 'du bya ba la spyod de/ de ni skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa
323a4('bum): las yongasu mi 'grol/ sdug bsngal chen po las yongs su mi 'grol bar brjod do// gal te byang chub se dmas dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
323a5('bum): byiphyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ so so yang dag par rig pa ba zhil mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob na/ des sa yang dag par rig pa rnams la mos shing 'du shes te byin
323a6('bum): gyis rlob pos/ so so yang dag par rig pa mngon par 'du bya ba la spyod de/ de ni skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal
323a7('bum): bdang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa las yongasu mi 'grol/ sdug bsngal chen po las yongasu mi 'grol bar brjod do// gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
323a8('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ snying rje chen po la mas shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob na/ de snying rje chen po la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob pas/ snying rje
323b1('bum): chen po mngon par 'du bya ba la spyod de/ de ni skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang /

323b3('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob na/ de sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la mos shing 'du shes te
323b4('bum): byin gyis rlob pas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres dpa bco brgyad mngon par 'du bya ba la spyod de/ de ni/ skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang // 
323b5('bum): smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa las yongasu mi 'grol/ sdug bsngal chen po las yongasu mi 'grol bar brjod// / 
323b6('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa yang mngon du bya ba'i bskal pa med na/ bla na
323b7('bum): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba lta ci smos te/ de ni gnas med do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa'
323b8('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod na/ thabs mi mkhas par shes par bya'o// smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'
324a1('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ji ltar spyod na/ thabs mkhas par shes par bya/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha radwa
324a2('bum): ti'i bu nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs la mi spyod do/ gzugs kyi mtshan ma la mi sprod cing / gzugs
324a3('bum): rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ gzugs bde zhes bya bar mi spyod/ gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod/ gzugs bdag ces
324a4('bum): bya bar mi spyod/ gzugs bdag med ces bya bar mi de spyod/ gzugs zhi zhes bya bar mi spod/ gzug das mi zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ gzugs stong zhes bya
324a5('bum): bar mi spyod/ gzugs mi stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ gzu gos mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ gzug sa mtshan ma mod ces bya bar mi spyod/ gzugs smon
324a6('bum): pa yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ gzugs smon po med ces bya bar mi spyod/ gzugs dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/ gzugs mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang / tshor ba la mi spyod de/ 
324a7('bum): tshor ba'i mtshan ma la mi spyod cing / tshor brtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ tshor ba mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ tshor ba bde zhes bya bar mi spyod/ tsher po sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod
324a8('bum): tsher ba bdag ces bya bar mi spyod/ tshor ba bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod/ tshor bzhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ tshor ba ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ tsher rab stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ tshor ba
324b1('bum): mi stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ tshor ba mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ tshor ba mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi spyod/ tshor ba smon pa yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ tshor ba smon pa med
324b2('bum): ces bya bar mi spyod/ tshor ba dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/ tshor ba mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang / 'du shes la mi spyod de/ 'du shes kyi mtshan ma la mi spyod cing / 'du shes rtag ces bya bar
324b3('bum): mi spyod/ 'du shes mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ 'du shes bde zhes bya bar mi spyod/ 'du shes sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod/ 'du shes bdag ces bya bar mi spyod/ 'du shes bdag med ces

324b5('bum): shes mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ 'du shes mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi spyod/ 'du shes smon pa yod du/ sa bya bar mi spyad/ 'du shes smon pa med ces bya bar mi
324b6('bum): spyod/ 'du shes dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/ 'du shes mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang / 'du byed la mi spyod de/ 'du byed kyi mtshan ma la mi spyod cing / 'du byed rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/

324b8('bum): bya bar mi spyod/ 'du byed gi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ 'du byed ma ni zhes bya bar mi spyod/ 'du byed stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ 'du byed mi stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ 'du byed mtshan
325a1('bum): ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ 'du byed mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi spyod/ 'du byed smon pa yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ 'du byed smon pa med ces bya/ 
325a2('bum): bar mi spyod/ 'du byed dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/ 'du byed mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang / rnam par shes pa la mi spyod de/ rnam par shes pa'i mtshan ma la mi spyod cing / rnam
325a3('bum): par shes pa rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ rnam par shes pa bde zhes bya bar mi spyod/ rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar
325a4('bum): mi spyod/ rnam par shes pa bdag ces bya bar mi spyod/ rnam par shes pa bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod / rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ rnam par
325a5('bum): shes pa ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ rnam par shes// pa stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ rnam par shes pa mi/ stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ rnam par shes pa mtshan
325a6('bum): ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ rnam par shes pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi spyod/ rnam par shes pa smon pa yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ rnam par shes pa smon pa med ces
325a7('bum): bya bar mi spyod/ rnam par shes pa dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/ rnam par shes pa mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang / mig la mi spyod do// mig gi mtshan ma la mi spyod cing / mig
325a8('bum): rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ mig mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ mig bde zhes bya bar mi spyod/ mig sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod/ mig bdag ces bya bar mi spyod
325b1('bum): mig bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod/ mig zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ mig ma ni zhes bya bar mi spyod/ mig stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ mig mi stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ mig mtshan
325b2('bum): ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ mig mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi spyod/ mig smon pa yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ mig smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod/ mig dben zhes
325b3('bum): bya bar mi spyod/ mig mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang / rna ba la mi spyod de/ rna ba'i mtshan ma la mi spyod cing / rna ba rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ rna ba mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ 
325b4('bum): rna ba bde zhes bya bar mi spyod/ rna ba sdug bsngal zhes bya par mi spyod/ rna ba bdag ces bya bar mi spyod/ rna ba bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod/ rna ba zhi zhes bya bar
325b5('bum): mi spyod/ rnab ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ rna ba stong ni/ sa bya bar mi spyod/ rna ba mi stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ rna ba mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ rna ba
325b6('bum): mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi spyod/ rna ba smon pa yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ rna ba smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod/ rna ba dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/ rna ba ming be ni zhes bya
325b7('bum): bya bar mi spyod pa dang / sna la mi spyod de/ sna'i mtshan ma la mi spyod cing / sna rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ sna mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ sna bde zhes bya bar mi spyod// 
325b8('bum): sna sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod/ sna bdag ces bya bar mi spyod/ sna bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod/ sna zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ snam zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ 
326a1('bum): sna stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ sna mi stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ sna mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ sna mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi spyod/ 
326a2('bum): sna smon pa yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ sna smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod/ sna dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/ sna mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang / lce la mi spyod de/ lce'i mtshan
326a3('bum): ma la mi spyod cing / lce rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ lce mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ lce bde zhes bya bar mi spyod/ lce sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod/ lce bdag ces bya
326a4('bum): bar mi spyod/ lce bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod/ lce zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ lce ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyo du/ lce stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ lce mi stong zhes bya bar
326a5('bum): mi spyod/ lce mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ lce mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi spyod/ lce smon pa yod/ ces bya bar mi spyod/ lce smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod
326a6('bum): lce dbe na zhes bya bar mi spyod/ lce mi dben ces bya bar mi spyod pa dang / lus la mi spyod de/ lus kyi mtshan ma la mi spyod cing / lus rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ lus mi rtag ces bya b.raro mi

326b1('bum): mi spyod/ lus smon pa yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ lus smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod/ lus dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/ lus mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang / yid la mi spyod/

333a4('bum): lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams mi stong zhes bya bdar mi spyod/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khoms dmatshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ lus kyi rnam par
333a5('bum): shes pa'i khams mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi spyod/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams smonapa yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ lus kyi rnam par shes
333a6('bum): pa'i khams smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams mi dben zhes bya bar mi
333a7('bum): spyod pa dang / yid kyi khams la mi spyod de/ yid kyi khams kyi mtshan ma la mi spyod cing / yid kyi khams rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ yid kyi khams mi rtag
333a8('bum): ces bya bar mi spyod/ yid kyi khams bde zhes bya bar mi spyod/ yid kyi khams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod/ yid kyi khams bdag ces bya bar mi spyod/ yid kyi

339b6('bum): bar mi spyod/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi
339b7('bum): spyod de/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan ma la mi spyod cing / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi rtag
339b8('bum): ces bya bar mi spyod/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bde zhes bya bar mi spyod/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol/ 
340a1('bum): tu phyin pa bdag ces bya bar mi spyod/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhi zhes bya bar
340a2('bum): mi spyod/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi stong
340a3('bum): zhes bya bar mi spyod/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi spyod/ tshul khrims
340a4('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin po smon pa yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa smon pa med ces bya da bar mi spyod/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben
340a5('bum): zhes bya bar mi spyod/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi/ dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod de/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i
340a6('bum): mtshan ma la mi spyod cing / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bde zhes bya
340a7('bum): bar mi spyod/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bdag ces bya bar mi spyod/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bdag
340a8('bum): med ces bya bar mi spyod/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong
340b1('bum): zhes bya bar mi spyod/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
340b2('bum): mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi spyod/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa smon po yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod/ bzod pa'i// 
340b3('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod de/ brtson
340b4('bum): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan ma la mi spyod cing brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rtag ces bya bar da mi spyod/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi
340b5('bum): rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol phyin pa bde zhes bya bar mi spyod/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod
340b6('bum): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bdag ces bya bar mi spyod/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin no zhes
340b7('bum): bya bar mi spyod/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mo zhe zhes bya bar mi spyod/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ brtson 'grus kyi b.ral
340b8('bum): ci byirang mo snying zhes bya bar mi spyod / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan ma yid ces bya bar mi spyod/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan ma med ces bya/ 
341a1('bum): par mi spyod/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa smon pa yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa smon pa med ces byabs
341a2('bum): mi spyod/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu
341a3('bum): byin pa spyod de/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan ma la mi spyod cing / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa rtag ces bya ba mi spyod/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu
341a4('bum): phyin pa mi rtog ces bya bar mi spyod/ bsam gtan dgyi pha rol tu phyin pa bde zhes bya bar mi spyod/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod
341a5('bum): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bdag ces bya bar mi spyod/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu
341a6('bum): phyin pa zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ bsam gtan gyi pha
341a7('bum): rol tu phyin pa mi stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi spyod
341a8('bum): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa smon pa yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa
341b1('bum): dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod de/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
341b2('bum): mtshan ma la mi spyod cing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
341b3('bum): pa bde zhes bya bar mi spyod/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bdag ces bya bar mi spyod/ shes rab kyi pha rol/ 
341b4('bum): tu phyin pa bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ shes ra rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ shes rab
341b5('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi stong zhes bya bar mi spod/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan ma yod ces bya bar
341b6('bum): mi spyod/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin po mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi spyod/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa smin pa yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa smom
341b7('bum): dmod ces bya bar mi spyod/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang // 
341b8('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa// bam po sum cu drug pa// nang stong pa nyid la mi spyod de/ nang stong pa nyid kyi mtshan ma la mi spyod cing / nang stong pa nyid
342a1('bum): rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ nang stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ nang stong pa nyid bde zhes bya bar mi spyod/ nang stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes
342a2('bum): bya bar mi spyod/ nang stong pa nyid bdag ces bya bar mi spyod/ nang stong pa nyid bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod/ nang stong pa nyid bzhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ nang stong pa nyid ma zhi zhes bya bar
342a3('bum): mi spyod/ nang stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ nang stong pa nyid mi stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ nang stong pa nyid mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ nang stong pa nyid mtshan ma med ces
342a4('bum): bya bar mi spyod/ nang stong pa nyid smon pa yod ces bya ba dar mi spyod/ nang stong pa nyid smon pa med ces bya ba dar mi spyod/ nang stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/ 
342a5('bum): nang stong pa nyid mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang / phye ste nga pa nyid la mi spyod/ phyi stong pa nyid kyi mtshan ma la mi spyod cing / phyi stong pa nyid rtag ces bya bar mi spyod// 
342a6('bum): phyi stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ phyi stong pa nyid bde zhes bya bar mi spyod/ phyi stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod/ phyi stong pa nyid bdag ces bya bar mi spyod/ phyi
342a7('bum): stong pa nyid bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod/ phyi stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar ma spyod/ phyi stong pa nyid ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ phyi stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ phyi stong pa nyid
342a8('bum): mi stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ phyi stong pa nyid mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ phyi stong pa nyid mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi spyod/ phyi stong pa nyid smon pa yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ 
342b1('bum): phyi stong pa nyid smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod/ phyi stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/ phyi stong pa nyid mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid la mi spyod de/ 
342b2('bum): nang stong pa nyid kyi mtshan ma la mo spyod cing / phyi nang stong pa nyid rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ phyi nang stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ phyi nang stong pa nyid bde zhes bya bar
342b3('bum): mi spyod/ phyi nang stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod/ phyi nang stong pa nyid bdag ces bya bar mi spyod/ phyi nang stong pa nyid bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod/ phyi nang stong
342b4('bum): pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ phyi nang stong pa nyid ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ phyi nang stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ phyi nang stong pa nyid mi stong zhes bya bar
342b5('bum): mi spyod/ phyi nang stong pa nyid mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ phyi nang stong pa nyid mtshan ma med ces bya ba ro mi spyod/ phyi nang stong pa nyid smon pa yod ces bya
342b6('bum): bya bar mi spyod/ phyi nang stong pa nyid smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod/ phyi nang stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/ phyi nang stong pa nyid mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang / stong
342b7('bum): pa nyid stong pa nyid la mi spyod de/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi mtshan ma la mi spod cing / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid rtag ces bya bar mi spod/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid mi rtog ces bya bar
342b8('bum): mi spyod/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid bde zhes bya bar mi spyod/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid bdag ces bya bar mi spyod/ stong pa nyid
343a1('bum): stong pa nyid bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ma ni zhes bya bar
343a2('bum): mi spyod/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid mi stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ 
343a3('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi spyod/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid smon pa yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod/ stong
343a4('bum): pa nyid stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang // chen po stong pa nyid la mi spyod de/ chen po stong po nyid kyi
343a5('bum): mtshan ma la mi spyod cing / chen po stong pa nyid rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ chen po stong pa nyid mi rtog ces bya bar mi spyod/ chen po stong pa nyid bde zhes bya bar mi
343a6('bum): spyod chen po stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod/ chen po stong pa nyid bdag ces bya bar mi spyod/ chen po stong pa nyid bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod/ chen po stong pa nyid zhi
343a7('bum): zhes bya bar mi spyod/ chen po stong pa nyid ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ chen po stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ chen po stong pa nyid mi stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ chen po stong pa nyid mtshan
343a8('bum): ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ chen po stong pa nyid mtshan ma medado ces bya bar mi spyod/ chen po stong pa nyid smon pa yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ chen po stong pa nyid smon pa med ces bya bar mi skyo/ 
343b1('bum): chen po stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/ chen po stong pa nyid mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid la mi spyod de/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan ma la ma/ 
343b2('bum): spyod cing / don dam pa stong pa nyid rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ don dam pa stong pa nyid mi rtog ces bya bar mi spyod/ don dam pa stong pa nyid bde zhes bya bar mi spyod/ don dam
343b3('bum): ba stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod/ don dam pa stong pa nyid bdag ces bya bar mi spyod/ don dam pa stong pa nyid bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod/ don dam pa
343b4('bum): stong pa nyid ni zhes bya bar mi spyod/ don dam pa stong pa denyid mazhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ don dam pa stong pa de nyid stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ don ngom pa stong pa nyid mi
343b5('bum): stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ dom dam pa stong pa nyid mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ don dam pa stong pa nyi dmatshan ma mdo ces bya bor mi spyod/ don dam pa nga
343b6('bum): pa nyid smon pa yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ don dam pa stong pa nyid smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod/ don dam pa stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/ don dam pa stong pa nyid mi/ 
343b7('bum): dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid la mi spyod de/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi mtshan ma la mi spyod cing / 'dus byas stong pa nyid rtag ces bya bar mi spyod
343b8('bum): 'dus byas stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid bde zhes bya bar mi spyod/ 'dus byos stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod/ 'dus byas
344a1('bum): stong pa nyid bdag ces bya bar mi spyod/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ 
344a2('bum): 'dus byas stong pa nyid ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid mi stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ 'dus byas stong pa
344a3('bum): nyid mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi spyod/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid smon pa yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ 'dus byas
344a4('bum): stong pa nyid smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang / 'dus
344a5('bum): ma byas stong pa nyid la mi spyod de/ 'dus ma byas ste/ nga pa nyid kyi mtshan ma la mi spyod cing / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ 'dus ma byas stong
344a6('bum): pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid bde zhes bya bar mi spyod/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid
344a7('bum): bdag ces bya bar mi spyod/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ma zhi zhes bya bar
344a8('bum): mi spyad/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid mi stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spyad/ 
344b1('bum): 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi spyod/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid smon pa yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid smon pa med ces bya bar mi
344b2('bum): spyod pa 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la mi spyod de/ mtha'
344b3('bum): las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan ma la mi spyod cing / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ 
344b4('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid bde zhes bya bar mi sbyo/ da/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid
344b5('bum): bdag ces bya bar mi spyod/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ mtha' las
344b6('bum): 'das pa stong pa nyid ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mi stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ mtha' las
344b7('bum): 'das pa stong pa nyid mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi spyod/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid smon pa yod ces
344b8('bum): bya bar mi spyod/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa
345a1('bum): nyid mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la mi spyod de/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan ma la mi spyod cing
345a2('bum): thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid bde zhes bya bar
345a3('bum): mi spyod/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid bdag ces bya bar mi spyod/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa
345a4('bum): nyid bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod/ thog ma tha ma med pa stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ thog
345a5('bum): ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid mi stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid
345a6('bum): mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi spyod/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid smon pa yod ces bya bar mi
345a7('bum): spyod pa thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa
345a8('bum): nyid mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la mi spyod de/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan ma la mi spyod cing / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid rtag ces
345b1('bum): bya bar mi spyod/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid bde zhes bya bar mi spyod/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi
345b2('bum): spyod/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid bdag ces bya bar mi spyod/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ 
345b3('bum): dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid mi stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ dor ba med// / 
345b4('bum): pa stong pa nyid mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ dor dab med pa stong pa nyid mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi spyod/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid smon pa yod ces bya
345b5('bum): bar mi spyod/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid smon pa med ce sa bya bar mi spyod/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid mi dben
345b6('bum): zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid la mi spyod de/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi mtshan ma la mi spyod cing / rang bzhin stong pa nyid rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ rang bzhin
345b7('bum): stong pa nyid mi rtog ces bya bar mi spyod/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid bde zhes bya bar mi spyod/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid bdag
345b8('bum): ces bya bar mi spyod/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar mi spyad/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ rang
346a1('bum): bzhin stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid mi stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid mtshan ma yod ces bya bar/ 
346a2('bum): mi spyod/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi spyod/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid smon pa yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod/ 
346a3('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid la mi spyod de/ chos thams cad stong pa
346a4('bum): nyid kyi mtshan ma la mi spyod cing / chos thams cad stong pa nyid rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ chos thams cad/ stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ chos zad stong/ 
346a5('bum): pa nyid bde zhes bya bar mi spyod/ chos thams cad stong nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid bdag ces bya bar mi spyod/ chos thams
346a6('bum): cad stong pa nyid bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ chos thams cad stong pa
346a7('bum): nyid stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid mi stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid

346b1('bum): dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la mi spyod de/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi mtshanam/

352b8('bum): ces bya bar mi spyod/ rnam par thar pa rnams mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi spyod/ rnam par thar pa rnams smon pa yid ces bya bar mi spyod/ rnam par thar pa rnams smon pa med
353a1('bum): ces bya bar mi snang / rnam par bar pa rnams dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/ rnam par thar pa rnams ming be shes bya bar mi spyod pa dang / mthar gyis da/ 
353a2('bum): pa'i sems par 'jug pa rnams la mi spyod de/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi mtshan ma la mi spyod cing / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams
353a3('bum): rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bde zhes bya bar mi
353a4('bum): spyad/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod/ mthar gyis gan sa pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bdag ces bya bar mi
353a5('bum): spyod mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnam sa bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod/ mthar gyis/ gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni zhes bya bar ma
353a6('bum): spyod/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ mthar gyis
353a7('bum): gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mi stong zhes bya bar mi spyad/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi spyod/ mthar gyis gnas/ 
353a8('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi spyod/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams smon pa mod ces bya bar mi spyod/ mthar gyis gnas
353b1('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par
353b2('bum): 'jug pa rnams mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la mi spyod de/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa
353b3('bum): nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i mtshan ma la mi spyod cing / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa rtag ces bya
353b4('bum): bar mi spyod/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa meng pa mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa
353b5('bum): nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa bde zhes bya bar mi spyod/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon
353b6('bum): pa med pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa bdag ces bya bar mi spyod/ rnam par thar pa'i
353b7('bum): sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa
353b8('bum): zhe zhes bya bar mi spyod rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ rnam par thar pa'i sgra stong pa nyid dang / 
354a1('bum): mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa stong zhes bya bar mi spyad/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa
354a2('bum): med pa mi stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ rnam par thar pa'i
354a3('bum): sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi spyod/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang
354a4('bum): smon pa med pa smon pa yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma me dad pa dang / smon pa med pa smon pa med ces bya bar
354a5('bum): mi spyod/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan
354a6('bum): ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams la mi spyod do/ mngon par shes pa rnams kyi mtshan ma la mi spyod cing / mngon
354a7('bum): par shes pa rnams rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ mngon par shes pa rnams mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ mngon par shes pa rnams bde zhes bya bar mi spyod// mngon par shes pa
354a8('bum): rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod/ mngon par shes pa rnams bdag ces bya bar mi spyod/ mngon par shes pa rnams bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod/ mngon par shes pa
354b1('bum): rnams zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ mngon par shes pa rnams ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ mngon par shes pa rnams stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ mngon par shes pa rnams mi stong zhes
354b2('bum): bya bar mi spyod/ mngon par shes pa rnams mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ mngon par shes pa rnams mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi spyod/ mngon par shes pa rnams smon
354b3('bum): pa yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ mngon par shes pa rnams smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod/ mngon par shes pa rnams dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/ mngon par shes pa rnams
354b4('bum): mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams la mi spyod de// ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi mtshon ma la mi spyod cing / ting nge 'dzin
354b5('bum): rnams rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ ting nge 'dzin rnams mi// rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ ting nge 'dzin rnams bde/ zhes bya bar mi spyod/ ting nge 'dzin rnams sdug bsngal
354b6('bum): zhes bya bar mi spyod/ ting nge 'dzin rnams bdag ces bya bar mo spyod/ ting nge 'dzin rnams bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod/ ting nge 'dzin rnams zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ ting nge 'dzin
354b7('bum): rnams ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ ting nge 'dzin rnams stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ ting nge 'dzin rnams mi stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ ting nge 'dzin rnams mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi
354b8('bum): spod/ ting nge 'dzin rnams mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi spyod/ ting nge 'dzin rnams smon pa yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ ting nge 'dzin rnams smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod/ ting nge
355a1('bum): 'dzin rnams dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/ ting nge 'dzin rnams mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams la mi spyod de/ gzungs
355a2('bum): kyi sgo rnams kyi mtshan ma la mi spyod cing / gzungs kyi sgo rnams rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams bde zhes
355a3('bum): bya bar mi spyod/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams bdag ces bya bar mi spyod/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams bdag med ces bya bar
355a4('bum): mi spyod/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod// gzungs kyi sgo rnams ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ 
355a5('bum): gzungs kyi sgo rnams mi stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams mtshan ma med ces bya
355a6('bum): bar mi spyod/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams smon pa yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams dben zhes bya bar mi
355a7('bum): spyod/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la mi spyod de/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi mtshan
355a8('bum): ma la mi spyod cing // de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams rtag ces bya bar mi spong/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams mi rtag ces bya bar mi spod/ de bzhin
355b1('bum): gshegs pa'i stobs rnams bde zhes bya bar mi spyod/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams
355b2('bum): bdag ces bya bar mi spyod/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod
355b3('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
355b4('bum): rnams mi stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams
355b5('bum): mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi spyod/ de bzhin gshes gas pa'i stobs rnams smon pa yod ces bya bar/ mi spyod/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams smon
355b6('bum): pa med ces bya bar mi spyod/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/ de bzhin gshegs pa'o stobs rnams mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang / mi 'jigs
355b7('bum): pa rnams la mi spyod de/ mi 'jigs pa rnams kyi mtshan ma la mi spyod cing / mi 'jigs po rnams rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ mi 'jigs pa rnams mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ mi
355b8('bum): 'jigs pa rnams bde zhes bya bar mi spyod/ mi 'jigs pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod/ mi 'jigs pa rnams bdag ces bya bar mi spyod/ mi 'jigs pa rnams
356a1('bum): bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod/ mi 'jigs pa rnams ni zhes bya bar mi spyod/ mi 'jigs pa rnams ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ mi 'jigs pa rnams
356a2('bum): stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ mi 'jigs pa rnams mi stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ mi 'jigs pa rnams mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ mi 'jigs pa rnams mtshan
356a3('bum): ma med ces bya bar mi spyod/ mi 'jigs pa rnams smon pa yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ mi 'jigs pa rnams smon pa med ces bya bar mi spod/ mi 'jigs pa rnams dben
356a4('bum): zhes bya bar mi spyod/ mi 'jigs pa rnams mi dpe na zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la mi spyod de/ so so yang dag
356a5('bum): par rig pa rnams kyi mtshan ma la mi spyod cing / so so// yang dag par rig pa rnams rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams mi rtag ces
356a6('bum): bya bar mi spyod/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams bde zhes bya bar mi spod/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod/ so so yang dag
356a7('bum): par rig pa rnams bdag ces bya bar mi spyod/ so so yang dag par rig po rnams bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod// 
356a8('bum): so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams mi stong zhes
356b1('bum): bya bar mi spyodaso so yang dag par rig pa rnams mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi spyod so so yang
356b2('bum): dag par rig pa rnams smon pa yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dben
356b3('bum): zhes bya bar mi spyodaso so yang dag par rig pa rnams mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang / byams pa chen po la mi spyod de/ byams pa chen po'i mtshan ma
356b4('bum): la mi spyod cing / byams pa chen po rtag ces bya b.rami spyod/ byams pa chen po mi rtag ces bya ra bar mi spyod/ byams pa chen po bde zhes bya bar mi
356b5('bum): spyod byams pa chen po sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod/ byams pa chen po bdag ces bya bar/ mi spyod/ byams pa chen po bdag med ces bya bar
356b6('bum): mi spyod/ byams pa chen po zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ byams pa chen po ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ byams pa chen po stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ byams pa
356b7('bum): chen po mi stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ byams pa chen po mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ byams pa chen po mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi spyod/ byams pa chen po
356b8('bum): smon pa yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ byams pa chen po smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod/ byams po chen po dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/ byams pa chen po mi dben zhes
357a1('bum): bya bar mi spyod pa dang / snying rje chen po la mi spyod de/ snying rje chen po'i mtshan ma la mi spyod cing / snying rje chen po rtag ces bya bar mi spyo/ 
357a2('bum): snying rje chen po mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ snying rje chen po bde zhes bya bar mi spyod/ snying rje chen po sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod/ snying rje chen po bdag ces bya bar
357a3('bum): mi spyod/ snying rje chen po bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod/ snying rje chen po zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ snying rje chen po ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ snying rje chen po stong
357a4('bum): zhes bya bar mi spyod/ snying rje chen po mi stong zhes bya bar mi spyod snying rje chen po mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ snying rje chen po mtshan ma med
357a5('bum): ces bya bar mi spyod/ snying rje chen po smon pa yod ces/ khya bar mi spyo dang/ snying rje chen po smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod/ snying rje chen po dben zhes
357a6('bum): bya bar mi spyod/ snying rje chen po mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la mi spyod de sang+yas kyi chos ma
357a7('bum): 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi mtshan ma la mi spyod cing / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco
357a8('bum): brgyad mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad bde zhes bya bar mi spyod/ sangs rgyas kyi mchos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad sdug
357b1('bum): bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyad/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad bdag ces bya bar mi spyod/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyud bdag med ces bya
357b2('bum): bya bar mi spyod sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni zhes bya bar mi spyad/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad mazhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ sangs
357b3('bum): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad mi stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ sangs rgyas kyi chos
357b4('bum): ma 'dres pa bco brgyad mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi smra/ dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pabaco brgyad mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi spyod/ sangs
357b5('bum): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad smon pa yod ces d+ha/ bar mi spyod/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa/ bco brgyad smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod/ sangs
357b6('bum): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa de'i tshe/ byang chub sems
357b7('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs mkhas par shes par bya'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phra brgya pa
357b8('bum): bam po sum su bdun pa de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha rang ti'i bu gzugs kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang gzugs ma yin/ stong pa nyid
358a1('bum): las gud na yang gzugs med gzugs las gud na yang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang gzugs gzugs nyid kyang stong
358a2('bum): pa nyid do// tshor ba'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang / tshor ba ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang tshor ba med/ tshor ba las gud na yang stong pa nyid med
358a3('bum): de stong pa nyid kyang tshor ba/ tshor ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// 'du shes kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang 'du shes ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang
358a4('bum): 'du shes med/ 'du shes las gud na yang ste/ dang pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang 'du shes/ 'du shes nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// 'du byed
358a5('bum): kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang 'du byed ma yinastong pa nyid las gud na yang 'du byed med/ 'du byed las gud na yang stong pa nyid med de
358a6('bum): stong pa nyid kyang 'du byed 'du byed nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang rnam par shes pa ma yinastong pa nyid las
358a7('bum): gud na yang rnam par shes pa ming/ rnam par shes pa las gud na yang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa/ rnam par shes pa nyid
358a8('bum): kyang stong pa nyid do// mig gi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang mig ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang mig meng mig las gus na yang stong pa nyid
358b1('bum): med de/ stong pa nyid kyang mig/ mig nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// rna ba'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang rna ba ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang rna ba med
358b2('bum): rna ba las gud na yang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang rna ba/ rna ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// sna'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang / sna ma yin/ stong
358b3('bum): pa nyid las gud na yang sna med/ sna las gud na yang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang sna/ sna nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// lce'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa
358b4('bum): de yang lce ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang lce med lce las gud na yang stong pa nyid demed de/ stong pa nyid kyang lce/ lce nyid kyang
358b5('bum): stong pa nyid do// lus kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa/ de yang lus ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang lus med lus las gud na yang stong pa
358b6('bum): nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang lus/ lus nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// yid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang yid ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang
358b7('bum): yid med/ yid las gud na yang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang yid/ yid nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// gzugs kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang
358b8('bum): gzugs ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang gzugs med/ gzugs las gud na yang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang gzugs gzugs nyid
359a1('bum): kyang stong pa nyid do// sgra'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang sgra ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang sgra med/ sgra las gud na
359a2('bum): yang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang sgra / sgra nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// dri'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang dri ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang // 
359a3('bum): dri med/ dri las gud na yang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang dri/ dri nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// ro'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang ro ma yin/ stong pa nyid las/ 
359a4('bum): gud na yang ro med/ ro las gud na yang stong pa nyi da med de/ stong pa nyid kyang ro// ro nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// reg gi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de
359a5('bum): yang rag ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang re/ ga med/ reg las gud na yang stong pa nyid meng/ de stong pa nyid kyang reg/ reg nyid kyang stong pa
359a6('bum): nyid do// chos kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang chos ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang chos med/ chos las gud na yang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa
359a7('bum): nyid kyang chos/ chos nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// mig gi khams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang / mig gi khams ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang mig
359a8('bum): gi khams med/ mig gi khams las gud na yang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang mig gi khams mig gi khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// gzugs
359b1('bum): kyi khams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang gzugs kyi khams ma yin stong pa nyid las gud na yang gzugs kyi khams med gzugs kyi khams las gud na yang stong pa nyid/ 
359b2('bum): med de/ stong pa nyid kyang gzugs kyi khams gzugs kyi khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang mig gi
359b3('bum): rnam par shes pa'i khams ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams med/ mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams las gud na yang stong
359b4('bum): pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang mig gi rnam par she/ sa pa'i khams mig gi rnam par shes pa'i kha rams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// rna ba'i khams kyi stong pa
359b5('bum): nyid gang yin pa de yang rna ba'i khams ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang rna ba'i khams med/ rna ba'i khams las gud na yang stong pa nyid med de/ stong
359b6('bum): pa nyid kyang rna ba'i khams/ rna ba'i khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// sgra'i khams nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang / sgra'i khams ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud
359b7('bum): na yang sgra'i khams med/ sgra'i khams las gud na yang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang sgra'i khams/ sgra'i khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// rna ba'i rnam par
359b8('bum): shes pa'i khams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams med
360a1('bum): rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams las gud na yang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams/ rna ba
360a2('bum): rnam par shes pa'i khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// sna'i khams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang sna'i khams ma yin/ stong pa gud na yang snga'i khams med/ sna
360a3('bum): khams las gud na yang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang sna'i khams sna'i khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// dri'i khams nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang dri'i
360a4('bum): khams ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang dri'i/ khams med/ dri'i khams las gud na yang / stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang dri'i khams/ 
360a5('bum): dri'i khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams ma yin/ stong
360a6('bum): pa nyid las gud na yang sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams med/ sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams las gud na yang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang sna'i rnam par shes
360a7('bum): pa'i khams/ sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// lce'i khams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang lce'i khams ma yin/ stong pa nyid las
360a8('bum): gud na yang lce'i khams med/ lce'i khams las gud na yang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang lce'i khams/ lce'i khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// ro'i khams
360b1('bum): kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang ro'i khams ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang ro khams med/ ro'i khams las gud na yang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang ros
360b2('bum): khams/ ro'i khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// lce'i rnam par shes pa khams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams ma yin/ stong
360b3('bum): panyid las gud na yang lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams med/ lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams las gud na yang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang lce'i rnam par shes pa
360b4('bum): khams/ lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams nyid kyang stong / dpa nyid do// lus kyi khams kyi stong pa nyid gang yingan pa de yang lus kyi khams ma yin/ stong pa nyid
360b5('bum): las gud na yang lus kyi khams med/ lus kyi khams las gud na yang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang lus kyi khamasalus kyi khams nyid kyang
360b6('bum): stong pa nyid do// reg gi khams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang / reg gi khams ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang reg gi khams med/ reg gi khams
360b7('bum): las gud na yang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang reg gi khams/ reg gi khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin
360b8('bum): pa de yang lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams ma yin stong pa nyid las gud na yang lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams med/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams las gud
361a1('bum): na yang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams nyid kyang stong
361a2('bum): pa nyid do// yid kyi khams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang yid kyi khams ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang yid kyi khams med yid kyi khams las
361a3('bum): gud na yang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang yid kyi khams/ yid kyi khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// chos kyi khams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang / chos
361a4('bum): kyi khams ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang chos kyi khams med/ chos kyi khams las gud na yang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang chos
361a5('bum): kyi khams/ chos kyi khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid// do// yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi sto/ nga pa nyid gang yin pa de yang / yid kyi rnam par shes
361a6('bum): pa'i khams ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams med/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams las gud na yang stong pa nyid med/ stong pa
361a7('bum): nyid kyang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// sa'i khams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang sa'i khams ma
361a8('bum): yin pa stong pa nyid las gud na yang sa'i khams med/ sa'i khams las gud na yang stong pa nyid med de stong pa nyid kyang sa'i khams/ sa'i khams nyid kyang stong
361b1('bum): pa nyid do// chu'i khams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang chu'i khams ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang chu'i khams med/ chu'i khams las gud na yang stong pa nyid

361b4('bum): kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang / rlung gi khams/ ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang rlung gi kha/ mas med rlung gi khams las gud na yang stong pa
361b5('bum): nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang rlung gi khams/ rlung gi khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// namakha'i khams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang na mkha'i kham
361b6('bum): ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang na mkha'i khams med/ na mkha'i khams las gun yang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang na mkha'i khams/ na mkha'i kham
361b7('bum): nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang rnam par shes pa'i khams ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang rnam par shes
361b8('bum): pa'i khams med/ rnam par shes pa'i khams las gud na yang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'i khams rnam par shes pa'i khams
362a1('bum): nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// ma rig pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang ma rig pa ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang ma rig pa med/ ma
362a2('bum): rig pa las gud na yang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang ma rig pa ma rig pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// 'du byed kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang 'du byed ma

362a6('bum): pa de yang ming dang gzugs ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang ming dang gzugs med/ ming dang gzugs las gud na yang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang ming dang
362a7('bum): gzugs ming dang gzugs nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// skye mched drug gi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang skye mched drug ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang skye mched drug med//

362b1('bum): ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang reg pa med/ reg pa las gud na yang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang reg pa/ reg pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// tshor ba'i stong pa

362b3('bum): stong pa nyid do// sred pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang sred pa ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang sred pa med/ sred pa las gud na yang stong pa nyid med de/ stong

363a1('bum): rga shi rga shi nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin//

363a3('bum): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ stong pa nyid

363a7('bum): stong pa nyid do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang brtson
363a8('bum): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las gud na yong stong pa nyid med/ stong pa nyid kyang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/ brtson
363b1('bum): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// bsam gtan gyis pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ stong pa nyid

363b6('bum): ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang nang stong pa nyid med/ nang stong pa nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang nang stong pa nyid/ nang stong
363b7('bum): pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// phyi stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang phyi stong pa nyid ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang phyi stong pa nyid med/ phyi stong pa nyid las

364b7('bum): dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid/ thog ma dang tha ma meng pa stong pa nyid kyang stong pa
364b8('bum): nyid do// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang dor ba med pa stong pa nyid med/ ngor

366a8('bum): kyang stong pa nyid do// byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams

366b2('bum): lam yan lag brgyad pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na yang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa med/
